title: Hammer: Truck GPS & Maps
description:
Smarter Trucking Starts Here.

Hammer is a powerful GPS navigation app designed specifically for commercial truck drivers. Built by the community at TruckersReport.com, Hammer Truck GPS delivers precision routing, safety-first features, and robust offline map capabilities tailored to the needs of professional drivers.

KEY FEATURES
- Truck-Specific GPS Navigation
- Turn-by-turn directions customized for commercial vehicles
- Routing that considers your truck's height, weight, length, axle count, and cargo type
- Offline map access keeps you on track without cellular data
- Real-time rerouting around traffic, accidents, and road closures
- Landscape mode and satellite view for easier readability on the road
- Trip Planning Tools for Truckers
- Multi-stop route optimization with custom waypoints
- Find weigh stations, fuel stops, rest areas, truck stops, parking, and more
- Detailed POIs with diesel prices, hours of operation, click-to-call buttons, and amenity listings
- Traffic and weather overlays for route efficiency and safety
- Safety-First Features
- Weigh station alerts
- Speed limit notifications
- Lane guidance and spoken voice directions
- Dark mode for low-light driving conditions

COVERAGE AREAS
- United States (including Alaska & Hawaii)
- Canada
- Mexico

Whether you're hauling across state lines or navigating complex city routes, Hammer equips you with everything you need to drive smarter, safer, and more efficiently.

Developed by TruckersReport.com â€” the largest online community of professional truck drivers, dedicated to building tools and resources that empower the trucking industry.

summary: Commercial Truck GPS: Parking, speed limits, diesel fuel & weigh station alerts

scraped_reviews.content: So far not pleasant. it is accurate 97% of the time but it freezes too much. If you active your trip & decide to cancel your trip for a bit longer like to leave 30 mins later, the app will freeze when you attempt to set it up again when you're ready to leave. at times I set it, I'm ready to go & forget to do something & I quit the navigation so my phone can be off while I go into the store. Now ready few mins later I go & set up to leave & it freezes for at least an hour before it works again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear this, our dev team has been notified and will look into this.  In the meantime, please visit the Google Play Store to ensure you're running the most updated version.

scraped_reviews.content: Edit for 11/2/25: In the beginning, I've used this app for two years now, but lately it leaves alot to be desired. Tried the payed routing once, thought It'd get better, only got worse, so I went back to free. Now you want me to pay and no more free routing? Not going to happen. And I've adjusted my rating down to one star.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry Paul! Our map data provider increased their prices, we have to charge a subscription fee now.  The guidance is the same for both versions and we will continue to work on improving this.  In the meantime, if you have a specific mapping error to report, email support@hammerapp.com with the address and discrepancy for us to review.

scraped_reviews.content: was free with option for payment for more features. worked great for 1.5 years and they really screwed me today by mandating a $5/month subscription. finding another option. no warning, just stopped my route and demanded a subscription while I was on the road and on a tight schedule. im sorry, I would have gladly paid a subscription, but you screwed me. taking the 5 star back to 1
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry Justin! Our map data provider increased their prices 800%, we have to charge a subscription fee now.

scraped_reviews.content: As of November 13, 2025, the once free trucking Navigation tool Hammer App just closed its doors on free Navigation on my device. It's now $4.99 per month to use Navigation.. if it's going to cost that much, couldn't TruckersReport at least allow users to input "their Miles Per Hour" or their 'Average Miles per Hour'? ..not all trucks can run at 80mph in areas where 80mph is posted, or 75mph, etc.. . it was a great free Navigation app up to now..
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback, our team will continue to look into these features for future releases.

scraped_reviews.content: it's alright GPS for trucking because it's free. but if your going to charge for it . then it's very far from a chargeable GPS. I ll go buy one. not worth it by far. all the milages are off and when I select the Grey route it will send me back to best route. freezes all the time. not all addresses come up. Google is much better and free. when your done with route and u get the option to end route. u push the button and it takes u right back to the same route. you have to force close app
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Shane, thanks for the review.  Our map data provider increased their prices, we have to charge a subscription fee now.  We know this isn't ideal and support your choice to use a different application if desired.  Also, toggling precise location off and back on within the app's permission settings may help resolve the location bug.

scraped_reviews.content: this is getting a two star for me. for normal routing it is good. but if you're hauling any kind of hazmat, be warned it doesn't work. it'll try taking you through areas you can't go through with hazmat no matter what you tell it. been hoping they'd fix this glaring issue but after months there's been no sign of such. And now with the subscription model I will not be using this much longer as they are claiming their costs have gone up "800%" but haven't provided the data on that anywhere.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for the persistent issues with Hazmat routing. Kindly email support@hammerapp.com with the addresses so we can relay the error to our data mapping provider for review.

scraped_reviews.content: update: after testing on multiple devices, this is CLEARLY bait and switch. having it on 3 devices, the 1 I use the most now has no functionality unless I pay. the 2nd I use only sparingly, has the pay pop up but will let you close it and still function. the 3rd one I've used only twice and does not even have a pop up. the "our costs" is pre programmed, not new.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: As stated earlier, we have changed to a subscription based model and are are slowly implementing this to all users.

scraped_reviews.content: so far so good. i like that at a glance you can see the truckstops along the way. .UPDATE: 10/10/25 What did you guys do to mess up a good thing? The voice is distorted, I hear part of a sentence and it speaks so fast like it's sped up. I didn't speed it up and I can't stop it. The maps are confusing to me, I don't like the new look so I stop using and I stopped my subscription. it's a pity because I really liked the app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback Lynn, it will be relayed to our dev team to help improve future releases.

scraped_reviews.content: i like the app generally, but they are starting to try and roll out a forced subscription service. i realize that with operating costs, it might be untenable otherwise, but if they go from a free app to a paid one, they are going to be competing with all the other paid apps on the market. Unfortunately, they can not compare to their competition if that is the case.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback Xavier. We apologize for the change, but due to a significant increase in our map data costs we are no longer able to provide free routing and must transition to a paid subscription model.

scraped_reviews.content: this was by far the best truck driving GPS app on the market and it went from five stars to one because we're being forced to pay another monthly bill for another app! Why can't we just deal with the ads??Â¿ can you at least make a one-time payment because I am not adding another monthly bill to my already rapidly growing amount of monthly payments! Other apps use ads to help pay for their app so I'm not sure why you guys stopped, it was def worth it! So for now I'm going back to google GPS!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We hear your frustration Bobby. Our map data provider increased their prices by 800%, so we had to make a tough call and switch to a subscription model to keep the app running.

scraped_reviews.content: This app did not work for me as a local delivery driver. It doesn't put way point pins and dosnt alphabetize or number your stops which makes it very difficult. It also doesn't tell you what your next stops address is, all it says is "you've reached your way point". The app also likes taking you the long way around and or to the wrong address. What can I say it's a free app. I would much rather recommend Trucker Path and pay the $30 mo
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for this feedback, these are all valid points. We are always working to improve and value your insight. This will be shared with our team as we work to improve the application and user experience.

scraped_reviews.content: this was one of if not the best free trucker GPS app. but it is far from being the best paid app if that's what we are forced to do. sadly this will be about my fifth or sixth choice if I have to pay compared to other GPS apps that are better that require a subscription. I understand their map data costs went up.. the sadly they've got a lot of work to do if they want to be worth what they're asking.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback Chris, we appreciate the support.

scraped_reviews.content: I have been using this app for probably a year or more. It is functional but very unreliable. I would say 4 or 5 times per day it crashes and I have to resume my route. It is also annoying to start a route to a destination I have saved because I have to push 4 buttons for it to start. Would be nice to select address and start. If it were better I would even pay for it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback Wayne, this will be relayed to our dev team for review.

scraped_reviews.content: You guys are killing me. While this is one of the better apps I've used, I have missed turns, driven to wrong directions and led down streets where I've had to back a 25 ft trailer into someone's yard to turn around due to the app taking me to the wrong destination. And it wasn't even close to the proper destination. Come on guys, driving in NY/NJ is hard enough. I shouldn't have to use two separate GPS apps to get places
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hammer suggests routes based on the information available in online mapping databases which are not a substitute for human judgment and route suggestions should not be blindly followed. To report an error, please email support@hammerapp.com the address and discrepancy for us to review further.

scraped_reviews.content: I had this app and used it nearly 3 years. I gotta say it asked me to update the app for new fixes etc 30 minutes ago. It was working perfectly fine.. So I updated it anyways. Just my luck now this GPS doesn't work correctly, weather doesn't show anywhere even when I turned it on. I checked all my settings and permissions, etc. I would gave this 5 stars before I just updated it. I shouldn't have updated it. I'm super disappointed and will uninstall. I will just have to find a different app!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear this, our dev team has been notified and will look into this.  In the meantime, please visit the App Store to ensure you're running the most updated version.

scraped_reviews.content: its great most of the time. occassionally the app is super buggy, but for a free option its really good. however my biggest gripe with ut is once a month for the last 6 months or so, it will stop letting you use it unless you "donate" $4.99 and its just not worth that. though i find if i leave and come back in amount 10 days or so it's usually free again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Our routing costs have significantly increased, making it necessary to implement a subscription model to keep Hammer running. We appreciate your understanding and support.

scraped_reviews.content: In the past 3-4 months Hammer has been unable to even form a route for a multitude of locations. Its been giving me a screen of "communication error". This is usually resolved by punching in the address again and it works fine. App is up to date without any data or Wi-Fi connection issues. This morning however, it has failed to work at all. Even with uninstalling, restarting my phone, and reinstalling. Hammer has been reliable up to this point, it's a shame it's no longer.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we're sorry you're having issues Vince.  If you haven't already please message us within the application so we can send you a push update.  Menu > Messages > Tech Support > "Communication Error".

scraped_reviews.content: Has potential, it crashes constantly tho, if they fix that it will be great, but it needs to be fixed, maybe then I would subscribe for 2.99 or 5.99, depending on the reliability, but for now it is not up to speed with other navigation apps, hoping they fix the crash issue, it crashes every 5 minutes or less! Oops i missed my turn.... Ugh!, App crashed again! :(
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! Please update the app in the Google Play Store to ensure you are running the latest version. If the issue persists, email us at support@hammerapp.com and include the Hammer version installed on your device by following these steps: Menu > About App & EULA. We appreciate your patience!

scraped_reviews.content: I'm using this and So far so good. I have just 1 issue. While navigating , the turns are somewhat harder to see because it is zoomed out too far. I can't really see the next turn while navigating even with a large screen. I think the team should consider having the navigation zoomed in a little more on turns... Everything else seems great so far. I see that they have allowed users to give a Truck Entry point which is very important. On Android, the app seems to work well on a mid range phone!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your valuable insight! We will definitely take this into consideration for future updates. We appreciate your feedback and aim to enhance your experience with Hammer.

scraped_reviews.content: Use this app if you want to find another career. Gets lost constantly. Has issues finding approximate locations. I know it's free, but it has many bugs and needs to be reworked. Your job is on the line, and the safety of others is on the line. Try Route4trucks for a free little app that functions well with your usual atlas GPS system. This app needs further development. 1 star
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear this. Hammer GPS is continuously being improved and your input is valuable in helping us identify and fix issues. We understand the importance of reliability and safety and are committed to enhancing the app's performance. If you have specific details about the issues, please email them to support@hammerapp.com.

scraped_reviews.content: For a free trucking app I get what your going for but routing needs work. It's so clunky, no easy way to move stuff around without redoing the whole thing, communication error when you do and then it just does the same route originally anyways. I can forgive that but THE biggest glaring issue is it does not tell you when you're at a stop during a multiple stop route. It just keeps going like it's a giant round trip and no stops are there. I can't use it if I'm driving past my stops which I did.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for this feedback, these are all valid points.  We are always working to improve and value your insight.  This will be shared with our team as we work to improve the application and user experience.  Your use and support of Hammer is greatly appreciated!

scraped_reviews.content: Not saying good or bad as a routing app. But, routing is easy. The number of options available on the market for CMV drivers, so many of them. This is obviously aggregated data from other sources. And repackaged. That is not a bad thing. My complaint is the actual searching capability. The app does not search then sort by GPS location. 17 miles away "Walmart"? Never displayed. BP next door, Never displayed. Motel 6 across the street? Every motel 6 displayed was over 250 miles away.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your valuable insight! We will definitely take this into consideration for future updates. We appreciate your feedback and aim to enhance your experience with Hammer.

scraped_reviews.content: I want to preface this with, at first I loved the app. But the more I use it, the more I hate it. Pros: good with routing around low bridges, weight restricted roads, etc. Cons: I've had directions freeze and had to restart the app, it tried sending me down roads that are posted no trucks, speed limits are not always accurate, and finally it will reset the trip mid way telling you to go back to your first checkpoint. Bought a $400 trucker GPS today as I'm fed up with it. Only use if no choice!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for this feedback, routing and accurate map data is extremely important and we will continue to work on improving this.  In the meantime, if you have a specific mapping error to report please email support@hammerapp.com providing the address and discrepancy for us to review further.

scraped_reviews.content: App no longer connects to Bluetooth. Accept while on the phone. Then it connects and interrupts call. Every other gps connects fine. I've sent several messages to tech department, with no response. This was my favorite gps for years. Unfortunately I'm going to have cancel my subscription. Which is a shame. When this app worked (before last update) it was way better than any others. Now it's almost unusable. :(
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Weâ€™re actively working on resolving this issue. Thank you for your patience, and weâ€™re sorry for the trouble Devin! If you'd like to cancel your subscription, you can do so within your Google Play account.

scraped_reviews.content: Just last week, the app couldn't find a suitable truck route so it sent me on the car route. But the truck route was one exit further down the road. Many times, it has directed me several miles farther than necessary, just to have me U-turn and go back 6 or 7(or 10) miles to an exit I SHOULD have taken in the first place. Also, why, when I put in a specific Petro or T/A truck stop, does that truck stop not show up at the TOP of my choices. Overall, it's okay, but it needs some work.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thank you for this feedback. Our navigation and map features are provided by HERE technologies. If there are any specific roads or routes to report please provide the your origin, destination, and the approximate address of discrepancy so we can relay for further investigation!

scraped_reviews.content: it does a pretty good job of showing low bridges, weight restrictions, non truck routes etc.. However, its actual navigation can be an issue. It will still route me down a 6T road (it shows it on map). I can understand if it didn't know an updated weight on road, but it literally says the road is 6T limit and then routes me through it every time. *yes I have my truck saved at 60k lbs, still routes it through there, can't avoid it.* if it wasn't free, it would be 3 stars.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback! Please email support@hammerapp.com with details of any routing discrepancies (like the 6T road) so we can relay them to our data mapping provider for review.

scraped_reviews.content: This app is extremely good. I use it as an O/O for all my daily loads. I never have to worry about going down a narrow street for cars only, a low bridge, or any tolls. I can also change it to satellite view and select multiple ways to get to my destination if there's more than one way to get there. I highly suggest using this as a main or alternative GPS in the event you want a stress free drive operating a commercial vehicle.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the great rating!  Positive reviews and support like yours help us to grow and improve our user experience.

scraped_reviews.content: Your sub par app that I have to use for work will not start the navigation for my next stop. It's stuck on trying to approve weight restrictions. Please fix this! Also, do you actually send "techs" out in the field to test this app? The route options make no sense at all sometimes. Sending me towards overpasses that are too low, not rerouting me when I have to go in a different direction due to something Like a closed road. This app needs help!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Zachary, we're sorry to hear you're having issues.  For Android users your issue may be resolved by clearing the cache for the app on your device.  If your issue persists, please email support@hammerapp.com with: Device Model, Version of OS, Version of Hammer App installed and detailed description of issue.  Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: The voice blasts -Annoying. Just sent me on a useless 5 extra mile loop by Bloomington IL on 55. There's no reason I need to be told every 10 miles to continue for 10 miles , especially when I'm on the same road for 200 more miles. Also sent me to the wrong gas station instead of the truck stop. Would be nice if it had more weigh station options. Also routing is convolution at best.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank for you providing this feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: Great, except searching for places. The navigation is decent, though if the route has even 100ft of restricted road it won't let you navigate as a truck, only as a car route. Secondly, when searching for places like pilot, I type in "Pilot #318" and it's not in the list at all. Yet if I type in the address and select it, lobehold there's Pilot #318 listed by station number on the map. It's broken and something that honestly is only thing I've had issue with.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Brayden, sorry for the inconvenience & thank you for bringing this to our attention! Iâ€™m going to share this feedback with our development team and they will address this as soon as possible. Regards, Rory with the Hammer Team

scraped_reviews.content: This app is absolute trash in 100 different ways. It is appalling that they even try to pass this as a trucker app. Wrong directions, no idea about truck entrances, taking us down closed roads, often trying to take us down routes clearly marked no trucks allowed, clunky, closes directions if you leave the screen at all, slow as hell, can't find rest area and just an outright hassle at every turn. The only thing it's good for is showing height requirements on roads and highway. Trash otherwise
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your valuable insight. We will definitely take this into consideration for future updates. Routing and accurate map data is extremely important and we will continue to work on improving this.  In the meantime, if you have a specific mapping error to report please email support@hammerapp.com providing the address and discrepancy.

scraped_reviews.content: Overall, I have to say I love this app. I've actually found it to be more accurate and easier to use than Garmin or Rand McNally. I've been using it in conjunction with Google maps for over a year now and it has never led me down a restricted route or into a low bridge. The only thing I am not crazy about is how far off the ETA is usually are. Almost any route you program in it will give you an ETA of at least 25% longer than it actually takes.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jason, apologies for the inconvenience here. We are always looking to improve the experience for our users and really appreciate the feedback! Regards, Rory with the Hammer Team

scraped_reviews.content: 3 stars is average, maybe it should be 4 but I'll stick low for now. Time to waypoints would be very helpful. It's tough to search for a general category like restaurants. Routing can be interesting at times, sending me 5 miles out of the way when the right turn is a block ahead, and a truck route. But I always have a Garmin going too, so if they agree with each other I'm thrilled.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Steve, apologies for the inconvenience here. We are always looking to improve the experience for our users and really appreciate the feedback! Regards, Rory with the Hammer Team

scraped_reviews.content: I would give five stars if the app would give me what I need like exit numbers that don't show up, real time location like the town or city I'm in, I don't see rest areas nor mile markers in the parking tab, mile number at the top of the screen are too small to see, and the orange color of the app is not appealing to the eye maybe if the color is changed to something more light or blue it will be better, but in general the app works and does the job!!!! By the way I'm a paying customerðŸ˜‚
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your insights Jorge! Your feedback about exit numbers, real-time location, and other features is crucial. We'll use your suggestions to improve the app's functionality and appearance. Thank you for being a valued paying customer.

scraped_reviews.content: Trucker friendly and accurate. I actually prefer this app, and use it more often than my Garmin. No ads nor annoying pop-ups to speak of. Updates automatically as opposed to my Garmin which will only do so when prompted and requires a WIFI source. Can't believe they don't charge for this nor require a subscription. Probably only a matter of time before they do. Nothing good lasts forever.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Rick, thank you for taking the time to leave this 5 star review! Our development team is constantly looking to improve our users' experiences based on provided feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: I like it and have used it for a while but it freezes a lot and puts me through a lot of no trucks allowed and residential areas. Once you get into one of these it isn't easy to just turn around. But I do like how it gives you 3 options of routing. Minus the residential areas and having me go through no truck zones is annoying since the app I know won't pay for any ticket I get because of it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for bringing this to our attention Cris!  Route accuracy is a top priority to us.  Please email support@hammerapp.com with the address and discrepancy in detail.  We will then relay this information to our mapping provider to review and make the necessary corrections.

scraped_reviews.content: Liking the app so far. Only issues is that where it shows the posted speed limit is tiny, and when I'm at a truckstop/rest area, it will ask how many spaces are available. If I click any option, it screws over the route, and I have to put the route back in. Other than that, this app is great. Don't even need to use trucker path anymore.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your kind feedback. We appreciate you bringing this issue to our attention and it has been forwarded to our Developers to look into. Thank you for using Hammer.

scraped_reviews.content: I keep coming back to this app because I really want to like it. One of the main features is the fuel stop information, but it always seems to be incorrect. And now every time I open it it locks up on me. ***Edit: I just cked again and the fuel prices are way off. I have several fuel card apps that I know are correct and this app just isn't right. Maybe find out what data source apps like EFS or TSD are using.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Tom, apologies for the inconvenience here. We are always looking to improve the experience for our users and really appreciate the feedback! Regards, Rory with the Hammer Team

scraped_reviews.content: Posted speed don't show up while driving, or it if they do once you go over 65 mph it starts to give you warnings when the posted speed limit is higher. Need truck entrances to locations. I don't like the fact that while you're going through a city there are to many lanes being displayed. That can be confusing. I can't change the load ugly voice it uses to give you directions while app is being used. Please upgrade.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback, Joan! You can adjust speed display under More > Display > Speed. To set truck entrances, tap "Does this location have a truck entrance?" after entering your destination. For voice changes, go to More > Sound > Voices to explore available options on your device.

scraped_reviews.content: For some reason it keeps making a ringing sound every 30 seconds or less even with sound notifications turned off. Every time there is an update it gets worse. Uninstalled and going to try again but if ringing continues im done fighting this app. Speed limits are wrong more often than not. Will try to make u turns too much. Dosnt know about a lot of truck parking and says there are loves in the middle of fields and woods.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Josh,
We appreciate your feedback, please check the Google Play Store to ensure you're running the latest version. In the meantime, our dev team will review and work on improving.  For mapping inaccuracies, please email support@hammerapp.com with details so we can report them for review.

scraped_reviews.content: 1. Need American English speaking woman who uses American English words, that says the turn by turn information. 2. Drivers should be able to choose what route to take. 3. I choose not to see the speed on the map, and it is still shown. 4. I choose the shortest route, and it still takes the longer route even when trucks are allowed on the shorter route. 5. The app does not say the names of the specific streets, roads, or highways to turn on all of the time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Olivia, apologies for the inconvenience here. We are always looking to improve the experience for our users and really appreciate the feedback! Regards, Rory with the Hammer Team

scraped_reviews.content: It looks like they're adding ads to a marginally useful app. I did use Hammer for trip planning, but it's routing got so bad I stopped. I sent feedback multiple times about specific routings that were absolutely insane, but I never received the first response. I would check it every once in a while to see if it still didn't work. Now they want a subscription to remove ads, and the ads didn't even load correctly. Wow! They even replied, to my review. I sent in numerous errors, and no response.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for providing this feedback Dean.  If you encounter any mapping errors to report please email support@hammerapp.com with the address and discrepancy for us to take a closer look.  Thanks again for your feedback and safe travels!

scraped_reviews.content: It's good, but needs some adjustments. For starters, the HUD needs to pop up and be bigger for weigh stations, inclines, ect. It would also be nice if this feature was spoken " Weigh station in 2 miles. Reported closed" It's hard to drive and see the tiny HUD with the information on it. More voices, utilize all the text to speech out there.... especially googles. Different colors, Would like to see different color schemes. It's good but needs some polishing
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi John, Thank you for your great feedback. We are always looking for ways to help our users and improve their experience.  I have forwarded this to our team.

scraped_reviews.content: I use this app often, and it is great so far. However, there are some issues that need to be looked at. It tries to avoid toll routes for some reason and directs to go to no truck lanes, express lanes, NC. Also, it has taken me to no trucks street and bridges with weight limits. Exit number on top right would be great instead of just names. And the last thing is that it freezes my phone when I try to exit the navigation. I use Samsung s23 ultra, I have to restart my phone every time it freezes
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback, we appreciate your support!  Our team will investigate and release a new version for download improving on these issues as soon as possible.  In the meantime, freezing may be resolved by clearing the cache app data.  We value your input and are dedicated to improving your experience with Hammer.

scraped_reviews.content: Nice interface. The routing details need improvement for sure. If the route is not fixed, this App could be useless for truckers. One of the route I ask the program to calculate, instead of getting off at the nearest exit (I-24, Exit 135) then turn across to the other side of the highway where my fuel stop location is, it goes to the next exit and got on some country road then arrive at the destination with 15 extra miles. Marathon Logo cluttered the map:( Needed zoom out more during drive.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi June, we appreciate you bringing this issues to our attention. We will look into this further! if you have any further issue please email us at support@hammerapp.com

scraped_reviews.content: This app does have potential and I absolutely appreciate that it is free, but there are some things I don't like right from the start. 1) the set zoom is way to close, it needs to be zoomed out a little. I can't mess around with the +/- buttons while I'm driving. 2) the app needs serious route/re-routing work, look devs, doing a u-turn should not be an option for a semi truck. Big trucks can't just turn around on any street. Devs please email me for more suggestions
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, 
Thank you so much for bringing this to our attention. I can assure you this has been sent to our developers to address as soon as possible. We are constantly working on updating and improving the app and user experience. We love suggestions. Please reach out to us at Support@HammerApp.com. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: Excellent app. For something that you can use for free. This route finder has taken me to my pick up and drop locations, very well. Always on time. I have never been late. If you could add a traffic monitoring feature with a reroute, that would take this app over the top. I would even pay for that. Some small glitches. Sometimes it doesn't refresh quick enough and I miss an exit, but, over all, very well done.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Charles, Great feedback! We are always looking for ways to help our users and improve their experience.  I have forwarded this to our team.

scraped_reviews.content: Does a great job at navigating me around stuff, especially with hazmat, But... This app has more bugs than an oak tree in the forest. When I'm moving and want to use voice to text, that's completely impossible, even with my own keyboard. Searching for a specific location is impossible,It's only good to get you to the city itself, and it can't even find the truck stop to navigate to. Navigation voice is very glitchy too. And the British accent is too much to handle. Plus way too loud.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Tim, sorry for the inconvenience & thank you for bringing this to our attention! Iâ€™m going to share this feedback with our development team and they will address this as soon as possible. Regards, Rory with the Hammer Team

scraped_reviews.content: Pros: It's free! It's fairly simple to use. It works as described. I enjoy this gps app a lot. Cons: Map zoom is too close usually, especially in landscape mode where the top bar hides part of the map. "Next truck stop/weight station" feature is accurate about 85% of the time with location. Cannot select multiple route options every time (but sometimes it will let you). Search results list is kind of weird, I can enter an address exact and it will still show me like two other results first.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Taylor, we are always looking to improve the experience for our users and really appreciate the feedback! Regards, Rory with the Hammer Team

scraped_reviews.content: Very nice GPS app save for a few small greivances. Namely the zoom on the map itself. seems to zoom too far in and doesn't tell you about a turn or exit until the last second sometimes. Also, the little square at the bottom left of the map that tells you about upcoming Pilots or Loves is 50/50 on accuracy. I've been in the middle of the desert in Arizona and it said there was a Loves coming up in .2 miles, and there was nothing. Still, a very good app to use, especially a free one.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, apologies for the inconvenience here. We are always looking to improve the experience for our users and really appreciate the feedback! Regards, Rory with the Hammer Team

title: Call of DutyÂ®: Mobile
description:
CALL OF DUTYÂ® like never before, bringing fast-paced FPS action to your fingertips.

Jump into intense Multiplayer battles with classic modes like Team Deathmatch, Domination, and Kill Confirmed on legendary maps such as Shipment, Raid, and Standoff. Prefer Battle Royale? Squad up and conquer with dynamic modes like Tank Isolated and Training Ground, set in an iconic battlefield.

Battle Royale chaos awaits! Explore all 5 POIs, fight to survive, and claim victory. Or, team up with friends for action-packed Multiplayer matches on fan-favorite maps like Nuketown.

Join millions of players and dominate the battlefield in CALL OF DUTYÂ®: MOBILEâ€”the ultimate free-to-play FPS experience. Whether itâ€™s fast 5v5 team deathmatches, epic Zombies mode, or all-out Battle Royale warfare, the action never stops.

Lock and loadâ€”your next mission starts now!

DOWNLOAD FOR FREE TODAY
CALL OF DUTYÂ®: MOBILE boasts console quality HD gaming on your phone with customizable and intuitive controls, voice and text chat with your friends, and thrilling 3D graphics and sound. Enjoy controller games? We got you! Experience this iconic FPS franchise, on the go. Play this FPS gun game anywhere. Every mission feels like a high-stakes delta operation, pushing your shooting skills to the limit.

NEW SEASONAL CONTENT UPDATED MONTHLY
CALL OF DUTYÂ®: MOBILE has a variety of FPS game modes, maps, themed events, and rewards so it never gets old. Every season expands upon the story in the CALL OF DUTYÂ® universe and brings new & unique unlockable content. Jump into battle royale today!

CUSTOMIZE YOUR UNIQUE LOADOUT
Unlock and earn dozens of iconic operators, weapons, outfits, score streaks, and new pieces of gear, allowing you to play CALL OF DUTYÂ®: MOBILE your way.

COMPETITIVE AND SOCIAL PLAY
Fan of war multiplayer games? Gather your friends and test your mettle in competitive ranked mode or sharpen your aim in social play. Join a clan for a sense of community and earn unique rewards for participating in Clan Wars. With every encounter, experience the sheer force of this legendary FPS shooter game.

DOWNLOAD OPTIONS TO REDUCE APP SIZE
Download and play CALL OF DUTYÂ®: MOBILE without the barrier of storage space. As part of an effort to make CALL OF DUTYÂ®: MOBILE more accessible, the initial app download size has been reduced and additional options allow players to choose what is downloaded to experience the full game, such as HD resources, maps, weapons, and operators.

Have what it takes to compete with the best? Download CALL OF DUTYÂ®: MOBILE now!
_________________________________________________________
NOTE: We welcome any feedback during your experience to improve the game. To give feedback, in-game go to > Settings > Feedback > Contact Us.
Subscribe for Updates! ---> profile.callofduty.com/cod/registerMobileGame
_________________________________________________________
Note: An internet connection is required to play this game.

Please note this app contains social features that allow you to connect and play with friends and push notifications to inform you when exciting events or new content are taking place in the game. You can choose whether or not to utilize these features.

Â© 2025 Activision Publishing, Inc. ACTIVISION, and CALL OF DUTY are trademarks of Activision Publishing, Inc. All other trademarks and trade names are the property of their respective owners. By downloading, installing or using this App, you agree to Activision's privacy policy and terms of use, as may be updated by Activision from time to time. Please visit http://www.activision.com/privacy/en/privacy.html to view Activision's privacy policy and https://www.activision.com/legal/terms-of-use to view Activision's terms of use.

summary: Realistic action-packed FPS Battle Royale & 5v5 war multiplayer. Lock and load!

scraped_reviews.content: The lucky draw events for cosmetics are very irritating. Probabilities for purchasing weapons and characters are unfair, but it's all about the money. The menu is a cluster of items thrown in your face the second you log in, which is annoying. It's difficult to navigate. The abundance of free rare items for the free to play player base is commendable. How about including native controller compatibility for razer, gamesir, etc, phone controllers. The pandering to backbone is so lame.

please, for the love of all that is holy, fix the skill based matchmaking in this game. half the issue is ranked reset. if I'm a new player, and you make it crazy easy to get to legendary bc of bot lobbies, and then once I'm there, you put me against players who've been playing non stop since 2018, it makes ranked play garbage and not at all fun. Controller player, by the way.

I look at it this way. If a game results in me spending a significant amount of hours on it, it's at least worthy of 3 stars. If a game is engaging enough to compel me to actually spend money for in game items, it's a 5 star game. Because ultimately that's their goal. Like it or hate it, CoD is pretty much the gold standard as far as how games should be optimized and operate, with it being free to play, having the best controller support there is on mobile, and no ads. no less than 5â˜†

Gameplay is wonderful, however there is one thing you need to fix before I can rate this 5-stars. Fix the "Fill My Squad" part on BR. I've tried getting put in a match with 2-4 players and 95% of the time I go in alone. At the end of the round, I'm always in a 1 vs 2, or 1 vs 4 scenario. Doesn't make sense to check the box, for it not to fill my squad. Thanks.

Its CoD. Its fun, you can play with friends (if you have any), has controller support (sometimes), and is chalk full of stuff you can spend money on. Unlike the console versions, you can actually blame dying on lag. That being said, the game has some hiccups here and there, but otherwise its a pretty well polished for a mobile CoD.

I've kind of quit this since everything is p2w. It doesn't serve that much of a military vibe. It's too bright and unrealistic in my opinion. There's lots of incredibly detailed guns. I've made lots of nostalgic memories on it, which actually felt fun, back when I was playing. And now it's all the same recycled mythic guns. And the worst of all, the matchmaking, it either gives you a lobby full of tryhards that have been playing since day 1, and a complete bot lobby. It'

I played this back in 2019 and enjoyed it, but I recently downloaded the game and find it horrible. The game play is a joke, people lag so much that I have watched three of us shoot at one guy and no shots registered on the player, and he killed all of us & we didn't even see him. There are too many items because they just want to sell you items instead of offer a good gaming experience. They haven't made a good Call of Duty for almost a decade, they have gone down hill for so long, what a joke.

I couldn't believe that they made a call of duty mobile game when I first saw this. For free too?!! This game is 5 stars because of many reasons. It's free: buying skins or items doesn't t put you at an advantage versus FTP, There are some very nostalgic maps from multiple titles, lots fun guns to use and secondary weapons , and the game plays very smooth. I stopped playing CoD and most games for about 10 years, but this brought me back into playing due to it's accessibility. 5/5

Cod mobile is definitely the best shooter on store of all time. Amazing skins, so many game modes, and so many guns to choose from. There are hardly any lag issues and no game crashes. I will only give this a 4 star because recently, there is an issue with the deleting maps off of my storage that I typically don't play. I use the deletion option by downloads, and after doing so, it asks to restart the game. after doing so, it kicks me out of the app and doesn't delete the files. please help!

I am amazed at how awesome this game is, it is a console level game but on my phone... smooth game play, even in battle royal, it's smooth as silk and keeps the games fast paced and exciting upgrading weapons and gear is almost too many options and I haven't had 1 ad and I haven't had to pay a penny, there definitely are a lot you can buy but I haven't felt forced or like I have to or be stuck in limbo... as far as the actual physics and game play ... no other game comes close highly recom

Just in general love the game been playing it since day one. Yes its had it ups and downs but i always end up re-downloading the game in the end because i just cant get enough of it. Im just a casual player and hate when i run into tryhards but there nothing i can really do about in. My only thing is i wish the game had optimal matchmaking, sush as putting you in the same lobby with people at the same skill level as you not just level based matchmaking.

Love the game but since the latest update I can't change my load outs, well sometimes they change to what I want then back to the previous, it's strange. I fear the game may go the same way as warzone and become unplayable. if it ain't broke don't fix it as the saying goes. the loadout selection figured out, 4 different sections for different game modes to choose from for some unknown reason, anyway all good now i think. Just leave it alone now.

Love this game, the grafics are amazing, the customization, all the variations. I wish they added a game mode that involves more slow pace tactical strategies, all the game modes are too fast paced and don't involve enough slow thinking strategys. But I half to say it get quite complex when it comes down to missions, and offers. They half to limit the amount of things that are on the home screen, it is overwhelming for new, and intermediate players. But overall definitely rate it at a 5 Star.

Review update... I've been playing this game for some years now. The game is great, but in Battle Royal, when it comes to the planes and helicopters, they need to be more simulated, like being able to aim at targets, shooting missiles or machine guns drop bombs or whatever, more like Battlefield Vietnam was back in the day. That would put this game above all, really. Give a variety of helicopters and planes to choose from and things in that nature.

It's okay, but just okay. Gunplay, controls, and graphics are great. Maps are reliable and well-crafted. However, the marketing is so predatory, crossovers do not appeal to the Western audience as much as Asian ones since Saw, EVERYTHING is limited-time and never return except very old battle passes. And the elephant in the room, it takes up too much storage. Way too much. Down the bloat size have crossovers that vary from pleasing Western to Asian audiences, and bring back Saw for better game

I find this game fun and competitive for numerous reasons, though there are few issues that make the game harder to play and slower to process. Starting with the positive, this game has a variety of modes and weaponry, followed by customization and open-thought possiblities to create your favorite weapons and have much fun with friends, but the game gets laggy, pauses, and has some bugs that make it less playable and stressful, where it can be unfair at times, especially in zombies, immobile.

I love this game but one thing I think is a little excessive is the prices. I wanted the dead of night character or gun. Spent money on cod points only to get everything else but thoose two items. Now I have to spend 50$ to have enough points for a single chance at either. Seems a little extreme and feel like you don't get enough for you're value. COD points are not made easy to earn.

Changing my review back to 4 stars, as the game developers have finally reverted back to old style of reviving teammates in battle royale ðŸ‘ðŸ»ðŸ‘ðŸ» the one concern I have is the shards for the different types of guns. it's hard to get shards for a particular gun, literally takes months, but once you've exchanged for the gun, it's fine. the problem is you still keep getting shards for the gun which you already have, but again takes months to get shards for the next weapon. Kindly do something

The best PVP, 1st person shooter mobile game you'd find on play store. The graphics are unique and extremely detailed gaming physics are top notch. Not to mention the realistic characters that perfectly depict real life soldiers at the battle front. The maps are really great and quite variety to choose from. Most importantly it's the gaming physics and hyperrealism (attention to detail) that sets Codm apart from other mobile First person shooter games. It can be quite addictive tho ðŸ«  ðŸ«

use to be fun time passing but now it's as bad as warzone mobile in it's last days, can't get a match! hackers, movement is all weird it's as if they just gave up on all of it. you literally can't play this game and it's ridiculous. I'm done. definitely deleted, it's obvious they do not care about those of us spending money to play this game so I'm out for good. it's one thing after another and I will be thoroughly enjoying myself on BF6. you couldn't drag me back with a tank!

Seems like COD deletes the bad reviews that people leave. The game is fun, but the amount of gigabytes to download for this game is ridiculous. There are a lot of maps, but most of the time you play the same ones. There are a lot of hackers in the game, that it's hard to progress in MP Rank and Battle Royale. Then, you lose a lot of points when you lose one match while you gain a few when you win. The new Gulag sucks, and the devs can't balance the guns and it's mostly pay to win

The biggest complaint I have is the heck of exspensive draws they have! Used to be able to get those characters and special guns for $20 a bundle. In my mind that is a very fair price and they would profit a lot off of those prices still. I am really ticked off that I have to spend immensely more than that for cool and awesome bundles. It makes the game less fun to play since it is harder to play against someone who spent the money for those draws. I can buy a brand new game for that much!

Iâ€™ve played a lot of mobile shooters, but Call of Duty: Mobile Warfare really raises the bar. The graphics are ultra HD, and the gameplay feels smooth even on high settings. What I love most is the balance. Itâ€™s challenging but fair. Whether youâ€™re into Battle Royale or multiplayer matches, thereâ€™s something for everyone. The weapon skins, sound design, and effects are top-tier. Definitely one of the best mobile games out.

I really enjoyed the first few months of playing this game as I was performing well and really dominating the competition. But then it happened. It became very mundane and boring. Plus it seemed as if my progression became stagnant suddenly and was taking too much of my time. Same old maps! Same old weapons and same old outcome. Boredom set in and I quit playing. I have much more important things to do in life than play this game hours on end everyday. Was fun while it lasted.

Call of Duty: Mobile is an absolute gem for mobile gamers! The graphics are top-notch, offering a console-like experience in the palm of your hand. With its diverse modesâ€”Battle Royale, Multiplayer, Zombies, and seasonal eventsâ€”there's something for everyone. Controls are smooth and customizable, making it accessible for both beginners and pros.

Call of Duty Mobile is a really fun, action-packed shooter that's easy to pick up and play. You can jump into tons of different game modes, from classic stuff like Team Deathmatch to more unique options. The graphics are solid, and the controls work well on mobile devices. One of the coolest things is that they keep adding new content and events, so it doesn't get stale. You can play solo or team up with friends. Overall, it's a great way to get that Call of Duty action on the go!

CODM is hands down one of the best mobile shooters out there. The graphics, smooth gameplay, and range of modes make it super engaging. Whether you're into fast-paced multiplayer or epic battle royales, there's something for everyone. The controls are customizable, which makes it feel just right. Highly recommend it to FPS fans

the absolute best mobile fps there is. It does require quite a bit of storage space. You don't really need a super fancy phone though as long as it has 40gb of storage free then you'll be ok. New items released monthly. Tons of events and challenges that are constantly changing. Multiplayer and Battle Royale game modes. A++ game

I loooooove this game. In my first week playing it I got to master 1 in ranked. The game is excellent I would give it 5 stars if possible but there is 1 problem about this well for me and for kids that have parental control, when they have the amount of time to use the app and to turn it off. Well the game turns on by a single click without noticing it. very annoying. I played a free for all.Obviously I won then turned it of for school and I couldn't use anymore so I beg you please fix it ðŸ˜”.

Good day, Devs. Iâ€™d like to bring to your attention a frustrating glitch in the game. Almost every time Iâ€™m in the lobby, the game auto-exitsâ€”whether Iâ€™m changing attachments, texting in WC, or right after finishing a match. Itâ€™s happened multiple times, and with all due respect, itâ€™s incredibly annoying. This game deserves 5 stars, but this bug makes me reconsider. Please fix it soon. I look forward to your response. Thanks, and God bless.

Wow, I can't believe how I mistakenly mistreated this game, but I felt guilty. Activision, thank you so much for recovering my account, and I feel proud that you finally are getting better at making others jubilant. I can't thank you enough for keeping me safe, and I hope you take care of yourself because this is the best Fps for mobile devices, regardless that it is lagging. I am thankful because I am finally jubilant for the massive improvement.

The game itself is amazing, i mean amazing. The only problem is that after a while it becomes a bit repetitive even the events are becoming all the same. I played until level 80 and then got so bored. And the fact that it takes a lot of space means that it has to be extremely good to keep on my phone, like whenever i have the game and my phone is out of storage, the first game i think of uninstalling is codm. You can make the game very interesting without taking too much space.

For a mobile game, the game has become too large. 46GB?! The draws are a scam now. You have to buy everything in the draw cause the odds are very low. The battle pass is now inferior. No value for money. Just boring skins. The battle pass used to be exciting. As for the free rewards, They are recycled. As a long time player, I have most of them which makes it pointless. AND CAN WE STOP WITH THE CARTOON, ANIME, GIRLY CONTENT. It's too much!

Good game. The Call Of Duty franchise is huge, and I would love to see newer updates for the game. As of now, it is just updates for new skins and operators and events and new modes, but there are no major updates on the effects of the environment or having no limits to how many attachments that can be put onto the weapon the limit is 5 attachments. Zombies has a glitch where once you revive, the player can move but the zombies are attacking you where you spawn as if you were just standing there

I look at it this way. If a game results in me spending a significant amount of hours on it, it's at least worthy of 3 stars. If a game is engaging enough to compel me to actually spend money for in game items, it's a 5 star game. Because ultimately that's their goal. Like it or hate it, CoD is pretty much the gold standard as far as how games should be optimized and operate, with it being free to play, having the best controller support there is on mobile, and no ads. no less than 5â˜†.

since the most recent update there has been a ms/ping bug for the game going around. My standard ms/ping is usually 45-55. Not great but ok. The bug is causing mine to shoot up to 85-95 min. During games making it drastically harder to game. I know I'm not the only one either. Sometimes I've fixed it by closing down the game, or turning off the tablet & wifi. Or logging in and out of the game. But it seems to be getting worse and staying more often and my internet is fine.

By far one of the most addictive games I've played so far. also its graphics and customizationis amazing. but it does take time to get in a match and hackers literally make it less fun and more frustrating. so overall this game rage baits me, makes me crash out but it's engaging and helps me to connect with my friends who don't have social media to communicate

Great game, awesome gameplay, is a bit more sensitive to internet connection than say pubg but still good and not often lag, 1 issue though that I'm sure plenty peaple might have, the zombies, it's very limiting and short, now I'm sure if you can make a battle royal as expansive as you do you should be able to improve the zombies in the future right? Like endless until everyone dies, multiple areas, not a couple rounds then boss then end, very disappointing to be honest, but other than that Ace!

As far as mobile shooters go, this is one of the best. I actually prefer it to the modern games on PC, my only complaint is that the Zombies mode leaves a lot to be desired. I'd love to see some of the classic maps, such as Der Riese and Kino Der Toten added with the round-based system. Otherwise, as far as the multiplayer and warzone modes go, it's pretty good.

"One of the best games I've ever played, but the constant updates are a huge problem. I absolutely love Call of Duty Mobileâ€”it's thrilling, engaging, and keeps me coming back for more. However, thereâ€™s one major issue that keeps bothering me: the frequent updates. It feels like every month there's a new update, and just when you think you've downloaded everything, all your progress, including maps and other game data, gets wiped. As a result, I have to redownload everything again,fix this.

The game is becoming "pay-to-win." As a player in a country with a low currency, the price of CP is too high. It's impossible for me to get new items without spending a huge amount of my real-life money. On top of that, some of the paid weapon skins have better sights than the regular guns, which gives a big advantage to players who can afford them. It's frustrating to see the game prioritize profits over a fair experience, especially when the cost of playing is so unfair for a lot of us.

I've played this nearly every day since I first started playing the game back in 2019, & I have had no issues until the latest season update. I can play the game no problem, but I am missing quite a few of the main sound effects, including the countdown into the matches, so I sometimes miss the start which isn't always a good thing. So if anyone who actually makes the game reads this, any chance you can sort this issue, because as it stands the game for me is more about watching the clock.

First off, I've been playing this for over a year, and It's what you'd expect from COD. Except. Any downloads are a nightmare to complete as they hang multiple times, and you have to force stop and restart the phone. The hacks and cheaters are getting out of control, and of course, COD isn't doing anything about it. And finally, when using auto shoot, you can not fire through smoke. This is why I've rated this game 3 stars now where it was once a 5. I'm very disappointed in the games failures.

We don't like to redownload the same item again and again after updateðŸ™„, even a small update (not seasonal) can reset your all downloads. But that's the deal with clearing all my guns, characters skin. It's a huge game for mobile and all the players don't have wifi and it also takes so much time to download. And adding a new gun doesn't make the game cool. Add attachment, remake the maps like it's newest PC version, add realistic driving features. ðŸ«¡

Amazing game! Smooth gameplay, great graphics, and always fun to play. One small suggestion though: it would be great if there was an option to make your profile private, so others canâ€™t view it if you donâ€™t want them to. Also, a feature to fully block someone so your name doesnâ€™t even appear in their searches would make the experience even better. Keep up the great work!

In my opinion, I have been playing Call of Duty Mobile for 4 years and it is one of the best mobile FPS games out there. The graphics are sharp, the gameplay is smooth, and it offers both battle royale and classic multiplayer modes. The controls are customizable, and thereâ€™s always new content to keep it exciting. Perfect for quick matches or long gaming sessions.

This might as well be one of the best mobile games in the market: it isn't "pay-to-win" per se, but it won't force you to sit through boatloads of ads. It's highly competitive and makes you want to improve your survival instincts. Recently though, when I open the game, the characters and the backgrounds disappear, leaving me in a black void, but the HUD works just fine. If I close the game & open it for the second time, it works. I don't know how this bug shows up but I'd love if it were fixed.

The graphics in this game are very smooth and impressive. The characters are extremely awesome. Have an enjoyable game of multiplayer. Battlegrounds is undoubtedly amazing. Various types of equipment and guns have been seen by me in the game. The majority of what we know is that Call of Duty is one of the best battlegrounds worldwide. To conclude my thoughts, the game is truly awesome, amazing, smooth, and bluer, but it can be challenging for newbies, JK. I suggest giving this game a try once.

Waiting period is too long. More waiting time than playing time. When in match on Battle Royale, every time an enemy is near my game suddenly starts lagging. Myself and couple friends of mine have the same issues on their CODM. Some times we wait 60 second , then another 60 seconds and another and most of the time it just says unable to find opponent. The waiting makes me not want to play as it's wasting many minute of my time.

The game is awesome but it still has it's flaws, like when I open it sometimes it doesn't even open at all, it just keeps showing validating game settings and says I should check my internet connection, and when I open another app(like YouTube) my internet is working fine, please if this can be fixed I would so much appreciate it. It's been happening a little more often recently. Nonetheless, it's one of the best FPS games I have ever played.

title: Educate - Online Classroom App
description:
Educate App is an Online Classroom App designed to empower teachers and students worldwide. Whether you're looking to learn a new skill or enhance your knowledge in various subjects, Educate provides a platform for connecting with experienced and qualified tutors.

With Educate, you can choose from various subjects and courses, including English, Science, Maths, Physics, GRE, GMAT, Coding, Aptitude, Entrepreneurship, Placement Preparation, Language Learning, Music, Sports, and many more. Our app brings together a global community of teachers and learners, ensuring that you find the right match for your educational needs.

The app offers a comprehensive set of features to enhance your learning experience:

ðŸŽ¦ Live Classes: Engage in real-time interactive classes with teachers from around the world. Experience seamless virtual learning with just a click of a button.

ðŸ“ Live Whiteboard: Collaborate and learn together using the Live Whiteboard feature. Teachers can share their screens and illustrate concepts in real time, fostering an engaging and immersive learning environment.

ðŸŽ¥ Live Recording: Never miss a class! With the Live Recording feature, all your live sessions are automatically recorded and made available for playback. 

ðŸ’¯ Create Tests: Instantly create tests and quizzes to assess your knowledge and track your progress. 

ðŸ’¬ Chat with Teachers: Connect with your teachers through the chat feature. Clarify doubts, and receive announcements.

ðŸ§‘â€ðŸ« Personalized Learning: Customize your learning journey by joining specific batches tailored to your needs. Interact with your classmates, engage in group discussions, and attend online classes together.

ðŸ“š Assignment Management: Complete tests, assignments, and submit notes effortlessly. Stay organised and access study materials conveniently within the app.

Educate offers numerous benefits that make it the go-to platform for both teachers and students:

âœ”ï¸ User-Friendly: Our app is designed to be intuitive and easy to navigate, ensuring a smooth learning experience. Setting up your virtual classroom is quick and hassle-free.
âœ”ï¸ Secure and Private: At Educate, we prioritize your data security and privacy. Your personal information and student data are strictly confidential and never used for advertisements.
âœ”ï¸ Time-Saving: Streamline your educational processes with Educate. Manage your classrooms, conduct live classes and tests, send reminders, and automate attendance tracking. Spend more time focusing on teaching and learning.
âœ”ï¸ Enhanced Organization: Keep track of your assignments, study materials, and progress within the app. Access all your educational resources in one place for effortless learning.
âœ”ï¸ Seamless Communication: Connect with teachers through video tools, participate in doubt sessions, and chat with fellow students. Enjoy easy and effective communication channels.
âœ”ï¸ Resource Sharing: Share study modules, references, curated online content, video links, and more with teachers and students. Collaborate and enhance your learning experience together.
âœ”ï¸ MCQ Creation: Create multiple-choice questions in seconds, schedule them, and set marking schemes as per your requirements. Efficiently assess and evaluate your knowledge.

Whether you're a teacher seeking new students or a student looking for a qualified tutor, Educate has you covered. Teachers can create profiles showcasing their qualifications, teaching experience, and subject expertise to attract potential students. Students can explore and connect with qualified tutors from different parts of the world.

Experience the power of online education with Educate. Discover endless learning possibilities, interact with dedicated teachers, and expand your knowledge horizon. Download the Educate App today and embark on an exciting educational journey from anywhere in the world.

title: GetYourGuide: Travel & Tickets
description:
Download the GetYourGuide app to discover and book unforgettable travel experiences anywhere in the world

Whether you're planning a vacation or looking for last-minute things to do in any destination, we make booking tours, day trips, and activities easier than ever. Choose from culture, food, adventure, nature, and more experiences.

Maximize your trip with exclusive access to the world's top attractions and museums, find the highlights and hidden gems, and keep up with last-minute travel deals using the app â€” we make travel planning easy, and making memories easier.

Find over 100,000 experiences 

Booking tickets for unmissable sights has never been easier â€” experience the Colosseum, Eiffel Tower, London Eye, TV Tower, Sagrada Familia, and more.

Discover expert-guided tours â€” explore unforgettable travel highlights in Paris, Dubai, London, Florence, New York City, Berlin, Vienna, New Orleans, Cancun, Tuscany, Lisbon, and more. Our app will be your city guide for destinations around the world, and our local experts help you get fully immersed.

Travel with flexibility

Reserve now, pay later â€” save your place for popular experiences early and make your payment at a later date.
Instant confirmation â€” whether you're booking tours in advance or need last-minute tickets, receive your tickets and booking confirmation instantly.
Offline tickets â€” Conveniently access your booking information offline. Download, store, and present your tickets on your mobile device

Book with confidence

24/7 customer service â€” Easily find help when you have questions. We offer customer service by email, phone, and WhatsApp across multiple languages.
Flexible cancellation â€” Donâ€™t stress if your plans change. We offer free cancellation up to 24 hours before your activity for most bookings.

With tours and activities for any interest, you can plan your trips your way. Dive into nature and explore fjords in Norway, try local cuisine across Europe, or uncover fascinating history in the United States.

Whether you're living the magic of the wizarding world on a Harry Potter experience, savoring delicious culinary delights on a food tour of Barcelona, booking top rated tours to see the Vatican, or following a city guide through Berlin, we guarantee youâ€™ll find something unforgettable to do â€” make the most of your travel and leisure time.

Uncover the top tourist activities in the world's bucket-list destinations:
Book museum tours and tickets in Rome, food trips through Naples, trekking in Iceland, river cruises around Prague, outdoor adventures in Bali, sightseeing in Budapest, and more.

Use the app as a travel planner or for travel guidance, then book travel experiences for the world's must-see highlights with excursions and last-minute tickets.

Tell us how weâ€™re doing
Leave us a review if youâ€™re enjoying your GetYourGuide app experience or head over to our help page for further assistance: www.getyourguide.com/
