Book museum tours and tickets in Rome, food trips through Naples, trekking in Iceland, river cruises around Prague, outdoor adventures in Bali, sightseeing in Budapest, and more.

Use the app as a travel planner or for travel guidance, then book travel experiences for the world's must-see highlights with excursions and last-minute tickets.

Tell us how weâ€™re doing
Leave us a review if youâ€™re enjoying your GetYourGuide app experience or head over to our help page for further assistance: www.getyourguide.com/
summary: A travel app to discover and book tickets, tours, and things to do on your trip.

scraped_reviews.content: it takes forever for the site to load everything, that I no longer use it. I have gone through a 3 week trip this year with not using get your guide, as opposed to the last few trips when it was nothing but the app. you are unable to log into the site, and it takes more than 5 minutes to actually see the activities you are trying to see when pressed. It's a shame..... viator and other sites are more responsive, quicker, and sometimes less expensive.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Vanessa, we're sorry to hear about your experience with our app. Please send us all the details, if possible also screenshots, at social.support@getyourguide.com from the same email address you used to register or to book your activity. Also mention your name on this review and we'll look into it asap. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: This is a horrible way to book experiences. If you try to book something the same day you get a count down to make your purchase, making you fee rushed to grab the deal before it is gone. Then, once booked, you can't cancel. You are only able to cancel 24 before events, but that doesn't help if you book that day, or if something unexpected happens. Even when things go well, there is a layer of confusion between you and the venue. Horrible experience.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Sean, we're sorry you were not satisfied with our services. If you have any questions, please send us an email with more details and a reference to this review at social.support@getyourguide.com, and we'll follow up with you as soon as possible. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: Lots of great tours to discover on this app. I found it better than Viator. Sometimes the tour operators don't give enough info on details like where to park for meeting place, especially the ones departing from ports in Italy. it was stressful & time consuming trying to find parking in a very limited and restricted parking area, and I almost missed my tour. Getyourguide should have more oversight on this, and reading some reviews, on the accuracy of description of the tours.

It looks like there's lots of choices for fun things to do, but one huge issue is that after I spent time finding all the things my friends and I might like to do on our trip, there's no way to share my favorites with them so we can decide together. They are all not going to download the app and spend hours sorting through excursions. Major drawback for me.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your feedback, Colleen. Please send us more details, at social.support@getyourguide.com to help us understand what happened and to work on a solution for you. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: Great app. The filters work really well, enabling me to find the tour that fits my preferences. One critique is the badges. The app keeps a badge on, even after I've "read" all my notifications, completed, and reviewed my tour. It makes me want to turn off badges on the app altogether, but I dont want to miss an alert...

Fantastic app with an outstanding customer experience. The UX is brilliant: I was able to book an experience directly from my phone while on the train, quickly and effortlessly. All major payment options are available (PayPal, credit card, etc.), and there are also opportunities to get discounted prices, which is a nice bonus. Customer service is equally impressive. I had to cancel after the 24-hour window, but with a medical certificate I was still refunded without hassle. Very happy customer.

The services offered are chaotic but effective, but PLEASE ensure that you have booked the correct thing because they don't give refunds, and the bookings can be very unclear. If you've booked FROM the airport instead of booking TO the airport, you're not going! And they're not going to help either. Although I had initially given a 5* review, the fiasco experienced on the route back totally ruined the whole experience for me. Not sure I'd use them again as a result. There are alternatives
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we'd like to understand what happened and help you sort it out. Please send us all the details at social.support@getyourguide.com from the email you used to register or to book the activity. Make sure to also include a reference to this review, and weâ€™ll get back to you as soon as possible. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: The GetYourGuide App was brilliant on a 3 day trip to Rome. It allowed us to book all the tickets and tours we needed, and keep them all in one place. It's also great for browsing different options, and you can search by date which was very handy. It made our trip so much easier and more organised. Would definitely recommend and will use again.

This platform has been a huge reason for the fun we've had in Rome so far. I didn't book anything ahead since I wanted to remain flexible but I knew what I wanted my wife and I to do at some point during our week I was able to search up so many activities and tours and check availability right away. Booking was super easy and all the hosts on this platform I've interacted with have had excellent communication. Wonderful tool to plan and execute your trip anywhere

Fantastic App with an outstanding experience. The UX is brilliant. I was able to book an experience directly from my phone while on the train quickly and effortlessly . All major payment options are available , and there are also opportunities to get disconnected prices which is a nice bonus. Customer service is equally impressive . I had to cancel after the 24 hour window, but with a medical certificate I was still refunded without hassle . Very happy customer.

No idea what's happened to this app but we have made 4 bookings on it from 2 phones and only 1 trip has been booked. They will be refunding us of course but that takes 5 days and we are out of pocket Â£390 until that refund goes through. So are you just going broke and need our money to invest or has your app just turned to dog poop? Very angry and will never be using your app again....
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Phil, thanks for your feedback. We're sorry you had such a situation. If you have any questions about your refund, please send us a reference to this review at social.support@getyourguide.com from the email address associated with your booking, and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

scraped_reviews.content: Fantastic app with an outstanding customer experience. The UX is brilliant: I was able to book an experience directly from my phone while on the train, quickly and effortlessly. All major payment options are available (PayPal, credit card, etc.), and there are also opportunities to get discounted prices, which is a nice bonus. Customer service is equally impressive. I had to cancel after the 24-hour window, but with a medical certificate I was still refunded without hassle. Very happy customer!

I've booked various activities such as sightseeing tours, boat rides, museums, and day trips, all with trustworthy people and providers. I have booked in Krakow, Zadar in Croatia, and Budapest so far. It is a bit more costly than booking directly, but with the cancellation policy and the guarantee of booking in advance, I prefer to have the assurance that I can raise any issues and not worry about a lack of available spaces.

I had a discount from a friend and due to a 'technical error' on GYG's side I ended up having to cancel the experience I booked and pay the full price on the day so it cost â‚¬20 more. Not a good experience, especially seeing as I could have bought tickets in advance from the website without using this app, which still would've been cheaper than what I ended up paying.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, thanks for your review. We're sorry to hear that you're not happy with our prices. Please send us your booking details at social.support@getyourguide.com from the same email address you used to make the booking, also mentioning your name on this review and we'll get back to you shortly.

scraped_reviews.content: I've travelled to around 50 countries over the past few decades and this is by far the most useful tool I've found. I've just used it in Vietnam - from booking taxis and tours big and small (2 hour food tour to overnight cruise) - takes seconds, you pay in your currency, communicate in your language and get a Whatsapp direct from the provider in a few mins. No more overpriced concierge trips!

I've booked tickets using this app twice whilst in Portugal. Both times it states in the email that my tickets are booked for the requested time, but both times the ticket has had a later time. The first ticket was booked for 09:30, and after queuing for 45 minutes we were informed the ticket itself, in very small writing, was 11:30. We therefore had to hang around for two hours then stand in another 45 minute queue. Check your tickets carefully if you use this app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Gillian, thanks for your review. Weâ€™re sorry your experience didn't turn out as you expected. Please send us your booking details at social.support@getyourguide.com from the email you used to book the activity. Make sure to mention this review and weâ€™ll get back to you as quickly as possible.

scraped_reviews.content: first time to use this system to book. Provider was late to pickup and then when I rang him he hanged up the phone to say he will be late and it's because I booked late at night..this should not matter. when Involving their chat support the provider then decieded to cancel with a "cover" excuse. Obviously their tour providers are not reliable and this has caused chaos to our short holiday plans. Service cannot be relied upon. refund is still pending but this does not help with a ruined trip
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Alex, thanks for your feedback. We're sorry your activity was cancelled. Please send us all the details at social.support@getyourguide.com from the email you used to register or to book the activity, and mention to this review. Weâ€™ll get back to you as soon as possible. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: Every Get Your Guide tour I've been on was great. I booked 5 have been on 4. Guides were great. I wish I had know the size limits for purses at Borghese. I considered my small travel purse acceptable size, but I had to check it. That caused me anxiety. A few operational hiccups. one nicely resolved, one waiting for resolution. The app makes everything very easy.

I love this app. Recently I saw many adds about it so when I traveled to London, I decided to give it a try! I love the variety of experiences, the booking process and payments were easy and I immediately got the information about the tour. Plus I booked the tour 45 minutes prior to it starting, so I love that there was availability! I highly recommend it!

I was very happy to find how easy it is to make reservations and have enough time to pay later days before arrival. Amazing customer service as well, they are there right away to answer any quieres and in my case i have reservations and made some changes and it is very straightforward. I highly recommend this app to travellers with easy booking for transport to and from airports and with a minimal price compared to other form of transportation.

Do not book with them ever! I booked an activity for the same day of my arrival to Toronto, few hours later my flight was very much delayed and we wouldn't be able to make it. Even after explaining the situation, I was not offered a refund because they have a strict "24 hours before cancelation". How can you know whether your flight will be delayed with 24 in advance? This is very unfriendly. There are better options for booking entertainment activities.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Claudia, we're sorry to hear you were not satisfied with our policies. If you have any questions, please send us an email with your booking details and a reference to this review at social.support@getyourguide.com from the same email address you used to book the activity. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: they gave me instructions before booking a trip. then when i checked later could not give me an answer. and could not transfer my booking. it waw against policy to help a customer this way even though ot was their fault. their solution cancel and eventuamly get a refund and then book a new trip. great service if you dont like a customer focussed service
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Roy, we'd like to understand what happened and help you sort it out. Please send us all the details at social.support@getyourguide.com from the email you used to register or to book the activity. Make sure to also include a reference to this review, and weâ€™ll get back to you as soon as possible. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: What a fantastic trip, suitable for all athletic abilities. We had the option for e-bikes or regular bikes. Conor, our guide was knowledgeable, enthusiastic and kept the pace just right. We saw a great deal of the city in a safe, easy way. He kept us on bike paths the entire time allowing for stops at a distillery for a free tasting, the transportation museum, the university and West End as well. We could not have had a better time!

We typically don't do tours as we like to explore on our own. While in Turkey & Romania, we used Get Your Guide 3 times for all day trips. All of our guides were friendly, knowledgeable, & added a bonus spot as time permitted. We would definitely use this tour company again.

Nice app, but still needs to be improved. There is sometimes lack of information, or not clear information. Sometimes, it feels like this agency uses people to test the activity from the new provider instead of provide already checked and good expirience. This is not common, but happens. Communication and services have to be better, they should be more customer focused.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your feedback, Helen. Please send us more details, if possible, also screenshots, at social.support@getyourguide.com to help us understand what happened. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: I booked the theatre and a boat trip while in Tenerife. The app is extremely easy to use. All tickets remain on the app together with an email of confirmation. There was also an option to upload to your wallet. We will definitely use it when visiting other countries.

The app impressed me at first but then I tried to book more things while on vacation. There is no mode to only work in desktop, it consistently opens the app. Because of this I wasn't able to apply a 10% areoplan discount. Had to delete the app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. We appreciate your feedback. Please send us more details, if possible also screenshots, at social.support@getyourguide.com to help us understand what happened. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: App is fine except that it only gives you a half hr to figure out the logistics of your bookings. So, if one books a lot of tours, that could be troublesome. You have to re-add your tours if it's not finalized within the half hr.

They cannot be trusted. I found some really nice tours trough their website, but their commission is insane! It is best to book the actual guides/operators directly. Once, I even paid a premium of 50USD in order to be able to jave the option of a refund in case of a cancellation; they never paid back the full refund and totally scammed me. Their customer support line just says sorry, and ignores you. I will never use their service again. Tripadvisor offers so many better options, better prices
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Kevin, we're sorry to hear that you're not happy with our prices. Please send us your booking details at social.support@getyourguide.com from the same email address you used to make the booking, also mentioning this review and we'll get back to you with a solution shortly.

scraped_reviews.content: Non responsive and robotic response. For any query they told to meet the local suppliers and leave everything at your own. No after sales support for any query. Why we are using your apps if you can't help??? Whenever I'm trying to book any activity it's showing some problem while booking. This is disgusting. Poor app performance and the representative is also telling me the same after chekcing everything and can't say even why it's happening. if you can't handle your own app then who will ?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We're really sorry to hear that. Pur customer service is available 24/7 to help you in: www.getyourguide.com/contact . Additionally you can send us an email with the details of your booking and mentioning the user name you used in your review to: social.support@getyourguide.com and we'll be happy to take a look at your case. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: The pick up was very good and timely, and the communication about the transport very good. Our guide Arber was very nice, gave lots of information about Albanian culture and people,and he managed the group very friendly and professionally. During the hike he waited for everyone and made several breaks, so that everyone could keep up with the group, and answered all questions we had. The restaurant fir lunch had very simple but local food which was very nice and surprisingly low price.

We did three tours with this company and all were very good. Unfortunately unable to write individual reviews on all as given limited time to do so and didn't have roaming or WiFi until arriving back in UK today. The app is perfect for being able to access when offline too.

Get your guide will prioritise your money over your safety. Once paid, they will book you on any tour operators without checking if they are safe or reputable. We were booked on a fast-cruise which only last month capsised, killing 3 people, directly because of the captain and crews incompetence. We cancelled before boarding, and get-your-guide refused to help, refund or change their practices. DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your review, Paul. We'd like to look into what happened and work on a solution for you. Please send us all the details at social.support@getyourguide.com from the same email address you used to make your booking. Make sure to also mention this review and we'll get back to you asap.

scraped_reviews.content: I used this app to book 3 tours in Delhi for our recent trip in Northern India. Had to cancel one of them 2 days prior and the refund process was super easy. The first tour we took went very smoothly with provider communications coming within a day of making the tour booking. For the other activity, I had to reach out as no coms within 24hrs of tour but that was resolved quickly by provider & Get Your Guide app follow through. Both tours went very smoothly. Highly recommend Get Your Guide!

UX a bit problematic: Text box obscured by keyboard when writing detailed reviews, doesn't extend downward, type blind or keep it short. Tried changing app ratio, diff devices and screen size to no avail. Email overkill: Been getting up to 4 emails for each tour I've booked - from provider as well as GYG with the exact same content as found in booking confirmation. Reviews only possible through the app, not the web site.

The app sent me to the wrong pick up point and I missed my day tour to a beach I was very excited to visit. The customer service rep wasn't able to refund me and it ruined my last day in greece. I highly recommend booking your tour through the tour company itself because the app and the tour company emails will send you to different locations.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, thanks for your review. Weâ€™re sorry your experience didn't turn out as you expected. Please send us your booking details at social.support@getyourguide.com from the email you used to book the activity. Make sure to mention this review and weâ€™ll get back to you as quickly as possible.

scraped_reviews.content: This made booking things easy. Definetly try to do it in advanced. You can book things last minute but the company might find it challenging organising a guide. I was lucky and ended up getting personal tours.

I absolutely love this app, we have had so many nice experiences in various countries! so far, guides have been polite, knowledgeable and considerate. tours are so well organised and at a reasonable price. have used app in Greece, Spain, Portugal, UK and san Fran

been using this app for a while now. very good. we used it in Vietnam, Bali, Guatemala, Costa Rica and Mexico. all our guides or transportation had been excellent and prices were good. It would be nice to have a record of the reviews I have done. Sometimes I spend a long time writing a review and then with the wrong finger, it just disappeared. and I wasn't sure if the review had been submitted or not.

I almost always use this app. It's always worth researching different experiences first but I often find they have great excursions that are the same or better than other providers, at the same or better prices, and the excursions are always trustworthy with clear instructions.

This app is amazing for planning my travel experiences. I find the details within the app especially beneficial. The tour companies always respond in a timely manner for such things as reminders of the upcoming event updates, contact details, or answers to questions. They also allow for reviews on the app as well as with tour operators. I highly recommend it!

This was one of the best things we did while in Branson. The beauty and the way they let you set your own pace on the tour was fantastic. This is a must see while on your vacation. Not to mention after the golf cart ride, The museum was second to none. one of the best I have been on in some time. Give them a try you won't regret it.

Used the app for a dinner boat in Chicago, IL I was sent a confirmation in my email that my payment was confirmed. I traveled from Tennessee to Chicago IL only to find out my tickets were not counted, so I was not able to board the dinner boat. I called and spoke with Wendy who told me I could board the boat at another time at which she confirmed with Supervisor Pedro who was on site at City Experiences Navy Pier, that I would board the 8:00 pm which never happened by email for a later time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Bridgette, we're sorry you feel this way. We'd like to understand what happened. Please send us all the details at social.support@getyourguide.com, also mentioning this review and we'll get back to you shortly. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: Easy to use, simple booking procedure, we were a little apprehensive as to who to meet as the area was busy with lots of boat trips but we asked and were helped. An extra star for a photo of the boat/ and or staff!

We were slightly late (15 mins) to pick up walking audio equipment for our tour of the Forum and Colluseum. I was told the only option was a walking guided tour 45 mins later at an extra 45 euros. the American family turned up 40 mins late but that was fine we had to wait for them. when I asked for a refund of the 45 euros because we were not given an option and told we were late, they refuse to answer emails. very poor service. would never use them again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Claire, we're sorry to hear about your experience. To make things right, please send us your booking details at social.support@getyourguide.com from the same email address you used to book the activity. Make sure to also mention this review and we'll make up for it. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: Fantastic excursion. Efficient pickup (even though I realised we could have walked along the seafront from Sunrise Beach Hotel). Boat was nice and clean, really friendly staff. Well organised and safety conscious. Good value for money. Lovely lunch. saw 2 turtles which was a bonus. Thoroughly enjoyed. would definitely do again.

Really good tour. Our host was great (Marc). Luckily the rain held off right until the end of the tour, got drenched in the last 5 minutes. Very informative and interesting and a great way to see the city. Bikes were good fun. I would definitely do another e-bike tour, only one negative is that it was maybe a tiny bit pricey, but overall it was excellent.

Mario was a brilliant guide!! He kept in touch messaging the night before and in the morning. He was very knowledgeable and helpful. The weather was rubbish, it rained all day but he still took us to the places and drove safely. I feel like we had adequate time to see everything and it didnt feel rushed. We even stopped for some lunch. I would 100% recommend this trip. Definitely worth the money. Bargain

Edit: after contacting CS again they were able to resolve the issue and refund the money. 0 customer support. made a last minute booking but it was not possible to arrive at the starting point in time. it should not be possible to book things in these cases. not returnable and a waste of time and money
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Fabian, weâ€™re sorry to hear about your experience. Please send us your booking details at social.support@getyourguide.com from the email you used to book the activity. Make sure to also include a reference to this review and weâ€™ll get back to you as soon as possible.

scraped_reviews.content: First time traveling to Barcelona. GetYourGuide app is user friendly and has clear info of the place you want to go, such as address, pin on map, meeting point, pictures. Cancellation, changes, payment are easy. so the app is great, and I am looking forward to post another review on the actual guides after my trip!

title: Canon Camera Connect
description:
Canon Camera Connect is an application to transfer images shot with compatible Canon cameras to smartphone/tablet.  

By connecting to a camera with Wi-Fi (direct connection or via wireless router), this application provides the following features:
ãƒ»Transfer and save camera images to a smartphone.
ãƒ»Remote shoot with live view imaging of the camera from a smartphone.
ãƒ»Connect with Canon's various services.

This application also provides the following features for compatible cameras.
ãƒ»Acquire location information from a smartphone and add it to the images on the camera.
ãƒ»Switch to a Wi-Fi connection from pairing status with a Bluetooth enabled camera (or from touch operation with an NFC enabled camera) 
ãƒ»Remote release of the camera shutter with a Bluetooth connection.
ãƒ»Transfer the latest firmware.

*For compatible models and features, please refer to the following website.
 
https://ssw.imaging-saas.canon/app/app.html?app=cc


-System requirement
ãƒ»Android 12/13/14/15/16

-Bluetooth System Requirement
For Bluetooth connection, the camera needs to have a Bluetooth function, and your Android device needs to have Bluetooth 4.0 or later (supports Bluetooth Low energy technology) and the OS needs to be Android 5.0 or later.

-Supported Languages
Japanese/English/French/Italian/German/Spanish/Simplified Chinese/Russian/Korean/Turkish

-Compatible File Types
JPEGã€MP4ã€MOV
ãƒ»Importing original RAW files is not supported (RAW files are resized to JPEG).
ãƒ»MOV files and 8K movie files shot with EOS cameras cannot be saved.
ãƒ»HEIF (10 bit) and RAW movie files shot with compatible cameras cannot be saved.
ãƒ»AVCHD files shot with Camcorder cannot be saved.

-Important Notes
ãƒ»If application does not operate properly, try again after shutting down the application.
ãƒ»This application is not guaranteed to operate on all Android devices.
ãƒ»In the case of using Power Zoom Adapter, please set the Live View function to ON.
ãƒ»If the OS network confirmation dialogue appears when connecting the device to the camera, please place a checkmark in the checkbox to make the same connection from the next time.
ãƒ»The images may include your personal information such as GPS data. Be careful when posting images online where many others can view them.

ãƒ»Visit your local Canon Web pages for more details.
