summary: Use images from your Canon camera via Wi-Fi

scraped_reviews.content: Often a great app. Every now and then (including last few weeks) it won't let me connect my camera. I've watched video after video to try to fix it. Nothing. Trying deleting it and downloading it back. For It not to work. Tried even connecting through a hotspot instead AND IT STILL DIDN'T WORK! At first this was happening so rarely that it didn't matter. Now this problem keeps reoccurring and as someone who takes photography seriously I can't deal. Used to love this app but it has such a problem

While this requires a Bluetooth or Wi-Fi connection to a compatible Canon camera(I use the Canon EOS R50), it makes for a convenient way to transfer photos and videos from my camera to my phone. My one complaint is that videos can take a while to transfer. In that case, USB file transfer(with at least a 10 Gbps USB C cable) to a PC then to my phone may be faster. Even still, that's a minor complaint since the videos are fairly large files.

As someone who loves photography, Canon Connect has made my life so much easier. Transferring and sharing images across all my devices takes only a few clicks, and itâ€™s far more convenient than juggling SD cards every time I want to review or edit photos. The app feels intuitive, reliable, and seamlessly supports my creative process. If you want smoother organization and instant access to your shots, this app is a must.

Will not connect to Wi-Fi to transfer photos. I have a Canon R8 and Pixel 9 Pro and the latest OS on the phone and camera. it will connect via Bluetooth, but needs to switch to Wi-Fi to transfer photos and will not connect. this used to work a few versions ago. It seems like Canon could care less. I would have rated it a zero, if I could have. Very frustrating!

Awful. When needed, I have used this ap.in the past on other devices with the same camera, have had minimal issues. New phone...fails to connect and I have to keep registering my camera over and over. Loop between no connect and register the device and the manual instructing to do what I've already done. Wasted time...no thanks. Uninstalled after multiple attempts to make it work. I'll go back to my tether to computer set up-stable and I can count on it working.

Won't open without logging in, and won't send me an email to reset password. Previous time I tried using it was last year, and it wouldn't connect to the camera. It's just a terribly erratic app that only occasionally works. Not getting a reset password email after requesting several times in the app, I went to the regular website and requested it, got the email, reset password. Yay! App still says password is wrong. Clearly, app just can't log in, yet requires login to function. Brilliant.

Suddenly being forced to register with a Canon account, made what should've been a quick remote shoot an incredibly frustrating and time consuming experience. Basic features aren't reliable either. Camera connection gets dropped as soon as the app is backgrounded or the phone is locked. Super annoying and not what I expect from Canon and my professional grade camera!

Used to be an okay, if clunky, way to pull photos from your camera. I made the mistake of updating the app and now it requires a Canon ID sign-in. What happens if you don't have an account and don't have service because you've been filming a camping video and want to pull your files? Too bad, Canon has "improved" your experience again. Thanks a lot, guys.

Was a great app, with very easy to use Bluetooth functionality to the camera. All of that changed when Canon now forcefully requires an account to do *local* functions to the camera, no way to skip the sign in and run it without an account You also need Chrome installed to even access the sign in, making the app fully unusable if you can't open it like that. I appreciate all the apps functionality, but I'll be staying on a downgraded version to actually be able to use it at all.

Signing in is now required for use - there is absolutely NO need for this. It had me unable to get images off my camera, even though I had done before, since I was in a remote location. This is a "feature" that serves(?) Canon, not the user. Update 1: Now sign in fails even though I DO have mob internet access. Update: I uninstalled the app and reinstalled - now it doesn't ask for sign in but hangs on connecting to the camera. After rebooting, it connected once, then lost the cxn and now fails.

Error saying "Camera Connect not connecting" frequently shows with both of my Android devices (Pixel 9 Pro XL and Pixel 4 XL) every 5 seconds after selecting 'wait'. Despite that error, my phones are still connected with no issue and when I select 'wait' from that pop-up window, I can still continue to navigate in the app. When I'm transferring photos from the camera to my phone it would still transfer despite that pop-up window blocking.

Well, this used to be a nice and useful app. Now it requires a sign in with a Canon account before one can even open the app. I don't particularly want my experience enhanced, I just want to connect to my camera locally via Bluetooth and Wi-Fi. The 3.1.20.57 APK still works, though, of course, one has to go to some effort then to keep the play store from updating it to the new broken version.

Seriously flawed. To connect to the camera using Bluetooth, you have to be able to connect to a wi-fi network? How is that helpful in most situations that I would want to use my smartphone to take a photo? Even then, it works sometimes...connect, take a shot, reconnect...repeat. when it works, it's awesome, but I'm afraid the connection issues will make me miss shots. Going with a simple remote instead.

the new export feature in combination with image. Canon is very badly integrated. instead of launching the app, it launches the play store and then you have to launch the app manually. if you do it right, it opens the app or if it's not installed it prompts you to install it. also connection with camera is bad. have to do it manually instead of the app automatically connecting it. it works once but then you need to force close the app, to reconnect.

I forgo the need of a computer and card reader because I can send photos directly to my phone and edit .jpg images with processing software apps. Just a little tricky to set up in the beginning but once you are able to connect (which REQUIRES your phone's location setting to be ON), you are viewing, selecting, and downloading pictures to your phone from your phone as it is hooked up to the camera, or from the camera itself. You cannot send raw format for some reason. No information is given regarding this massive inconvenience.

The old app worked well. Unlike many of the raters here, I WANT the camera to link to the phone via Bluetooth so that pictures I take have location information in the metadata. (I travel a bit, and sometimes can't remember just where a particular picture was taken). Pairing is the difficult part: you MUST start with the phone and the camera in a "virgin" state. If there is a record on either device of a connection, you must delete it. Then the app will selfishly connect.

4.5 Stars How?!?!!! Used to be wonderful and easy to use! Import at home or in the field wirelessly. Granted it was slow but convenient. Now?! 2024? It's a freaking joke! It doesn't load and customer service if you get a response treats you like your stupid and that there isn't an issue with the app. Don't even bother. Use the old school plug the memory card into a computer/ card reader and import. Agreed with others, other companies are looking better if canon can't help their customers.

I am having the same pairing through Bluetooth issue. I enjoyed that. I could pair it this way and download my pictures wherever I was and all of a sudden it can no longer connect and searches for a " faster Wi-Fi connection". I have tried all the deleting the app and reinstalling, resetting the communications, etc. and cannot get a direct connect through Bluetooth. I used to be very happy with this app but now I'm finding it very frustrating and upsetting.

This app is still a little clunky but, after a little finagling and a firmware update, all the connectivity issues I was having and was about to grind on about on here disappeared. If anyone else has been having issues since this app's recent update, try deleting the stored connection(s) and making a new one. It made all the difference for me! Started with the recommended bluetooth which switched to WiFi for import. Now, I can import RAW via WiFi when I don't have a cable handy!

Good app for remote shooting. Very comprehensive and allows me to import all relavant data to my tablet. I love long shutter, night photography, so it's more convenient than a physical remote trigger. However, it could be more user friendly. Some of the "helpful" menus read like stereo instructions, but as soon as you connect a few times, it becomes a breeze.

It was already bad about connecting to the wifi or even camera. Now.. It's no longer an app you can just open and go. No thanks. Hopefully, this app won't be frustrating to use in the future. For now, with the new sign-in feature to even use it, it just feels like they're saying, "We're jumping on the data bandwagon! Can we have yours?!"

Greatly improved since the first release. Shooting with the phone and importing images to the phone works flawlessly. However, geotagging locations for Canon R5 images is frustrating. There's usually a notification saying "Positioning... " and often "Could not send location information to camera," despite all permissions granted and location turned on on my phone.

The "easy connect guide" literally just ends mid way through connecting your camera. I can connect my phone to the camera but after that the app gives me no other options. It's not the end of the "easy connect" guide, as when I try to exit the guide it tells me I'm not connected to the camera (even though my phone is in fact connected to the cameras wifi). What a piece of trash app.

It's not without its flaws, but this app is really neat for what it does.  Pros:  Connects to camera from your phone or table to review and/or download photos that you've taken before you dump them to your computer.  Connects for remote control of your camera for tripod use. You can change (depending on camera mode) ISO, White Balance, Shutter Speed, Aperature, lighting type, then take pictures remotely, without touching your camera  Cons: Isn't terribly intuitive to connect to the camera from your phone. There should be a tutorial for each camera type on how you do that.  The interface isn't terribly intuitive once you get it open, either. Changing multiple settings can mean backing out of "remote shooting" mode and going back in to get to other settings.  Because it keeps your sensor open and continues to send images to the phone while you're using it as a remote, it burns through the camera's battery *very* quickly.  I'm somewhere between a 3 and a 4 on the app, but when I need it, I'm glad that it's there. I'd really love for some clever 3rd party developer to create a better version of this app. I'd be all over that.

Using with Canon EOS R and Samsung Tab S3. Clients love seeing the images in real time as I take them. It is a little bit of a process to reconnect every time I turn off the camera, but for the most part works pretty well. Biggest complaint is that when an image is maximized, taking up the whole screen, you cannot advance to the next photo that was just taken. You can go backwards and see previous photos, but to see the new one you have to minimize, go back to the grid and select the new photo. This seems like an easy software fix. Come on, Canon software engineers, make it so my client never has to leave full screen view to see incoming photos!

Extremely frustrating and I hate using it. I had the original one that connected easily everytime. It's nice to use once you are connected though. This really makes me think that there are better cameras than Canon. I have the Eos Rebel T6i. The help menu is virtually worthless when trying to connect. Usually, after trying for 30 minutes and a couple dozen attempts, boom, it connects and everything is great. until the next time ðŸ˜¡

The camera connect app used to be an easy way to upload photos from my Powershot S120 to my android smart phone. Now it never works. I cannot set the camera as an access point & the "easy" connection guide just takes me in circles never actually connecting the camera with the phone. If I try to set the camera as an access point, when I try to set my phone to the specified wifi, it is consistently unable to connect. As a result, I am using my beloved camera less and less. It was so easy in the past so long as there was a decent wifi signal. I don't know why they changed everything.

I am not a novice with software, maybe not as good as my kids but I am the guy that most of the family turns to when they have computer issues. I can't get this app to connect to my R5. Horrible experience.  Edit. I finally got the camera connected, took the better part of an afternoon, had to reset wireless connections in the camera and start from scratch....  It should be so much easier.  I am raising my rating from 1 to 3 because remote shooting is nice, installation should be easier.

For Chromebooks, this app ALMOST works, but I've never been able to get it to complete a connection. While I can get the Chromebook to connect to the camera's wifi, the app doesn't get notified, so it never finishes the last step. It would be better if a user could enter the settings instead of having to walk through the user guide setup. I know Chromebooks aren't the intended platform for this, but it would be incredibly useful if they were. Sending 20MP images through my phone seems pointless.

Being able to easily batch-transfer photos from my camera to my phone so that I can then upload them to a family-only album application is incredibly convenient. However, the date stamp on the transferred photos always gets changed for some reason, making it hard to keep my photos arranged by month (not to mention videos, which get their date changed to the date of transfer).

Definitely wish NFC was still an option. It made connecting my phone to camera so quick! I had to spend some time redoing the wifi connection between my phone and camera just now, which wasn't ideal but at least it does the job. User interface is a little aged, but it does what I need it to do, nothing crazy extra. Don't have experience with other camera connection apps so can't compare.

Works but transfering photos is limited in resolution. It's annoying not to be able to transfer the full photo instead of a downsized photo. I like to be able to save my photos directly to my phone for quick sharing or editing without having to go home and use the computer. Using a computer is more of a hassle than this app, which is super easy to use. So pleasw fix the resolution lock and let us send the full files over to our phones please!

No offense, but I shouldn't have to fight to connect to my camera... EVERY SINGLE TIME!! It is literally in the name... "connect", so I should be able to connect. If this wasn't the only app out there I would suggest you find one that was built by people who knew what they were doing. Because this app really doesn't work. Takes me fifteen minutes, uninstalling the app, restarting my phone and fingers crossing and then it only works a quarter of the time. No wonder it is free.

After accepting their terms & conditions, you're asked to register your camera. As soon as you click register, it backs out. I've repeated this process multiple times, I've also closed out of the app and tried again, but no dice. I had un-installed the app as well and re-installed it, accepted their terms & conditions again, and again no dice.

This APP sux. You get what you pay for I have a canon T8i and a Samsung smartphone. The camera will pair to my android phone but that doesn't translate to it pairing to this APP. The APP simply can't see the paired camera. Unpairing from the phone and letting the APP do the pairing? Nope. It just spins and you end up w no connection between the phone and the camera at all. I'd be willing to spend $30 on an APP that has the advertised features, but actually works.

Not all updates are upgrades. Case in point: Canon has made the indefensible decision to now require logging in to a Canon account in order to use this app. Maybe that would be merely annoying if your use case doesn't include trying to use the app in a remote location that doesn't have Internet service, but in my case, Canon tells me my account is locked. The link to reset password doesn't work. The link to contact customer service doesn't work. Broken. Broken. Broken.

I have been using this app pretty much daily for months, and prior to a recent update I'd have given the app 5 stars. Before, you could transfer the original .CR2 file via the app, but now it converts to JPG and I absolutely hate that! I feel like we should be given the option to choose the file size when we begin a transfer. I don't care it the raw files take up more space nor if it takes longer to transfer and uses more battery life. This update has completely changed my workflow. Please fix.

Hoopla, rigamaroll, act of Congress- whatever you want to call it, that's what it takes to get this booger to work. Did fine on my Samsung S7 Edge. Lot of coaxing with the S10+. Uninstalled 3 times, hard to connect, a lot of effort to get it done. Once it finally connected, it worked fine. Pictures transferred with no issue. If you want to jack with it for that long......

I can pair my phone to my camera, for all the good it does me. Despite several troubleshooting attempts, restarts, and reinstalls, I have yet to be able to transfer a single photo to my phone, which was the whole reason I bought this particular camera in the first place. I've been a Nikon user for years, but I thought Canon was worth a try. It's been a very expensive mistake. The app will act like it's going to transfer pics for a second, only to force close. Very disappointed.

Doesn't stay connected to your phone after you've used it once. You have to setup the wifi and password EVERY SINGLE TIME you want to transfer pictures to your phone. If you connect after you setup the wifi a second time, you get "Incorrect wireless LAN encryption key" or something likewise. Total pain to set up every time. Has been a problem for a long time.

Connection process is horrid. You have to basically reuse the "easy" connection guide every time you connect your camera to your phone. It saves your phone/camera info, but that doesn't matter. It won't work unless you delete that info and restart with the barely functioning connection process all over again. Canon has a very long way to go on this app.

Works good as intended. Never had any connection issues. But it's missing the most important and most useful option. Importing RAW files to Android. If iOS version of the app has that feature, then how come Android is missing it? There are so many other features that are available on iOS app, which are missing on Android. Very disappointed on that.

This app is a pile of hot flaming garbage. Actually, that's unfair to garbage. Garbage can be useful. The app is incredibly finicky about connecting to the camera, and even if you do manage to recite the right arcane incantations to get it to recognize the connection, downloading doesn't work (no error or any indication as to why), even after a full reinstall. Hands down the worst app I've ever had the displeasure of trying to use. Using this app makes me want to switch to Nikon.

With the last update (apparently non-sarcastically titled "Canon ID makes products more convenient and enjoyable for you"), the app requires a Canon cloud account, except the app crashes when you attempt to create an account or login, so it's literally unusable. You can't use without a login, and you can't create a login. This is one of the stupidest software updates I've ever seen. Whatever manager at Canon pushed for this needs to be fired immediately.

4/22/24 Can open the app, but afterwards everything crashes. if you don't have a connection to your camera first, and select the Wi-Fi button, the app will force quit. if you skip that and get a connection, you can load your first three images, and then the app will force quit. I am unable to access anything on my camera. pretty upset since it was a photoshoot and can't access a customers photos

I have had the camera since Christmas 2019. I've used this app too many times to count, and I used to love it. Now it won't connect to Bluetooth. It wants me suddenly to register my camera (even though I've used this app). It takes forever to connect and then when I go to import my photos it disconnects me. It also gives me an error that the app has quit. I've deleted and redownloaded the app. Very dissatisfied. Don't waste your time on this one

Use the app a lot when it works before the Android update. I was able to take pictures at clubs and send them right to people faster than other photographers. But that's over. Why it's taking 10 and so long to find the fix is unknown. They raised their price on all their equipment but you can't get it to work with the phone like it used to.

Works fine, won't reconnect. I can connect to the camera once then have to start from scratch. Phone and camera say they are connected but app won't work unless I delete camera settings and start over. Very poorly written app. Looking at all the reviews that agree with this and how long this has gone unanswered and unresolved. For me this is just more evidence of the poor customer service I've learned to expect from Canon. At least I don't buy their overpriced lenses anymore.

I have a G7X mark ii and it is really nice to have remote monitoring and shooting through the phone, but there are too many limitations to the app. Primarily, you cannot shoot video with it. That's a huge drawback, since the camera is marketed to content creators. Second, I'm not able to use the side buttons on my phone to release the shutter. That means when I'm taking self portraits I have to find a way to keep the phone out of the shot, but still in a position where I can see where I'm touching on the phone screen. If the app had voice activation or used the volume buttons to release the shutter it would eliminate this obstacle.

Edit 7/22/22. Canon connect will not allow me to add raw photos to my phone, but this option is avaliable to the iPhone and iPad. The work flow would be easier if this option was added to android. Just a shame. This app was horrible about 2 months ago, i would use my note 3 and try to remote shoot with my t6i and the app would always loose connection, it did it for transferring photos too. I have upgraded to the s7 edge and have had zero complaints with it, works perfect. Must have app.

title: Toon Blast
description:
From the creators of Toy Blast comes the ultimate puzzle game with unique gameplay and endless fun!

Enter the crazy cartoon world starring Cooper Cat, Wally Wolf, Bruno Bear and enjoy loads of whacky and challenging levels! Blast cubes and create powerful combos to pass levels. Solve puzzles to help the Toon gang as they travel around magical worlds! 

Join the wildest adventure of your life and have a BLAST!

FEATURES:

â— Complete tons of challenging levels and unlock new episodes!
â— Play with unique game objectives and dozens of entertaining obstacles!
â— Unlock whacky boosters to blast your way to the next level!
â— Collect stars by completing levels to win awesome rewards!
â— Create your own team & compete with others to rule the puzzle world! 
â— Receive lives from your teammates to keep on playing! 
â— Sync your game easily between your phone and tablet!
â— Easy and fun to play yet challenging to master!
descriptionHTML:
From the creators of Toy Blast comes the ultimate puzzle game with unique gameplay and endless fun!

Enter the crazy cartoon world starring Cooper Cat, Wally Wolf, Bruno Bear and enjoy loads of whacky and challenging levels! Blast cubes and create powerful combos to pass levels. Solve puzzles to help the Toon gang as they travel around magical worlds!

Join the wildest adventure of your life and have a BLAST!

FEATURES:

â— Complete tons of challenging levels and unlock new episodes!
â— Play with unique game objectives and dozens of entertaining obstacles!
â— Unlock whacky boosters to blast your way to the next level!
â— Collect stars by completing levels to win awesome rewards!
â— Create your own team & compete with others to rule the puzzle world!
â— Receive lives from your teammates to keep on playing!
â— Sync your game easily between your phone and tablet!
â— Easy and fun to play yet challenging to master!
summary: Welcome to the funniest cartoon puzzle adventure!

scraped_reviews.content: have played this game off and on for years, rarely making in-app purchases. but 1 day ago as I was playing, I made several purchases within the game, until for some unknown reason the purchase seemed to have vanished. Didn't think much of it, even continued playing today. But for whatever reason my keyboard had transitioned from english to chinese. I speak and write only english. I then got a message from my security app alerting me of 2 breaches. I deleted the game and any other games related.

Most gaming apps start out fun, easy & free, but in a short time it becomes almost impossible to get past levels...unless you pay. This is one of those games. Response: I'm not having difficulty playing your game. Your game's been developed, making levels so difficult even playing for days, or weeks, it can't be completed, unless you buy "power ups". Or wait until that perfect game of perfectly timed pieces after many games that were, obviously, predetermined to make you lose, no matter what.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry to hear that you are having difficulty playing our game. ðŸ˜” Please remember that you can always pass the levels without making any purchases. In the meantime, we've shared your feedback with our related team so they can review it as soon as possible.

scraped_reviews.content: I have been playing for years. I don't have Facebook so I have had to reset every time I get a new phone. I have ran up to the highest level at least 5 times. But now it is impossible. I have gotten to champions league. And now it costs several hundred coins a day to play. Absolutely impossible to pass levels. I used to have 25k coins saved but am now down to 3k just trying to keep the disco ball...it's impossible to win levels without the disco ball anymore. Probably gonna delete the game soon
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry to hear that you are having difficulty playing our game. ðŸ˜” Please remember that you can always pass the levels without making any purchases. In the meantime, we've shared your feedback with our related team so they can review it as soon as possible.

scraped_reviews.content: this game has been made impossible to play for too long. I tolerate it to distract myself from excessive worry . I admit I give in and buy extras just to get to play. Spend too much money trying to achieve the even more impossible challenges. it no longer is a coping mechanism, today , after spending A LOT of money recently to experience the challenges during disco fever, with the disco ball in 2nd, I won the level as the music notes tallied, all was lost . it doesn't even pay to pay to play.

Game constantly crashes. Sometimes crashes after a purchases, losing money and progress. I am constantly contacting "support" for credit and correction. Taking screenshots and photos as proof. Their response can take hours and even days. During that time you really dare not continue playing as your progress will be lost and you enter the loop of contacting "support", waiting for an answer....rinse and repeat. This is exhausting, and no fun.

I've played this game since 2018 and it's been fun but the new card collecting thing is a joke. I've collected 60 cards today and All were duplicates. I understand it's a game but seriously that's ridiculous. There's no rewards that you don't want real money for except a daily gift. This game seems to be more about getting money than actually having fun. I'm considering leaving after 7yrs. I play other games and they aren't as unfair as this game has become.

(Edit: When I run out of lives or have played one level for days without beating it, I play all the other games I have that are less frustrating. I wish it weren't pay to play but that's what it is. There will be levels that will take days to beat. Be forewarned.) As you go past level 120 it becomes tremendously difficult to beat levels without spending money. I wish they had optional ads to watch for lives and/or coins like other games do. That would make playing the game less frustrating.

MONEY GRAB!!!!This game used to be super fun. But they tightened up their algorithm so much. I can see the patterns. And of course it's all designed to try to make you spend money to beat a level, because you were short by 1 move about 50 times in a row. You see the rockets go straight through a bubble and it doesn't pop. They've doubled the prices. Your lives used to be full after you had 15 or 30 minutes of free play. No more! And the rewards are far less than in the past.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, We are sad to hear that you didnâ€™t have the best experience while playing our game. Please send us an in-game message using the "Support" button in the "Settings" menu of the game; thus, we can review your account details and check the problem you're referring to.

scraped_reviews.content: Edit: What have you done? I dont even know where to begin. No more ads for extra moves. Harder to pass levels. I was consistently in the Champions League each week, and now I can't pass levels. I've burned through all my coins. ( end edit) I love this game! It is my favorite match 3 game out there. I'm now above level 3000 and while the game is definitely more challenging I have never felt like I would not eventually pass a level. Challenging but achievable! That's what keeps it fun.

I've played Toon Blast for a long time, but I've lowered my rating, may be time to uninstall. Levels seemed rigged now, especially in Champions League, and there is no way to beat many levels with the initial amount of moves given, so you have to continually spend money. For example, I've just played a level more than 20 times and still cannot beat it without spending more money. Goal for the level is to remove 90 items, but you only get 18 moves. Total money grab!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Rachel, We are sorry that you faced challenges while playing CL levels, and we understand the frustration it may have caused. We've forwarded your feedback about level difficulties to our product team. You can be sure that it will be considered accordingly.

scraped_reviews.content: Not what was advertised. The ads show a trapped bear that needs to be rescued by solving a puzzle. I installed it and it kept giving me matching games that quickly got to the point where you had to spend money to continue. There were 2 save the bear activities that involved pulling pins (not advertised). I finally gave up trying to get to what was advertised as I wasn't about to spend money to get to it.

was awesome now the game crashes constantly and they say "we've sent your report" and never do anything about it. I noticed that if you make an in game purchase the issue goes away along with the option to watch ads for extra moves. they say it's random but after 3 months of not purchasing anything I get the option to watch ads again and get the crashing issues. so it seems if ya don't buy stuff the game crashes. and if ya do you have to keep buying if you get stuck. IT'S NOT RANDOM BUT GREED!

Fun at first but after about level 250 it gets to the point where you get stuck on boards for a day or two unless you spend money on items to get through them. The higher you go the worse it gets. The rocket power ups always seem to spawn the opposite direction of what you need them to also. it gets really annoying. I won't be wasting another dollar in this game and will be uninstalling it.

With me being at level 6586 and since the constant updates, having the best device and internet, this is starting to to be very displeasing. Constant crashes, lags, and when you playing in the disco tournament and others it's always "toon blast isn't responding" this has been happening very frequently and it's annoying. I usually don't leave reviews but this is highly frustrating and yes I restart device and clean cache and this still happens. I would hate to have to uninstall. Fix this please.

These new levels are terrible! I'm on level 11,001, and been playing this game for 10+ years. I went from 8,XXX coins, to 667 in 3 days, literally! ..... Levels are getting ridiculously hard, and giv8ng very little amount of moves. And I've spent hundreds, if not THOUSANDS of dollars on this game within the last decade. Please fix or I'm deleting for good ...

I've played toon blast for years. loved the game. Probably spent 2k buying into it to progress in different areas in the game. I've played on 4 different phones as I've switched phones over the years. It took this long for me to realize that just like a casino, the house always wins. No way will I put another dime in this game. Algorithms, Im done.

Toon Blast Support is the worst, avoid this game. Recently, it became impossible to complete levels & bonus games. Was never able to achieve the goal even though I made in App purchases and had plenty of time. After contacting Toon support I was dismissed, then ignored completely. This game and company should be removed from the Google Play store. They are the epitome of terrible customer service. Regardless of what the developer may say in response, you can only pass levels if you pay.

This is a really fun game, but one VERY big issue is that if a player gets accidentally kicked off a team, there is no way to rejoin the team, even if the Team Leader contacts support and requests that player be reinstated. Support will refuse to do it, which is ABSOLUTELY RIDICULOUS! The only way to rejoin your team is to contact support and BEG them to delete your account. You can then make a new account and rejoin the same team, but you will have lost all your coins and your game progress.

Disappointed to say the very least since the last several updates this week alone. I'm at level 4473. I have excellent device and internet service. I clean cache, check for issues and outage's and guess what? It's the game!ðŸ™„ Nothing more infuriating than being in heat of competition and you lose moves & contests & you don't get your moves or coins back. Lags, crashes, "toon blast stopped working", the ads for additional moves crash out too. I'm really tired of this, ðŸ¤¦â€â™€ï¸please fix this soon.

This gets a single star for not having ads, but is not what the screenshots show. It's an imitation candy crush or bejeweled. I downloaded the game for the ads showing the escape challenges (like the screenshots). You only see these about every 5-10 matching boards. Uninstalling it and the other games like it. It's false advertising or basic bait and switch.

This game used to be fun to play. Chat, individual games, competitions, team tourneys, and a good chance at advancing without spending money. In the last several months, the game has become almost impossible to advance without spending money. I can see people, who play regularly, stuck on a level for a week at a time. Now Peak has all but eliminated the ability to play in the tournaments and challenges without pay to play and taken all the fun out of it.

it's been a good 4 years, but "buh-bye." I'm getting frustrated with this game. I'm up into the 4000 levels, so I've been playing for a while. The ads you allow are ruining the experience because they freeze or screw up the game. The algorithms have changed, and every time I get a bonus, it's immediately taken away by impossible moves. So, you've hired another designer? Fine. Why change the game? I think I'll give this game a rest.

This game was so enjoyable for several years, but it has taken a nosedive. It used to be generous with in-game rewards, but those have devolved. Some of the levels are unwinnable unless you use coins to buy more moves, or suffer through the tedium of playing the same level over and over and over and over. There used to be plenty of opportunities for unlimited play, especially for the side challenges; the most recent update changed that aspect, too. So many negatives, not enough space. Sigh

Great game, excellent support. I just wish you didn't lose progress if you have to exit the app during the game. A phone call, the battery dies answering a text message, etc and it boots you out of the game. You keep your levels but lose things like the magic ball. I just got a magic ball and my phone died. Now I am back to 0/10. This is so frustrating. I also play Dominoes and it doesn't do this to me, so I know it's possible.

So stupid now. Used to be fun. Played for years. However, the Advanced levels after 10,000 are getting significantly harder. I used to spend forever on the app. Now, I burn through my lives and then I have to turn off the game... seems stupid to make the levels so hard that it tries to force you to buy resources or else you have to play the level perfectly. I used to sit through ads too in order to get my one or two moves I needed to finish a level... now I don't because I need more moves.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry to hear that you are having difficulty playing our game. ðŸ˜” Please remember that you can always pass the levels without making any purchases. In the meantime, we've shared your feedback with our related team so they can review it as soon as possible.

scraped_reviews.content: I'm not sure what has been changed in the algorithm of this game,however, it seems like most levels are impossible to pass without using helps or coins. This didn't use to be the case. Some levels were challenging, and that was fun, but when every single level is overwhelmingly difficult, even with the magic disco ball, it's obvious something has changed. I don't mind spending money on a game if it's enjoyable, but when I find myself constantly needed to use helps and coins, it is no longer fun
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry to hear that you are having difficulty playing our game. ðŸ˜” Please remember that you can always pass the levels without making any purchases. In the meantime, we've shared your feedback with our related team so they can review it as soon as possible.

scraped_reviews.content: It was a great game, most of the time you could beat levels without purchases. That was such a plus, so I bought power ups pretty often. But ...and here's the catch, once you reach the "Championship Levels" it turns into a huge money grab, levels that cannot be won without lots of power ups per level. Very very disappointing from a game that had such great game play. I didn't mind spending some money. Now it's just greedy. ðŸ˜¤ðŸ˜¡.

Barely any skill is needed or can be used for rhis game. Icons change to something with different properties, for no reason. Icons drop to one or more lower rows sometimes, but not always, and you never know how far they'll drop. There is no way to develop a strategy. I've been on the same game for about a day and a half, and there's no way to win it unless you purchase more weapons. Deleting this app. Total waste of time.

The game is designed to beat you, especially when you are close to finishing successfully. And, the "help" ads only show up randomly (never when you need help!) Although, I find it ironic that the game wouldn't want to keep you playing, because I stop playing and do something more productive. Oh, and I'm spending NO money for extra anything. You would get more money from the ads you randomly (interionally?) choose not to offer me at opportune times. It's fun, but it's probably more annoying!

I would VERY easily give this game 5 stars. But, when you are watching the ads for the free moves, especially if it is a Shein ad, if you click the "X" too soon, it takes you to the actual Shein app, then you lose any free moves you were trying to get. I was playing level 42 in the Arena just now. I needed one move to complete it. I clicked to watch the ad. Of course, it was a Shein ad. So, needless to say, I am still stuck on level 42 ðŸ¤¦

The game itself is fun and addictive. The developers do a good job of providing bonuses that players can win by playing or just even opening the app. However, there are just too many levels where you can't pass with using extra moves. Extra moves cost gold coins. While gold coins can be won with free play, they cost real money. So, I think that the developers prevent players from passing levels in order to get them to purchase gold coins and other add ons to aid game play.

I have been playing Toon Blast for several years. I admit I am addicted to it. I have reached the upper levels, and it is frustrating to get stuck for days on a level. Even with the mirror ball and other earned boosts, there are levels you can't beat. I have been paying for the Team Pack every weekend to help myself and my teammates. I can't justify the cost. I have teammates who are no longer playing anymore. I might leave, too.

Ruined by greedy money hungry devs. I get that ads are necessary for revenue, but not to this degree. Been playing this for years. Lately, any time you try to watch an ad to galet additional moves, the ad will play, finish, but upon closing the ad, the game doesn't reward you the extra moves. Instead you are given absurd amounts of pop up menus that try to constantly push micro transactions. "Hard level pack", "Super-Hard Level Pack", "Special Bonus Pack" ect. It's just predatory.

I used to enjoy this game. It's now so hard to gain coins, anvils, hammers etc. and there are fewer ads to extend play so you spend so many coins. The toon cards are awful and a waste of time. I play A LOT and can not get all the toon cards, always fall short of a few. and the rewards for playing are so stingy given the amount of play needed. Things keep changing. The only enjoyable part is the cannon fest, which is now crammed into the short weekend, and thus harder to achieve. getting tired.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry to hear that you are having difficulty playing our game. ðŸ˜” Please remember that you can always pass the levels without making any purchases. In the meantime, we've shared your feedback with our related team so they can review it as soon as possible.

scraped_reviews.content: I have been playing this game for over 3 years granted it's been difficult at times but after a day or two I'm able to push through the difficult puzzles. Now it's impossible to get through puzzles when they're giving you 15 moves to remove 4 different tasks and when I finally get the disco ball they take it away after 1 or 2 puzzle attempts, then so after prompting me to buy more coins and safety beforehand. This is a total money grab. The game isn't fun to play anymore now it takes money.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry to hear that you are having difficulty playing our game. ðŸ˜” Please remember that you can always pass the levels without making any purchases. In the meantime, we've shared your feedback with our related team so they can review it as soon as possible.

scraped_reviews.content: I USED TO love this game more... Whatever happened with the last update, but the newly added levels are so difficult to pass! I don't mind that, in general, but there's always been a choice to watch an ad, or two, or a few, to get additional moves. Yes, sometimes I'd have to wait a day for that option to appear, but it was THERE! Now, however, I "stuck" on a level for days(!) and NO "watch ad" option!! I really don't want to spend money over and over - please give the WATCH AD option back!

The auto reply to this post will say you can always pass levels without purchases or helps, but I assure you that isn't true anymore. After years of playing, I'm finally deleting this app. It's a fun game until you have to spend days/weeks trying to pass the same level, or make a purchase to do so. Once you make a purchase, you'll miss levels by just enough to have to use up your purchases. Greedy creators aren't getting any more of my money.

This is supposed to be fun!! I'm a legal professional who works extremely hard every day & this game is my wind down. Games by design are supposed to be fun, enjoyable, & winnable! If my goal was to be challenged mentally, there are many other options to pick from. I like to "be a winner" without having to spend half my paycheck or without wasting countless hours trying to get past a level that can't be passed without paying! In this challenging world, I'd just like to have some mindless fun!!

I've had this game installed for close to 10 years. For the most part, it is fun, and I have spent $$ getting upgrades and coins, etc. Now, I contacted support because I was supposed to be credited with 500 coins for winning their weekend contest and was stiffed. Of course, customer support isn't going to answer you. I am sorry I wasted my last 9+ years playing this and spending money.

The game isn't the same as advertised, so I'm uninstalling. The gameplay itself is actually not bad. The graphics are bright and colorful, and the music is catchy and enjoyable. If you're downloading to give your child a bright, colorful game, this game is enjoyable in that sense. The gameplay holds up against similar games, as far as enjoyability, but if you saw ads about saving those animals, it's not part of the gameplay, and you'll be disappointed.

UPDATE.. from 2018. I USED to love this game. NOW, it's a money ðŸ’° pit. Developers got so GREEDY that it's impossible to move between levels without purchasing power-ups, coins, if you're above level 10,000. In addition, after clearing each level with over 10 remaining lives, they cheat you and never give you over 2 stars. The levels are too hard. No wonder they grew to a billion dollar company ðŸ™„ It's at our expense!!! Beware! My team and I will be quitting this game, unfortunately.

I used to love this game but, lately, developers have been making it impossible to win coins or any other reward. Before the last few updates, you needed to create 75, 100, 175 rockets or bombs and now you're supposed to create 1,250 of them to win (100) coins, or a big amount of "win on your 1st try", within 24 hours to win 100 coins, which is impossible with how difficult this game has become. I spend quite a bit, weekly, but now it's a "pay to win". Became frustrating, instead of a fun game.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry to hear that you are having difficulty playing our game. ðŸ˜” Please remember that you can always pass the levels without making any purchases. In the meantime, we've shared your feedback with our related team so they can review it as soon as possible.

scraped_reviews.content: there are so many bugs that needs to be fixed in this game. ive played for years and ive witnessed gifts not given, weapons not destroying targets, and extremely bias actions. there are way too many issues with so called "randomness" in falling pieces. this has been the only game ive played for quite a long time and i will admit that ive spent money here. this has honestly turned into a "pay to play" experience and has seemed to be very manipulated depending on what items you have collected.

Even this game is pretty good but not like in the ads, but mostly the problem is when certain levels get harder every now and then, they don't give enough moves when you need to collect items to complete the levels especially when they're first spaced out and you loose most upgrades at most times then start over then use your coins to continue playing and takes a while to upgrade back. They should give at least 50 to 100 free coins everyday!

I've been playing this game since 2021, and it used to be so much fun. Now they took away a lot of features like the ads for free turns, the free turn after you lose, the number of tries you get on a round, the 5 free lives in the daily check in, this card thing that they know is impossible to complete because after u reach a certain number of cards, they give nothing but duplicates, and the money grab they're on now. you have to spend money or have life support to win. very disappointing now.

A great little game with a handful of side games to keep it interesting, and I have yet to see an ad. I took one star because you can run out of "lives" and have to wait to play again. No idea why a game maker would want to encourage you to not play their game, but here we are. Eventually uninstalled out of boredom with the levels.

Game glitches during ads and it only happens when you activate disco ball. When this happens you lose progress on bonus challenges. You lose progress. Once you get to a certain level it gets ridiculously hard. Seems like they don't give you matches so you lose levels. Basically if you want to get anywhere you have to pay.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry to hear that you are having difficulty playing our game. ðŸ˜” Please remember that you can always pass the levels without making any purchases. In the meantime, we've shared your feedback with our related team so they can review it as soon as possible.

scraped_reviews.content: NO ADVERTS! Solid puzzle game for about 200 levels. After that it's more luck than skill. Like you're literally given only 1 possible move for up to 12 moves at the beginning of a round, and make no actual progress. Other times you get great lineups and have half your moves remaining. Things like the random rocket orientation make it so you can't plan far ahead when dealing with powerups, and some levels require certain rocket orientations in order to strike the goals.

The game used to be fun. however, and thats a BIG HOWEVER! its starting to get to the point the higher levels arent just "harder" The game wont give you enough moves to complete them. youre telling me 16 moves will beat 150 bubbles,44 lights,& 26 watermelons? OK. you used to offer ads for extra moves, but took that away.some levels you will be stuck on until the championship week is over with. which means you will lose tons of side quest prizes. They have taken the fun out of this game ðŸ‘Ž.

I've spent way too much time on this game. I haven't paid anything, so I'm fine with watching ads. The ads have changed though. Now the "skip forward" arrows that appear on the ad take you to the Play Store. The ads have gotten unbearably longer and take me outside of the app. it was fun while it lasted.

title: CalendarSale
description: CalendarSale is a door-to-door calendar route management software for firefighters associations.
descriptionHTML: CalendarSale is a door-to-door calendar route management software for firefighters associations.
summary: CalendarSale is an aid to firefighters for their calendar rounds.

title: Learn to Read - Duolingo ABC
description:
From the creators behind Duolingo, the worldâ€™s #1 education app, comes Duolingo ABC! Duolingo ABC is the fun, hands-on way for your child to learn to read and write in English! From preschool to first grade, engage your child with delightful stories for kids and bite-sized lessons teaching the alphabet, phonics, sight words, vocabulary, and more.

The Duolingo ABC kids reading app offers over 700 hands-on reading lessons designed to help kids learn and love to read. We make learning to read both fun and effective with lessons and educational games for kids that include multi-sensory activities, such as tracing, drag-and-drop prompts and more. Our educational learning app offers personalized lessons so your child can learn at their own pace.

Develop reading comprehension skills with educational lessons specially designed to support your childâ€™s lifelong love of learning! Whether your child is in pre-K, preschool, kindergarten, or 1st grade, Duolingo ABC has delightful stories for kids filled with engaging pictures meant to inspire and support your child along their educational journey. 

Help your child learn to read new sight words with our toddler books and kids stories that let you highlight each word spoken. This helps build your childâ€™s multi-sensory learning skills and can help them learn to read independently.

Duolingo ABC makes your childâ€™s education a fun and engaging experience. Our learning app combines educational lessons with fun reading games perfect for kids and toddlers alike! Our rewards work in tandem with bite-sized reading lessons and fun school games for kids, keeping them motivated to learn while building their confidence.

Discover ad free kids educational games filled with exploration and curiosity on Duolingo ABC. Now your kids can have fun while they sound out words, practice reading and writing in English, and build reading comprehension and literacy skills for a lifetime!

DUOLINGO ABC FEATURES:

Kids Learn to Read
- Reading games: Our kids reading app provides hands on learning they will love
- New lessons are added often, so your child never runs out of educational content
- Reading and phonics for kids: Bite-sized lessons help kids learn phonics, sight words & vocabulary
- Every reading lesson is built to feel like a game, so kids can learn to read while having fun

Learning Activities For Kids
- Enjoy fun educational games like letter tracing and gamified stories, suitable for even the youngest learners
- Toddler, kindergarten or first grade, all kids can enjoy the Duolingo ABC learning app while having fun
- From toddler books to 1st grade learning games, Duolingo ABC has lessons for every child
- Designed by literacy & early-education experts to develop kidsâ€™ skills in phonics, sight words, reading & more

Kid-Safe & Ad-Free
- Our educational learning app prioritizes a kid-friendly experience
- Rest easy, parents. There are no ads or in-app purchases to worry about
- Content is focused on preschool, kindergarten and first grade level lessons, so you can be safe knowing it is always age-appropriate

Offline Learning
- Your childâ€™s educational journey has no limits with Duolingo ABCâ€™s offline learning capabilities
- On a plane? At a restaurant? Duolingo ABC can be used anytime, anywhere
- Enjoy playing and learning offline - so kids can learn wherever you go

Duolingo ABC is an educational learning app that offers immersive lessons to teach preschool to first grade kids to learn and love to read. Download today and spark your childâ€™s love for learning.

--

Privacy Policy: https://www.duolingo.com/privacy
Terms of Service: https://www.duolingo.com/terms

summary: Learn how to read with fun educational games for ages 3-8. Learn phonics & more!

scraped_reviews.content: My 2.5 yr old loves playing "owl school" Some of the lessons are a little advanced for her, and I help talk her through them, but she has learned so much! I was looking for something because she is really interested in letters and points out all the T's, etc, in her books, but would often mix up similar looking letters. Perfectly expected, but she loves learning with Duo. I love that it's free and ad free. I'm sure by the time she's more in the target age range, she will be learning even more.

I'm a youth programmer at a large library system & a parent to a preschooler. I love this app. My preschooler is completely engaged and loves it. It's a perfect balance of stories, writing, learning to sound out letters/words and sight words. I can't wait to watch her progress through more levels. We finish level 1 in the first weekend. I've been telling all the caregivers at my programs about this app. I'm hoping you make ones for learning other languages too. Thanks for being ad free!

This has been amazing so far for my 3yo! I love the variations in exercises, and she gets so excited to keep learning. One thing that's kind of annoying is that when tracing the letters, it'll sometimes skip ahead in the path so my 3yo isn't actually tracing ('m' for example, she doesn't have to finish the bumps down to the bottom before it registers as going up again). I'd rather she not be learning those loopholes lol but it's been so good otherwise that we'll definitely keep using it.

Our son just turned 5 and he is already reading well, far better than most 6 year olds. He can often read words up to 10 characters long, sometimes longer. Here's the thing: nobody has taught him to read. The only logical deduction is that he's learned from this app, which he's done a fair amount and enjoys, though sporadically (once every 2 - 3 weeks?). The only other possibility is that he taught himself to read. He's only reached Level 5 (of 10) on the app. An unbelievably amazing app!

Please add British English! Great app and free! but it's all American English and would be great to have the option of British English words and pronunciations. also instead of the letter names, we would prefer the phonetic sounds as this would make more sense for learning the sounds and reading

I'm actually using the iOS version of the app, but my points should still be applicable. The kids and I love the app. However, I'm working with kids who are non-native speakers, and the repeat-the-sentence stories can be quite difficult for them, especially when there is no on-demand option to repeat the sentence (if I try to model it, the device registers my speech and checks it off). It'd be great if that option is added in future updates. Thanks!

Best free educational children's app I've found. Can't believe it's totally free (and no ads)! My almost 3 year old loves it and can do it mostly independently, even when she gets it wrong, because it makes each question easier to answer if you select the wrong thing. It's the only alphabet/phonics app I've found that keeps her engaged for a while. She loves the stories and the speaking tasks. Wish there was a British English option though.

App is great! It has a nice style and is simple, so kids can use it easily. No ads too! Though it would be very nice if you'd add some other languages. Also, one small thing that is a bit annoying, is that sometimes the voice gets a bit buggy. Like, whenever it teaches you a letter, the sound gets quieter in the middle of the sound, which isn't a major mistake, but it is a bit annoying, for me, at least. I'm a 13 year old trying this out btw, so idk how younger kids would like the app.

Prolly not the place for this question ðŸ¤£ but my 3 year old was wondering if you guys could update the Duo ABC- so the letters when being traced could make the sound of the letter instead of sensory noise. Thanks! He loves the app its helped him sm. Just passing the request along!

telling them the names of the sound for spelling makes it harder. it should be the lower case letters represent the sound and uppercase the name. the concept and layout is very good but this can make spelling harder for children.
such a great app My only complaint is I wish it was available on the Smart board! This game helps my child find joy in learning and connecting to new explorations in learning.

My son, who has just turned 4, enjoys it for a little bit of reading each day. It's very good, I only have 2 criticisms. 1. The difficulty level progresses a little bit too slowly. It's good to start with basics but he gets bored when it remains easy for too long. 2. There is no option to make it British English, so it spells some of the words the American way, which would be deemed incorrect here.

Its a good app to teach how to read. But it has too many bugs on levels 9 and 10. It's just books when you get there. Some books have problems with the reading buttons. If you press a button it reads the next book. Book themes are not the best also, with some silly ones as the Yoga Fart.

It's okay, but unfortunately there's no option to switch from US english to UK English, so at school, children would be considered to be misspelling words like colour. I think it would be great if there were options to switch to UK or Australian English. I enjoy that you can skip to higher levels without needing to complete the lower levels

This was even better than the regular Duolingo this app changed my life my kids they've been learning to read because some they don't even know how to read they just say like random words but it was worth it it was really good for my kids but for the other Duolingo when they lose all their hearts they got frustrated so instead I downloaded Duolingo ABC because it was way better.

Great app like duolingo, just one problem, which is why I rated it 4 stars. Duolingo ABC is mainly targeted towards younger children, I thought it would help with my English in high school, but it mainly teaches you basic English. I guess it helps to stop making small mistakes, but if an upgraded version of this app came out with certain stages for certain year groups, it would help me much more with my grammar and English if it fits my year group. Otherwise, amazing app! â˜…

Amazing app for young kids! My daughter began kindergarten this year. We've been doing a few lessons every night and I'm shocked by how much she's picked up! Almost three months in class and she wasn't sounding out words yet, but 4 days with this app and she's picking up words from books she's sounded out herself. I also love that it's ad-free and simple to use.
This is excellent, it really helps my 5-year-old grandson to learn to read while playing. He loves it.

Biggest issue is that it needs to let kids keep trying to write instead of switching it to auto-line mode when they don't get it after two tries. Kids need 5 or 6 tries. They won't learn as well in auto line mode. This also needs to have all the alphabet letters to practice writing, and possibly words they could practice writing, as well. lesson labels would be nice. My kids respond really well to the "put the word back together" game, but they don't have that often. I'd recommend it so far.

My 4yo granddaughter LOVES this app. She always asks to "play the green owl game". I noticed a very quick improvement in her lowercase letter recognition (which is often ignored in learning, for some reason). The app doesn't have any negative reinforcement - all positive. It's very encouraging and allows exploration. The humor is perfect for her age, and she repeats the stories over and over. She loves the characters and likes to play pretend with them.

It's amazing ðŸ˜ðŸ˜ðŸ¤© my little brother has very week in study but now he know to much things and I am also learning english my english is improving thankyou Duolingo thank you very much ðŸ˜€ðŸ˜€ðŸ˜€
My child learns much faster than before . Before she was always watching phone but now she is on the app Duolingo only learning.
This app is educational for my sister. My sister and I are children, so this is very educational for her. May God bless you and your team for making this app and Duolingo. May God bless you ðŸ™â¤

The school I am tutoring struggling students is teaching ANALYTIC PHONICS as in this app: it doesn't work unless the student finds reading easy anyway! This app would do so much better if it swapped into SYNTHETIC PHONICS (all ages) and actually taught the SOUNDS of mono- and digraphs. Eg. there's a story that highlights the digraph oa but with word building section it doesn't lump the digraph together as one unit/sound, never mind stating the sounds names. Insist spelling words in right order.

teachers daughter approved! ðŸ˜‚ great app for little kids!! coming from adult Duolingo I had low expectations, but I love how this app personalizes learning for YOUR kid! not only does it help my son write his name, it also has lessons specifically for letters and phonics combos for his name. the stories are cute and quick, they ask contextual questions about the story and it's gameified in a way that will capture kids attention
Free app, no adds, and my kid ASKS to play this game! Couldn't ask for a better reading resource!

I really like this app.I am actually 13 years old but i installed this app just because i wanted to know how it is,and it is very helpful and fun. Also, the drawing is so cute.The person who did the drawing of the caracters in the app is really creative! There is one problem is that you cannot choose the language there is the english only.So i hope you add the feature of choosing the language that the user wants ,to give the chance to more people to learn the alphabets of their native language:)

This app is cute and is age appropriate for my learner (review is in regards to my 2 yr old), but it has some basic flaws that I want to point out to parents. 1. The writing portion (drawing alphabet characters) is jumpy and not very precise. My child simply scribbled an answer that was accepted before she even completed the character. 2. The letters have a picture of an animal or object associated with that letter. Educators should not group letters with pictures for young readers. TO BE CONT

The articles said this app would teach English, Spanish and French to toddlers, but the version I downloaded only has English. What's going on here? I wonder if the other languages are only available in the apple store. As for the English version, it is engaging for my toddler, but it allows the learner to accomplish writing tasks sloppily- in a way that would not be recognized if done with paper and pencil. I'd prefer Duo keep kids on the lines so when they write on paper, it is coherent.

Amazing app! So grateful it's free and ad free. My 4 year old finished all stories and lessons (up to level 8) in 2 weeks. Do I have to change the age for him to have new lessons? Also,I would love for you to include voice activated reading checks (like the real duolingo has for language learners)... that way the kids would be eager to pronounce more and help their literacy. In all 5 stars and thank you for this app.

Love it a lot! The app was promising and helped out a lot. Sadly, English is the only language option!! As a person from Germany, I would've loved German as an available option for my little sister. Generally, a few more language options would've been nice. Other than that I'm really happy!

This helped my son break down sounds into words he could easier sound out then put them together from the reading games and lessons in this app. I have the adult duolingo and I'm learning Spanish Japanese and Hawaiian. Both apps and developers, I can assume, we're great at this job and completely excelled my expectations. 100% worth this app and the time!!! Stay dedicated it's sooo worth it as a child or adult!!! I really do love it

I've tried almost every learning app to give my little one a head start, and this is the only one so far that he actually enjoys. I'm astonished with how much he progressed in only 1 week, and there are no ads or paywalls! Thank you for providing a true gift of learning with this superior educational app!

*Not paid to review* We love this app.I usually have to bribe my son to spend time on apps I pay money for.He isn't intrested in reading/writing and struggles with it. But LOVES Duoabc. He"s not getting frustrated and needs minimal guidance because he catches on quick to the lessons. He even attempted to write words on his free time after using this app! The lessons are simple but informative. No ads and super cute. I reccomend giving it a try for stubborn kids who don't like reading or writing

Mostly great app. The kids love it and I appreciate that it's educational. I like that you can have multiple profiles for different kids. No ads + free app with tons of content. My only complaint is that it freezes occasionally, usually when the kids finish a section and get to choose a food to drop on the bear's head.

This App has a lot of potential to offer. The simple learning to read games are great. But the words to the books like mad monkey are read waaaay to fast. They should also put other games in for learning by grade levels. Don't change the way the app runs just add more. They should have the ability to complete levels of learning and earn a certificate when they reach the end of a level. I love how it's set up. They should really continue to develop this into more. Because it could go far. :)

Originally I thought this was really good, however it's progression has been poor. Filling in the blanks of a sentence is too hard a skill for where they are expected to be. When choosing words often it can be done successfully by recognising the first letter only, they need more words that are similar to each other. It is very easy to progress just by continuing to click, there should be more places to hold them back not just the pancake level. A UK English version would be useful

My daughter is 3 1/2 years old and has been using this app for about a year (it's less of a headache to have her play "her games" in the car rather than listening to kids' songs/nursery rhymes all the way to our destination). Today she casually walked up to me with a book and STARTED READING IT TO ME! She was pointing to the words that she was reading and sounding out some of the bigger words! The kicker is, we just bought said book last night and haven't read any of it to her yet! Get this Ap

Signing in deleted my 3 year old son's progress. I love the app, but at first I did not sign him in. Now he's progressed through to level 2 and I wanted him to be able to use any device, so I signed in, thinking it would save his progress. After it signed in, I realized all of his progress was gone. He will be devastated. Please help! New 1.8 update does not show the full letters when matching words with the letters. It cuts off the letter. Two restarts and this is still an issue.

This is a wonderful educational app! It is perfect for my 4 year old's level. The games, stories, and activities are engaging and effective. Even though my 7 year old is already a confident reader, he even enjoys playing the games. This app is truly designed in a way that kids not only learn but have fun doing it. And it's so nice that there are no ads! Also, to address some of the other reviews, this is an app to help children learn to read in English. Try Duolingo for other languages.

Excellent letter learning app, my 2 Yr old just enjoys the gameplay and is learning by accident. But the arrow button is right next to the navigation bar on android devices and within a minute he's come out of the game or hit the back button. Even switching to swipe for navigation he'll be out of the game and upset within 1 min. Game launcher doesn't recognise it as a game, and there's no game lock option. If that was there: 5 stars!

English only. Please don't REQUIRE name & age if we want to skip it, esp if an account isn't created. Let that be optional in settings, and changeable by the parent. The lessons are good. Free and zero ads, as appropriate! Intro story it's long, unnecessary, unrelated, dumb, and reinforces character traits I do NOT want in my child. Lose the intro!

WOW!! I LOVE this app!! My 4 year old loves it too! I love that it goes over how to make the letters, and she smiles as she reads the books and plays her games. Love the highlighted word feature to concentrate the child's attention to the word they're "reading". She has blasted through 60+ levels and we've only had it a few days! ðŸ˜…ðŸ¤£ idk if that's good or bad. Haha!

A lot of reviews based on their disappointment in this not being what they assumed/wanted it to be, but the app is exactly what it states it is in the description: a learn to read app for kids 8 and under with letters, phonics and stories. It's a cute little app with enough activities to engage young readers and keep them excited to move through the letters. Will update as my little one moves up through levels.

An INCREDIBLE app that (very uncommon for today) you can access for FREE. Kudos to the design team for a beautiful, fun, engaging learning app. (Small note- sometimes the t is straight and sometimes it has a little tail and my kid gets very confused by the continuity error. Not sure if that was intentional or an oversight.)

Masterful. My toddler loves it, and the creators really know how to make learning fun. I was worried it would get too hard too quickly, but even if that does happen, kiddo can always go back and repeat lessons. Something for devs to fix: when the letters are scattered and you're supposed to drag them back to the word, the letters gets smaller each time you touch them. Eventually they get so tiny you can barely see them! My kiddo's always bringing the tablet to me so I can fix it for her.

It *would* help but the answers need to be locked until the voice is finished with the directions. My kid constantly just taps on whatever before hearing what the voice is telling him what to tap. If he gets it right, he just says "I knew it" but he repeatedly taps the wrong answers if he doesn't get it right immediately. Definitely doesn't help him learn, then he's frustrated that he can't pass the tests. It would be helpful if there was an option to spell words in order only from left to right

Thank you so much for making app!  This it's amazing, engaging, encouraging, etc. ! I use duolingo for learning other languages and I got the duo abc for my 2 and 4 year old and they are progressing so much more than before! My 4 year old son says he loves it ! And that's amazing because he typically doesn't like school. I'm so glad to have this app. Amazing!!

My son has never really enjoyed reading so I was amazed by how much fun he was having, even though he is rather advanced for the level he is on. I wish I found this app earlier, he truly loves it and doesn't want to put it down. I love how it is focused completely on phonics, reading and writing, all while feeling like a fun game. Also it is free (and ad free!) this tells me that you really are doing it for the sole sake of childrens literacy. I'm amazed. Thank you Duolingo.

This is great for my autistic 5 year old with speech and language delays. The objectives and stories are spoken very clearly and simply. I love the elements included in the stories like numbers. The design is clean and attractive but not distracting. It offers plenty of repetition, and you can easily repeat lessons to get more practice. My neurotypical 3 year old also enjoys it! The best part is that it is free and has no ads. Thank you, Duo!
