summary: Daily Bible App with Audio, Verse of the Day, Offline, Bible Study + Devotionals

scraped_reviews.content: I absolutely love the guy's voice. But it starts back at John 1 everytime I open it. I won't waste time looking to find where I left off every night. Especially when, while I can click on the chapter I want, I cannot click a verse. I have to skip one verse at a time (or scroll and hope I hit the right spot). Not fun when the day's reading has you leave off at the end of a chapter. Every other audio book I've ever used picks right up where you leave off. I don't why this can't.

I love this ap! The devotionals are fantastic, & I like that I have so many versions of the Word to choose from. 5/23 Update: I have found that since the update, I no longer receive reminders - even though I have gone into each plan to turn it on and set the time. The daily verse pops up at all times of the day instead of the time I set. If I am listening, the verse selection starts over if the phone is unlocked with the ap open. The changes are not good. 11/8

Love the app. It seems like when there are updates or changes, it messes with the streaks. Recently, the guided scripture/prayers were updated, and it took my over 169-day streak away and put my streak at a 1. I was really upset and disappointed, and it was discouraging. I tried really hard to get that streak and maintain it only for it to be taken away because of an update that ruined it. I reached out to YouVersion about it, and I'll see if anything was done about it.

They have plans that don't work on a regular basis. You have to go to settings and clear your cache everyday to make the program work and sometimes that doesn't even fix it. Three years ago this was an excellent app, no issues, you can do group plans together , no problem. it seems like every new installation brings on another ongoing set of problems. If you just want to read the Bible on an App, this is a great app for doing that. Debating uninstalling for good.

This app is easy to use. Multiple varieties of the Bible at your fingertips. It's fun to watch yourself earn badges just for reading the Bible. The plans are good. Most churches seem to use this app. If you don't like carrying the Bible book to church,this is convenient. UPDATE: It does have many glitches on Android compared to IOS. That I have noticed since switching phones.

I love the Bible app! Having pretty much all the versions at my fingertips is so helpful. I am purchasing a physical Bible but I will continue to use the Bible plans to guide my studies. It's also very helpful at church or in group studies to quickly get to a specific page and verse. The highlighting and notes are very easy to do. I also personally love the public notes section where you can see what others have gotten from the verse or chapter.

Since the "bug fixes" I can't read my plans. I have to listen to them because the pages are all scrambled. The actual Bible works fine. I can listen or read . I don't like the change to the Daily Refresh, either. I don't recall ever having any problems at all before the update. Please go back to the last version. This is happening on my android tablet.

This is an amazing app, not only because of the multitude of versions and languages it includes, but because of the wide variety of plans, devotionals, prayers, and churches you can access. I love the ability to connect with other users, the badges that serve as the reward system many of us need, and the fact that everything in the app is free. The only thing stopping me from giving five stars is the absence of an in-app journal where you can jot down your thoughts and share with the community.

The reading plans are outstanding! The ability to switch back and forth between versions without having to carry them around individually is wonderful. I like to highlight and make notes too, which isn't always possible in a regular Bible due to small margins. 9/6/25 Update- I still love the app except for the fact that I have been trying, for a while now, to do devotionals with friends and it seems to be causing all sorts of problems, especially across platforms (apple vs droid).

Love this app. I just wish it had book introductions and an option to highlight part of a verse and not always the whole thing. The idea for "Streaks" was great. ......Update..... I'm glad to find a spot that has all of my notes in one place. Is there any way to make new suggestions? Also, why can we no longer go straight to a specific verse but now have to stroll all the way down? It makes it hard to cross reference while studying. Highlights have changed, and I had been color coding. Sigh.

I use this app every day on all of my devices. there are so many options to choose from, not only with the bible, but other ways to get connected with God. Filled with bible studies, the capability to take notes, and I haven't even scratched the surface. my ONLY gripes are i haven't found a way to skip to a verse. if anyone knows how to, help a brotha out? and, it doesn't sync to all my devices.

I'm very thankful for this app, but the search engine has gotten very annoying, it brings up all the positive scripture options, rather than the literal words I type in looking for specific actual scriptures. maybe its running too much in the topical search engine, rather than the literal word for word search option. It's so frustrating. maybe you should change it so it can have the option of "topical" and "literal word for word" theres something wrong about the search bias-ness of it. thank you

I have to drive pretty far most days of the week (over an hour each way), and recently switched translations of the Bible that I wanted to read, this app made it super easy to have access to it (I went from NIV to NASB). One of the other things I really love about this app is that you can do side-by-side comparisons of different versions to see what the wording is in whichever ones You're curious about. I also really love the the verse of the day notification, and the "streaks" notification!

I love spending time in the Bible and this app offered an easy way to access scripture. Not to mention, I love the highlighting and creating picture verse abilities... but it failed on me, not allowing me to scroll down anymore when going to a section of the Bible (it would get stuck). Needless to say, I had to Uninstall and reinstall, loosing all my highlights... I hope this time it will work longer... Its great that it's free though!! :)

I enjoy the devotions, stories, and videos. It's very encouraging enlightening. The app itself doesn't work as well as it used to. When you complete a devotion, it's supposed to check it off as being complete. When you open the next day, it shows that you hadn't read it and the check is gone, or after you complete a devotion, it is supposed to go into the "completed" section, yet it stays open. I've contacted IT several times about this. Maybe they changed IT companies, but nothing works.

Please add a "marked as read" feature! It is my only complaint. Having a wide variety of translations is wonderful for beginners to find what they understand best. It would be 10x better with a "mark as read" feature, so I can see my progress and never have to worry about losing my place. Even though it does take me back to where I left off, there are so many books that I will eventually get lost.

Love the Bible app! I use it every day. I have access to several versions to cross reference for clarification and better understanding of the word of God. I really like that I can highlight verses that speak to me so I can refer back to them quickly. the daily streak is great too. 10/2/25 very disappointed over the last 2 yrs. not sure what happened but I've noticed several glitches, lost my 910 day streak because it didn't recognize that I opened the app did it again yesterday

The app is not working right again! It keeps freezing up on me while I am in the middle of reading the devotional. Please fix this plus the issue about either not doing anything when I try to accept an invite to read with others, or not being able to see their comments, + The 3rd issue I just mentioned. Too many bugs that need fixing! Please fix them ALL. Thank you!

I love the app along with its devotionals, Bible in a year read through, and more. Unfortunately, I've been noticing an issue with the audio of a few of the Bible versions. Several verses (10 or more) are missing from the narrated (audio) in a few of the chapters. Also, I keep getting notifications that Whole chapters in the book of Psalms are not available. CSB seems to be the current issue, but you might want to check the others as well, for similar glitches.

I've used this app for many years. recently I've been having a glitch where the comments of the friends i am reading with are not showing up for a day or longer. I received the email notification that they commented but inside of the app I'm not able to see the comment. I've tried rebooting, deleting/re-adding the app. keeps happening for weeks now it's now 9/17/2025, and it's still having the same issue. other people's comments don't show up for days, if at all.

Hands down one of the best apps to use if you're at all interested in the Bible. The amount of translations and languages available is awesome, and the ability to highlight/take notes/make verse pictures/etc really enriches the reading experience. I've also found the search feature very helpful and often look up verses when I can't remember where they are. The plans are great too, they vary in length and depth so there's something for everyone.

It used to be a good app but the last 60 days (and I know this because of how long my plan was set for) it did not register my readings. When it opens it automatically goes to verse of the day which is fine sometimes but not after it shuts it self down and not register what I had been doing 15 seconds previously. The flaws have become annoy and I'm done. Maybe I'll come back in a year and see if they are still there

I appreciate the various plans that encourage structure and routine, which help us develop good habits. I especially like the Bible in a year. I also like the audio option, which is great reading and hearing at the same time with some translations. Anything that gets us into God's living, breathing word on a regular basis is a huge blessing! You'll never regret it!

It's the best app I've ever come across. The diversity of the reading plans, the user interface is the best, the offline mode has almost no restrictions, and the variety of the Bible versions is tremendously high compared to other Bible apps I've come across. Also, audio is better than most, and its voice has a humanistic feel. And regardless of having all these features, it's only 18 MBs. I am glad I found this app, it's such a blessing.

This is by far the best Bible app I've used. The list of reasons goes on and on. I start my day with the daily verse. It then has a video to expound on the verse. Next is a short bit of reading and prayer, and it suggests things to think about. It did take a few times in it to realize I simply "tap" the page to continue. It has a great selection of plans, Bibles, books, etc to read. I tell everyone to download this. You won't be disappointed!

The android version seems to need work compared to the iso version. I was at my church with a few people and we had been doing the same things within the app. My android seemed to freeze and not act as smoothly as the Apple devices. I had to uninstall the app and reinstall. I still believe that I am having issues. Love this application. Hopefully the issue gets corrected.

This app is great! My favorite bible app I've tried so far! The only reason it's not 5 stars is because I'm not sure if its just me but the ability to customize highlight colors is gone. I have the 6 color options but im not able to customize the shades of them or anything. This isn't a huge deal or anything, I just liked the customization of the app and it allows me to keep track of certain things I highlight based off a certain color.

I love this Bible app! It is very easy to go through and get to where you need to go, there are tons of different versions of the Bible, from NKJV to NIV, they have tons, the plans here are amazing, and I can get an explanation to whatever I want with videos explaining every chapter of the Bible with great detail! All together, this app is great for anybody who wants to read the Bible!

You Bible is a great for study, memorizing, and just good old fashioned reading of God's word. I like the print size of the letters. The print is large enough for me to read without problems. I also like the ability to search and scriptures based on your interests. This app even has books of the Bible you can study and the number of days your study will last. Finally, this app has a wide variety of transactions. I believe I going to really enjoy the You Bible app.

I love that I can have 2 open windows on my Z Fold 6. with either two different verses or even two different Bible translations. at the same time. for better cross referencing. Youversion takes advantage of my phones capabilities. making it much more convenient to further my education and relationship within Christ. and I'm able to learn more, faster.

I thought it would be overwhelming with how to navigate it since I'm not too tech savvy, but the total opposite. I can replay the audio if I need to and the narrators all have lovely voices. The set up is great. I just started this week and I already feel more confident with opening it up and spending time with God and the Bible itself. I prayed to be able to find a way to do this and praise His name for finding it and for the creators of the app. Thank you.

In my opinion, the only thing that would make this better is if your highlights spread over all your offline versions, for comparing verses in different translations. Also, being able to highlight parts of verses rather than the entire verse would be fantastic. EDIT 2024: The app just keeps getting better and better, but I still would like all my highlights unified across all versions, personally. EDIT 2025: No idea what's up, but the dark mode doesn't work, only in the actual bible, so -1â˜….

It works very well overall, I love being able to listen to any version of the Bible every day! Definitely has some bugs, like when I listen to my reading plan and don't have the app open while listening, it won't mark any of the passages as "complete", so I have to go back and manually mark every chapter that I listened to.

Fantastic app to get into the Word. Tons of great plans! Easy to use, connect, and be inspired, encouraged uplifted. All different versions to bounce back & forth. This app is incredible for both new and seasoned believers. You can highlight, bookmark, take notes and download pictures with encouraging quotes. Very useful when you're bouncing back & forth in a study. While there's nothing that can compare to turning the pages of THE BOOK, this app is still great...and no distracting ads!!

I love the way this app helps me study the Bible. I mean really study and dig deep. The plans can be fluffy too but my walk with Jesus is growing deeper. I was having numerous issue with app functionality. Finally I went to the system app settings and deleted stored data and cache. I had to sign in again and everything was still there and the app is working again.

This app is one of my favorite & most used! It gives me daily scriptures, mini deep dives from a variety of Godly men & women and great devotionals. My favorite part is the variety of versions available when I'm studying! It's been incredibly helpful in broadening my understanding & confidence in knowing the Word using the different versions. I recommend it to everyone and anyone of all ages!

this is a nice Bible app. It offers many versions of the Bible and some have an audio track. The nice thing about this particular apps audio track is that the section being read is highlighted as they go along which is really helpful for the hard to pronounce words and names. the only downfall is that you cannot rewind the audio, it starts over from the beginning of the chapter.

I love using your app for my daily Bible reading. I noticed two things that might help: 1. It would be great to have a single â€œAll Booksâ€ button that lists every book in the Old and New Testament in one place. 2. When I search for a specific chapter, it currently shows random verses instead of starting from verse 1. Showing the full chapter would make it easier to read. Is there already a way to do these things that I might have missed? I couldnâ€™t find it. Thanks for all the work you put

very good app with awesome features. I only have one problem right now, which is the lack of customizable highlighting colors, this is a feature I used a lot from the time I have been using the App, please bring back custom colours, there are some colours that are missing among your suggested colours. That's the only reason I gave it 4 stars, once this is resolved, my review goes back to 5 stars.

Beautiful app, almost every transition you could want, easy to use and quickly compare different translations too. God is so good!!! But they took away the Bookmarks feature which I so loved and had a bunch of saved Scriptures that I used for different things that are how gone. so, for me it was a friendly reminder that you can't beat your paper Bible!

love it! searching is easy. try it, go ahead, search something you will see!! It's a pretty sweet app with so many different translations to choose from, it helps to read and understand His word. my kids use it as well. the famz is a fan of the audio, read to me style feature. oh - bro - almost forgot - you can pick different voices like Waze only Bible version!!! RAD!!

Good app with plenty of options to suit your spiritual needs for the season you are journeying through at any given time. However, I am totally u impressed with the audio bible. The narrator speaks in a monotone and the 'switch narrator' feature does not work. Would love access to more audio options.

I've used the app since it was launched, and I recommend it to everyone I know. Would you please bring back the feature to search actual words and phrases in the text order. For example, if I search for steadfast love, I get many results that don't contain either word, and the results aren't in Biblical order. This might be good for topical searches, but it makes word studies impossible. Thanks again for all your work!

This was my favorite app. I've had this app for over 5 years. Wondering if the company changed their IT contractors or switched to a different platform. At any rate, there are a lot of bugs. I can't sign in using my email account. I'm rerouted to the sign in. I used to be able to view the verse of the day, even when I'm not signed in. This is no longer the case. I've Uninstalled and reinstalled several times; changed to a different email, contacted customer support, all to no avail. I give up!

Great app. I don't know if this is a bug or not, but when I select a book, then I select a chapter, then I select a verse of my choice, I push play, and it just plays from the beginning. No matter what, it always just plays from the beginning. I was also having trouble when coming back later to read more of what book I am in it starts back in previous chapters I have already read, not from where I left off. Love this app. please have your programmers fix these areas so we can enjoy W/confidence

This is my favorite bible app. I love the ability to compare to a wide variety of versions. I wish we could group bookmarks for easier study and be able to view notes without leaving the chapter we are reading. I also wish we were able to select individual words to study. The ability to share verses to different platforms such as Instagram has changed and I hope the issue can be resolved. As a person who cannot have much screen time I look forward to more audio versions.

The app is great in general. Tons of Bible translations available in a plethora of languages. There are just a few technical things that bug me: my Daily Verse widget never quite seems to work right (doesn't keep updated day-to-day, and it automatically uses the translation I was most recently reading in rather than the version I specifically selected in the settings), and I wish there was a way to open the app directly to the Bible every time rather than through the app's Home screen.

It has an audio book part, and as someone who has an extremely hard time concentrating at only one thing at a time (dont ask because I dont understand either) this is an amazing feature. It has all versions of the bible too so you can use whichever one you want. It also has a ton of plans for verses to read that differ every day to help overcome sins. It has highlighting features, clarifications, and much more. I would reccomend this to anyone who wants to know God better! Also for typos!

I don't use this app for very many things, but I have been using this app for it's electronic bibles for 15+ years! I love the large variety in it's various translations. Some of the translations have an Audiobook with it, which I think the audio could be improved, I don't like that if I pause the audio in the middle of a chapter it starts the whole chapter over when I press play unless I'm hitting play within a minute of pausing. It makes it difficult to get through big chapters like Psalm 119.

An incredible tool for reading the Bible. Featuring more translations than the sand on the beach in countless languages, along with hundreds of plans for every square inch of the Bible, all completely free with no ads. There's a few nitpicks I have (such as the red text not being great for some translations and the continuous scrolling feature being bit inconsistent sometimes) but other than that, this app is literally perfect.

title: Remini - AI Photo Enhancer
description:
Turn your old, pixelated, blurred, or damaged pictures into high-definition photos with just one tap! 

Generate mind-blowing and professional looking AI Photos of yourself with the powerful photo enhancer Remini.

Remini uses state-of-the-art Artificial Intelligence to unblur, restore, and enhance any image you want. Take your old memories and give them a new lease of life in stunning, crystal clear HD.

Over 100 million photos now revitalized. The Remini photo editor is one of the most popular and beloved enhancer apps in the world. Scan your old family photos, revitalize them, and reminisce together!

-------- Use Remini to... --------
- Turn your portrait, selfie, or group picture into HDâ€”itâ€™s incredible with face details!
- Repair old, blurry, scratched photos
- Clear vintage and old camera photos
- Sharpen and unblur out of focus pictures
- Increase the number of pixels in low quality photos and retouch them

We put constant work into the AI model to bring continuous improvements and new features to make your experience satisfying! Check back for the latest updates.

The app is available in: English, Hindi, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified and Traditional Chinese, Spanish, and Thai.

Subscribe or to have unlimited access to all the premium features as well.
â€¢ Subscription length: weekly, yearly
â€¢ Your payment will be charged to your Google Account as soon as you confirm your purchase.
â€¢ You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal from your Account Settings after the purchase.
â€¢ Your subscription will renew automatically, unless you turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
â€¢ The cost of renewal will be charged to your account in the 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.
â€¢ When canceling a subscription, your subscription will stay active until the end of the period. Auto-renewal will be disabled, but the current subscription will not be refunded.
â€¢ Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when purchasing a subscription.

Have a feature request you would like to see in a future version of the app? Do not hesitate to contact us at support-android@remini.ai  

Terms of Service: https://www.bendingspoons.com/tos.html?app=1470373330
Privacy Policy: https://www.bendingspoons.com/privacy.html?app=1470373330

Versions older than Android 7 may not support the most recent updates.

scraped_reviews.content: the ads are out of freaking control. had to watch the video twice and sit there for over a minute before a little x finally popped up too close the add... and that was just to get to the flipping home screen!!! I go to edit a pic and now I have to watch another ad! Bruh, I sure as hell am not going to pay for your app if I can't even play around with it first.

The enhancement and filters are some of the best, and I haven't been able to find an app that compares, nor an app that can do both photos and videos, but a $10 weekly subscription to increase the quality of a handful of photos and maybe a short video is ridiculous. I don't care about the dumb ai "turn into a cartoon" or "turn into a doll" features, nor do I care about all the extra filters and what not. I just want to make my camera quality look halfway decent and maybe blur the background. ðŸ˜­

This used to be a good photo enhancing app where you could watch an ad to enhance a photo. The limited options were even fine. But now? You get stuck in a never-ending ad loop with each ad being over a minute long, and you NEVER actually get to edit a photo. Unless you want to pay $10-$15 A WEEK give this app a hard pass. It is absolutely not worth it. Deleted.

I used to really love this app I use it every day to clean up pixels and color correct my artwork. over the past few months, I've been getting a ton of forced ads that aren't associated with any function. I didn't mind watching ads as a payment for an action in the app, but having to watch 5 ads to clean up one picture is ridiculous, especially when we're capped at 5 uses a day. update: now half the ads won't close. I have to close the app, reopen it, and watch another forced ad

Used to be great, now it's like every other app. Back when I installed this I was able to enhance photos, edit them, etc.. all as much as I wanted. There were hardly any ads whatsoever. Now though, ever since they added AI edits, they sure are proud of themselves. $9.99 a week paywall for literally every single edit? You're crazy.. this is why people pirate apps.

In the past, when we used to use Remini to edit our photos, just one ad before editing and one ad after editing would appear, and it was good. However, nowadays, we have to watch five or more ads before and after editing, and some of those ads are even one minute long. This has really made me stop using Remini. Just because we are free users doesn't mean we have unlimited time. You have to think about your users' satisfaction as well, not just your own. One ad before and after was acceptable.

it's good at enhancing photos, but the ads are annoying. One ad for opening the app, one ad for enhancing, and one ad for saving the picture. Also, I'm very glad they remove the feature where you have to pay to remove their "fixed lighting". I couldn't use the app for a while because they're fixed lighting usually just whitewashed the models put into the program. Like, not even joking. Nothing else would change but their skin color. Good program all being said.

The free version used to give you a few ads before and after working on each pic. Now it's so full of ads that are increasingly harder to get passed, that it's not worth my time to keep using it. As for the product itself, it still needs to improve the way it deals with hair, hands and sometimes the eyes. As a Photoshop user, I would merely use Remini to aid myself with some issues but I've never used an image enhanced by Remini in full. I just don't love what it does.

I've got to say, the Remini app is a total game-changer! It's an AI-powered photo editing tool that can take your low-quality photos and turn them into stunning, high-definition images. I've seen it work its magic on old, blurry photos, and the results are nothing short of amazing Â¹. One of the standout features of Remini is its ability to enhance faces in photos. It can take a blurry, low-resolution image and turn it into a sharp, detailed portrait.

Was good. Not anymore! This app was definitely good for enhancing my photos. But for some reason now, it makes all my photos super bright. Even photos of darkskin, people. Update: I had a plan that allowed me to use both the phone app version as well as the desktop version. When I tried to use the desktop version one day, it told me I needed a business account. Or basically saying if you want to use that portion of Remini now, you have to pay more. LOL, such a joke now and I've found a better.

There are so many things wrong with this app. For one,it takes so long to upload and create your images. Yep, pick the model, and you have to do that one only until you choose the next set, then you have to wait several minutes for it to do that one. The main thing is the price! Can't you just charge a one time flat fee or at the least a monthly LOW fee?! ALSO: After paying for the pro version, I received a message saying you are only allowed to edit up to 6 p pictures per day! SMH!

This app used to be amazing but has become far too expensive to continuously pay WEEKLY. If you want to edit one photo without paying for it, you'll have to watch about 10 minutes of ads. You used to be able to watch two ads (three tops) if you wanted to do one photo, and now it's at least eight to get full control over it. I hope this app goes back to how it used to be since it was perfect, but became a cash grab like all the rest.

I had an account on my old phone, and it worked great! Downloaded the app with the new one and it auto logged me in as anonymous, there was no option to login and I can't seem to login/out now. I had bought several pro enhance credits which I hadn't used, that are still on my old account. It seems you can't buy those anymore at all, and overall they've removed a ton of functionality. The actual enhancing functionality itself is still great.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! Please donâ€™t hesitate to drop us an email at reviews@bendingspoons.com â€” weâ€™d be more than happy to help you out personally.

scraped_reviews.content: I'd be lying if i said this app wasn't cool...But, It takes a long time to generate, which is not a problem, I should be able to cancel the generator or at least be asked if I'm sure I want to generate the picture, once you generate you have to wait the time it gives you which can be 5-10 minutes or more. Over all, it generates very accurate and well, it can sometimes give you three arms and 6 legs lol, It's a really fun app. It just has a few things that could be fix.

Not what it used to be by far. Costs more for lesser quality. Years ago when I first started using it, it was only a 5 dollar monthly payment for Remini Pro and photos came out crisp and beautiful. Now you have to pay the same per week as you used to per month for the subscription version, and the photos somehow look worse after enhancing, not better. Looking for a new photo enhancement app.

I cancelled the subscription after the introductory pricing of a dollar or so (week 2) and it continued to charge me full price for a couple of months with nowhere to get a refund! To make it worse, they charge WEEKLY. On top of that, the app only works half the time, takes forever to generate, and never let me use any of the premium features. DO NOT DOWNLOAD.

Don't get this app. It's a scam for money. You'll waste more time watching ads than actually getting what you want out of the app. You can't even edit more than 5 photos a day, and have to pay for a *weekly* subscription if you want more access. But for what? Limited versions of an enchantments that don't even recognize accurate features of your photos? I hope someone else makes a better app for enhancing photos. Remini went way downhill. Sad. I'm convinced anyone leaving a good review is a bot.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there, thanks for sharing your opinion with us. We're sorry to hear about what you experienced with the enhanced photos you downloaded from Remini. Don't hesitate to reach out to us at reviews@bendingspoons.com, including a screenshot â€” we'd love to take a closer look!

scraped_reviews.content: Ugh. Between the never ending ADS, and the very subpar quality of the the AI, I cannot see dealing with what the nonsense of a pro card. Truly for me, it's not that serious enough for me to spend any money at all on something that's a time kill. It's relatable to only a target group of people perhaps that have some old photographs that they may want to enhance but other than that nah. I was taking pictures off the tv and stuff and then you want some money for it? Not that serious.

Works great for photo enhancing usually. Although it can be a hit or miss. AI works well too for the many times I used it however, recently I keep getting an error message saying they can't retrieve my photos and have to do it over. It is a little frustrating that I keep having to go back and wait 10-15 minutes for 5 new photos when before it takes a minute and I didn't have to add my photos over and over. Restarting the app, etc. did nothing. I'll change my rating much higher when they fix it.

When you open the app, Remini instantly tries to push you into buying the premium version. Every time you open it. The newest update also changes skin tones (I'm very pale naturally and the newest update darkens me at least three shades- still pale, but not how I actually look) and also adds/changes makeup to the photo with no way of opting out of the "correction." The overall results still look pretty good, but they're a bit skewed.

I used this app b4 & it was OUTSTANDING! Sure, I had to watch an ad or 3 & could only enhance like 3 photos a day,but they look FANTASTIC! NOW, I can't do ANYTHING without picking a subscription. And a LOT of the reviews aren't very flattering. Seems like they want your money & that's that. Free trial SHOULD NOT automatically roll over to subscription. Shouldn't have to give any payment info until AFTER you have a chance to try it. Uninstalling.

Used to be great, now it's terrible. Half the time the image doesn't upload, the other half it won't save when you're done. Ah but don't worry, the ads always work, and it's always the longest 30 secs + 15 secs ads, and because the image won't upload or save you have to try against and that means watching yet another ad. Good job, you had an amazing app and you broke it, but I understand, it's not a bug, it's a feature ðŸ™ƒ

My one week trial was AMAZING! I decided to keep going with it. Then, all of a sudden it changed. In 24hrs, it went from wow to what the?? It turns my photos orange, it make eyes too far apart and it no longer adds that crispness to the barely blurry photos. I paid for a week, just to cancel on day 2. ðŸ˜’ Very disappointed. They offered me another free trial, I took it, but it doesn't do me any good now. Going to Uninstall.

The app works wonders on close-ranged photos and enhancing facial details. However, it only seems to correct what's around the face and leaves the surrounding image blurry. Photos taken from a distance don't look right at all. I would recommend only using this on a photo of one or two people (max!). It gets the job done as long as the image isn't incredibly busy or anything.

Was great - at first. Now? It's turning into junk. They've added ads (l pay monthly and have been for years!) AND now they will no longer keep photos that you've paid to improve. We keep losing features and it's not improving in quality. The images keep getting more and more blurry as it tries to sharpen things. A lot of my images now look worse after using the app... soooo.... There's no way to fine tune the effects. It's all or nothing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there Matt, we're truly sorry to hear this! If you're paying for a monthly plan, we confirm your experience as a subscriber shouldn't include ads. Please don't hesitate to reach out to us via email, we'd love to hear from you and personally check your case!

scraped_reviews.content: 3 ads within seconds of each other to process, finish processing, and then save to device? Absolutely ridiculous. I understand they want to make money, and it appeared that this product would be something I would subscribe to, but after showing a complete lack of regard toward the end user in their pursuit of the almighty dollar, I think I'll skip this one. There's plenty of other apps out there that won't try to monetize every single second of usage like Remini does. Greed. Pure and simple.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Brandon, we regret receiving this feedback on Remini. We always appreciate any input from our users so thank you for the time you dedicated to letting us know your opinion, we'll keep it into account for future updates and improvements. If you feel like sharing any other suggestions, donâ€™t hesitate to drop a line to reviews@bendingspoons.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Does a great job at clearing up faces in old and blurry photos. Unfortunately it ONLY does the faces, and everything else is untouched. I'm sure that's a lot harder for an algorithm to fix though, because faces always contain certain things, and backgrounds can be literally anything. It'd also be great if Remini could remove specks and damage, and restore colors. Also, I think the cost is fair, but instead of a subscription, I'd rather just pay a week at a time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Bryan! Weâ€™re happy to hear that youâ€™re satisfied with Remini. Also, we appreciate your feedback and weâ€™ll treasure it for future improvements: we're working hard to improve our AI model! Any other ideas are warmly welcomed: why donâ€™t you drop us an email at reviews@bendingspoons.com? Weâ€™d be more than happy to hear from you!

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using Remini for almost 4 months and loved it; so much I paid for a yearly subscription. There were so many options to use. I had to reset my phone & when I downloaded the app again, it's totally different. The only options now are Enhance and Enhance+. Everything else is gone. It changed on my tablet too (which I did not reset). *Edit* I just looked at the user manual. It used to say a lot about using the advanced features & Pro Cards. Not now. They removed all that.

does a good job enhancing photos. you can see the basic enhancement but there are two "better" ones that you can't even look at unless you sign up for a 'free' week which then turns into a weekly payment. pass. But, the basic editor looks pretty good and for the simple price of watching an ad before seeing the picture and then watching an ad to save the picture, it does pretty good.

This really is a phenomenal program which instantly enhances photos saving an incredible amount of time on processes that would take much longer to do manually in Photoshop. However, I loathe subscription-based products which is why I still use Photoshop CS6 (the last standalone edition) and will never "upgrade". If you had a standalone product, I would happily buy it; but I refuse to "rent" a program like this which, honestly, I wouldn't even use all that much.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Eric, we're sorry that you're not satisfied with the current subscription options. We'll gladly treasure your feedback for our future improvements: our goal is to make sure that Remini meets the needs of all our passionate users. Don't hesitate to reach out at reviews@bendingspoons.com for any questions or suggestions!

scraped_reviews.content: This is an amazing app! I could finally make my photos new from my childhood which I was always feeling pity that there were no good cameras at that time as today. But there are there things which I could be more happy with. 1. Sometimes it takes too long, and never ends loading to show the result. 2. Premium version is expensive, and 5 photos are not enough to be on free version. 3. PC app is missing.

What the hell did you do to this app? I've been paying for premium for >year and all of a sudden it's completely different and doesn't even work. Before, my photos were world's better. Now, they aren't enhanced but rather just brightened significantly until I turn off the new filter feature (which takes ANOTHER period of waiting just to rerender the photo). and the new photo is basically unaltered. Additionally, the closeups on all faces that appear at the bottom of an edit is GONE. Very unhappy
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Weâ€™re sorry to hear that you're not satisfied with the latest update. Thanks for pointing out the aspects you think we should improve. We work hard to make sure our users are provided with the best experience possible and your feedback helps us guide our projects. If you feel like adding anything, you can find us at reviews@bendingspoons.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Doesn't do anything. Selected "enhance" with a picture from my photo gallery, I'm a portrait artist and needed to clear up a pic because it was an old photograph of the deceased and I needed some help figuring out the blanks, well after I tapped " enhance" it showed me a screen about what it does for 5 seconds, then went back to the "enhance" or "enhance+" home screen. No change to photo, no indication that it had done anything to the photo either. ðŸ‘ I've never been so irritated at an app.

I'd give this 0 stars if possible. The app used to be great with multiple features. If used subtly, it produced great results. There's so many great free mobile apps out there, I rarely buy any...until i found this. HOWEVER, a few days after I bought an annual subscription, the company removed all but 2 features. I'm not sure if they changed something on their back end, but new results are far worse than before. Emails to CS go unanswered. I'm just hoping Google refunds my purchase.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we're sorry to hear your feedback on your experience with Remini. Please don't hesitate to drop us an email at reviews@bendingspoons.com â€” we'd be happy to answer all your questions!

scraped_reviews.content: I DO NOT RECOMMEND installing this app. It used to be great, even free. You'd get an ad per photo done and only a couple per day. Now you get multiple full screen ads (even if you dont edit anything) that are not only unskippable, but it also will install a game in the background. It has an automatic filter that usually overexposes the photo and you have to watch another ad just to remove it, another to save. Stay away and find a better app!

Requires you to enter an email before you can use the app at all. I do not like this. This is not an app you can buy and use. You have to buy 'cards' that you use for each image, about $1.00 an image. You get 3 free 'credits' per day. When you select an image it puts you in a virtual 'cue' and you have to wait a minute+ to even see if the image is fixed in an acceptable way. If it isn't, tough luck, you have already spent your credit on it. Cost too much to have fun with or get much use out of.

Horrible. If you want to do anything you have to sign up for a 1 week free trial or be stuck watching a ton of ads. Just as bad as some games out there. Sad really. After the 1 week trial , it automatically starts billing you. Makes you watch an ad to enhance a photo, then right after that it makes you watch another to save. Most ads are 30 seconds. So about 1 minute worth of ads to do about 5 seconds of work. NOT WITH THE HASSLE! What a joke!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for sharing your feedback! We put a lot of hard work into improving Reminiâ€”hence, we ask our users to pay for a subscription to use the app without limits and we include a free trial for you to try the PRO version before starting a subscription. A limited version is also available for free. We get your emails at reviews@bendingspoons.com!

scraped_reviews.content: Terrible for anything that is not a face, such as text. Tries to push you into paying immediately, without even knowing if it works, and then has ads for everything. Didnt bother trying with other photographs because of the constant ads. Dont bother with it. I didnt sign up for a subscription or the free trial, i had better not be charged for a subscription.

Looked fun and wanted to try the trial to see if I wanted to get the full package, started trial for the 1.99 version. When it asked if I wanted to try the 9.99 instead. With how it was worded, figured it was asking about the trial and thought why not. Same screens as before. Instead it charged me and now I just don't want to navigate the app because of all that. Made a couple pictures, was fun and probably would've kept the 1.99 version but I feel like I was cheated out of $10. Unistalled

Recently, It just will not work for me. I contacted support and I uninstalled and reinstalled. I cancelled my subscription and resubscribed to the yearly rate. I'm getting an error that it is a problem on their side. They ask for a screen shot. I sent them 3. It has been almost a week dealing with no fix. I am waiting for a response. As of yet, NOTHING! I subscribed for a week with a different email and it worked. No one has gotten back with me. I need my yearly subscription to work.

They overwhelme you with ads! EVERY time to tap something, you are prompted to pay the subscription, if you say no, ad! You want to go into a filter, ad. Choosing your photo once inside, ad. After ad is done, it sends you back to starting page WITHOUT giving you your edited photo. Then start over back at square one. You'll be 9 ads in and still not have a single edited photo. I'm all for watching ads, but this is just too much.

Edit: I went to cancel and the language on the cancel subscription screen is VERY misleading and I have picture and video. That took my rating from a 4 to a 1. Remove that ASAP! You shouldn't have to trick people into paying for your app! After hitting "cancel subscription" a screen pops up that offers a paid version or an option to "go back to limited" and there is a "continue" button. I hit continue to complete the cancelation and instead it locked me in to pay for a week THEN cancel!

Charged $10 after initial 1 time use. Saw the ad on Instagram about trying it out. You go through the entire process and at the end they charge you to receive your photos. So I did, paid the few dollars only to be automatically opted in to their subscription. Was also supposed to get a link to my AI photos after downloading the app (after paying) and never did. They won't refund you after purchase is made. If they have to rely on this method to get money, it just shows it's not worth it.

I couldn't do anything at all without paying. Was never offered a free trial at all. The only available options were $2.99/week, $9.99/week, & "Restore Purchases." Just to see what would would happen, I hit "Restore Purchases" and it said that there were no purchases to restore. Both options for $2.99 and $9.99 were trying to charge me right out immediately. I would like a chance to try it to see if I will like it before paying for it. App data and cache cleared from phone and uninstalled.

Was great not anymore. You need to now pay for every option. There are free options but are now very limited. And they are not free. You must watch a ad when app opens. When you select a option. When you want to change. And when you want to save. Plus the ads are scam. Cause the exit buttons leads to play store. You need to attempt to press several times. Flipping back and forth from this app and play store to actually exit. This app was the greatest. Now is very very bad.

This app is decent but it requires some improvements. Some pictures add too many arms or a piece of an arm or hand is added. Sometimes the arms or legs are too long for the body size. The hair feature mixes up the styles/textures or a portion of the hair hangs off. It would be nice to incorporate a few different heights and physical body types. The ai facial features are spot on at times. I would give it a higher star rating if it would fix the disfigured creature features.

It keeps saying "oops something went wrong. Please check your internet connection and try again later". I tried it with both my data and wifi on. I tried it with 1 on and the other off. But it continues to say that after making me watch an ad. Wasting my time making me watch ads, yet won't do anything with my photos. Restarting my phone didn't make a difference either so it's the app, not my phone. Pictures aren't always accurate so don't waste your time on this app.

It's a decent photo enhancer, but nothing special. You only get to enhance 5 photos a day unless you get their pro subscription, which sucks because I'm a photographer/artist and it would be nice if it didn't take 6 days to enhance all of my photos. Plus, the enhancer itself is really wonky; most of the time it just weirdly smooths everything out, putting many things into the uncanny valley. Overall, it's an okay app. Nothing great, but it's not bad.

WTH?! So, been paying for this app for more than a year, and it is just they clearly don't have it together, changes they make cause problems. I have a yellow warning box at the top "we're experiencing unusually high traffic" and it doesn't work at all for me! I find it ridiculous for what you all charge for this app to ever have these type of issues! How about fix it, or refund me all these months that it has been working sub-par at best!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Nelda! Weâ€™re truly sorry for the inconvenience you faced. What you reported might be due to a temporary network issue. Should you still be facing the same, please donâ€™t hesitate to let us know. You can find us at reviews@bendingspoons.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Used to be much better and do more things, I paid for the subscription. I saw the new version and its results and cancelled my subscription. I can't use it like it is. I just have no use for the current version.

I messaged customer service. They told me to request a refund from the individual. The individual never responded and blocked me. I tried to involve cash app again. Their response was "Sorry. Is there anything else we can do for you? Not everyone out there is a good person and CashApp damn sure won't reimburse you!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We know itâ€™s always worrisome when you send funds to the wrong person, Joby. To prevent this in the future verify the correct info of the person and double-check their $Cashtag. Our team would be glad to take a look at this with you, just write in here: https://cash.app/contact - weâ€™ll investigate right away.

scraped_reviews.content: Absolutely love this free debit card account. Very easy to add money from your linked account. Very easy to pay and receive money from other CashApp users. It has rewards and incentives. It really is a must have for your wallet. Works both tangibly as a functional debit card and as a digital means to manage your money. The app is arranged quite organically and is easy to learn and navigate. Kudos to the CashApp devs!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're very happy to know you're enjoying Cash App, Ann! We appreciate your feedback, so we can keep giving you the best experiences. If you ever need us, you can find all the different ways to contact us here: https://cash.app/contact.

scraped_reviews.content: the WORST experience i have had with any app up to date. do NOT use them. they will withhold your money from you, make you jump through the same hoops over and over again that dont fix anything, and still nothing was fixed. im pretty sure they had my information down wrong, but there's no way in app for ME to check and edit. I was straight up denied help at one point from support because I wasnt verified, even though my verification was the issue I was trying to obtain help with. awful. awful.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Cali, this is not the experience we want you to have! Ensuring our customers receive the support they need is a top priority for us, and we'd love for an opportunity to change your mind and resolve any issues you may have with your verification process. Feel free to reach out to us here: https://help.cash.app/3128.

scraped_reviews.content: Support is really bad. Extremely slow responses, and all they do is send you basic information you can find online. Basically if Google didnt solve your issue, the app is apparently just broken & support won't help you. Took re-explaining my issue 4 times for them to even understand and then it ended in basically "sorry cashapp won't let you add a new card, try again tomorrow." Basic function that should be working anyway. Their scam protection is also a joke, blocks my friends but not scammers.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Ensuring our customers receive the support they need is a top priority for us, Kayla. We understand you may not have received the assistance you were expecting in the past, but we're happy to help how we can from here. If you ever need assistance or have any feedback, please don't hesitate to contact us, here: https://help.cash.app/4lv4Wd1

scraped_reviews.content: Absolute joke of an app. It's blocking all my debit cards from transferring funds and now it won't even let me add another debit card to try. They sponsor presales then won't even let you add funds to do the presale. Also no way for them to override the block when you contact support to verify it's your card and your account. Genuinely beyond frustrating.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Hannah, if there is anything wrong with your account, we would be happy to look into it further. Please give us a second chance and contact us, we're just a message away: https://help.cash.app/3128.

scraped_reviews.content: While using this app the past 2 years have been fantastic. I have recently been stuck in a corner where I have been attempted to be charged some amounts via Amazon. I have spoken to both amazon and cash app support. Cash app support had said to pick up a new card which I had. The immediate next day another charge on a brand new card that hasn't touched anything. I went back to support just to be told that they can't so anything because the charge hadn't gone through. I refuse to keep this going
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We understand that not receiving the support that you expected may be inconvenient. A merchant may make pre-approved or recurring attempts on your Cash App Card. To learn more about unauthorized transactions, check out this article: http://help.cash.app/309116. Please be sure to contact us, so we can investigate this issue: https://cash.app/contact

scraped_reviews.content: Works great, but if you hit that "instant withdrawal" by mistake, you are screwed. No confirming it, no double checking, just BOOM, it's done, and $10 is gone. Hence, the 2 stars. (Edit: chatted with help and they refunded the fee. Thank you and moved this up a star. Still need to fix the app so this isn't so easy to do by mistake)

scraped_reviews.userName: Don't mind me. Just a guy on the internet.
scraped_reviews.content: Closed my account for no reason. Told me I violated the terms of service and closed it without telling me what I did. Thankfully I downloaded the the app to pay someone and only used it a few times after so I wasn't dependent on it. It tells you to email them, but doesn't give you an address. I'm not going to even bother though, why waste my time when I can just download another app that does all the same stuff but doesn't try to steal your money?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We definitely understand how unideal it can be to have your account closed. You can learn more by checking out this article: https://squ.re/cashapptos. We'd like to take a closer look. You can find the different ways to reach out here: https://cash.app/contact.

scraped_reviews.content: I'll bump it up to 5 stars when you fix these two things. 1) The PlayStation/Xbox boosts need to go back up to 10% off or even to 15% off 2) We shouldn't have to be charged for cashing out instantly. That's just as bad as ATMs having fees because you're simply stealing our money. Edit: The app has slowly begun getting back in my good graces but I do find it utterly ridiculous that we have to pay to order a new card if ours gets lost or damaged.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Perri, weâ€™re always looking to improve our products based on our customersâ€™ feedback, and enjoy hearing how we can make Cash App as useful as it can be. If you'd like to tell us more or need our help, please don't hesitate to reach out here: https://help.cash.app/3128.

scraped_reviews.content: They closed my account suddenly for "violating TOS" I made no unusual purchases or transfers (dunkin' donuts, candy crush, my oil bill, never sent more than 100, and NEVER out of my town,state or country) I asked for a review thinking it MUST be a mistake. After 30 DAYS they REFUSE to tell me what term was violated or what transaction violated it. I am left with NO explanation as to why this happened. I don't work for the cartel, traffic anyone or ANYTHING close to illegal. DONT TRUST THEM
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Brennan, we understand how important it is for you to have clarity about this situation with your account, and how important it is to use your direct deposit without any issues. We would like to take a closer look at this with you, so please, contact us here: https://help.cash.app/3128, and we will be happy to help you.

scraped_reviews.content: it's so much easier to do my daily errands knowing I have cash app to pay with. I have the ease of locking & unlocking the card when I'm using it to ensure no one can access it and no businesses can use my card without my knowledge. I wish we had this earlier in life to prevent overdraft fees & unauthorized account charges to my banks. It would have saved me thousands in dollars & even more precious time in my life fixing issues that should have been avoided financially. Thanks Cash App!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Mary, it's amazing to hear how much Cash App has simplified your routine and helped you stay in control of your finances. We love knowing the security features have made a real difference for you. Donâ€™t forget, weâ€™re always here to help if you need us: https://help.cash.app/4hxd2kO.

scraped_reviews.content: Still really good! Just updated it, and it is still simple and easy to use! My only problem now is that I have my Netflix linked to my Cash App and when I get enough money after Netflix couldn't take money, I can't go and pay for it, I have to wait for it to Auto transact and that's only in the morning and afternoon. Maybe it's just other apps not allowing it and Cash App is just following standards, but it frustrates me when I can't pay when I have enough money
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your review and understand how inconvenient it can be to have trouble opening the app. Please allow us to take a closer look into this for you, and also, share more information about notes for payments. You can get in contact here: https://help.cash.app/43OkKRY. We'll assist you right away.

title: Lightroom Photo & Video Editor
description:
Adobe Lightroom â€” meet a smarter photo editor. Make any photo special with our easy, yet powerful picture editor. Lightroom is here to help you get shareworthy photos in seconds â€” to capture sunsets, family moments, or your latest foodie find. Retouch photos with our state of the art photo editor tools that allow you to fix pictures, enhance photo quality, and edit videos.

Whether youâ€™re curating a social feed or snapping a photograph â€” retouch photos with editing tools in your pocket with this photo editor. Lightroom is here to help you create photos youâ€™re proud to share.

WHY YOU SHOULD TRY LIGHTROOM:

TOUCH UP YOUR PHOTOS WITH OUR PHOTO EDITORâ€¨
- Photo retouch: In a few taps, make a photograph brighter, soften a background, or touch out blemishes.
- One-tap features: Retouch with Quick Actions and Adaptive Presets that let you enhance photo quality in seconds.
- Presets for photos: Discover filters or make your own signature look.
- Video Editing: Touch up videos with tools for light, color, and presets.

REMOVE DISTRACTIONS AND BLUR THE BACKGROUND
- Picture editor tools that give professional results.
- Touch up photos and blur the photo background for a polished look.
- Adjust the finer details, or use Generative Remove to remove objects and erase people from a photo.

STATE OF THE ART PHOTO EDITOR
- Take control of light with tools to tweak exposure, highlights, and shadows.
- Photo retouch, play with presets, HD photo effects, color grading, hue, saturation and add a blur or bokeh effect.
- AI photo editor: These tools suggest the best edits for your images. Touch up photos quickly or add your unique style to an HD photo, no experience required.

FIND COMMUNITY INSPIRATIONâ€¨
- Browse photo filters and presets shared by photo enthusiasts around the world.
- Match your aesthetic with inspiration from the community: Whether theyâ€™re bold edits with an AI photo editor or subtle tweaks for a polished portrait edit, find a look that matches your style â€” or create your own.

EDIT ONCE, APPLY IT TO MULTIPLE PHOTOS
- Photo editing that is quick, easy, and effortless.
- Batch edit photos: Create consistent editing across a group of photos when you copy and paste your edits across multiple photos.
- Save your favorites and make every photo feel like you.

Download Lightroom today.

Terms & Conditions:

Your use of this application is governed by the Adobe General Terms of Use http://www.adobe.com/go/terms_en and the Adobe Privacy Policy http://www.adobe.com/go/privacy_policy_en

Do not sell or share my personal information www.adobe.com/go/ca-rights
