summary: Perfect portraits in one tap: Blur backgrounds, remove blemishes, smooth skin.

scraped_reviews.content: I have used this app for years and pay for it. Never had any issues with the mobile version which is what I use most. Gave 5 stars. At some point in the last month or two, the app is acting really strangely. When I choose a photo to edit, the image itself changes as if glitching before I've even done anything to it. Recently, after doing a bunch of edits and downloading to my phone, it downloads the original image, without edits. I don't know what changed but it is almost unusable at this point.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jessica! Sorry you're having trouble. We would like to hear more about what's going on. Please mail us at LrAndroid-Feedback@adobe.com and we will do what we can to figure it out. Please include screenshots and the specific steps to recreate your issue. ^RC

scraped_reviews.content: BEWARE! signed up for a free trial to edit some photos for my sister. Long story short I forgot to cancel and started getting billed the 30$ a month. Whoops! I finally get around to canceling my subscription and come to find out there is an 89.00$ cancelation fee! this was never disclosed to me during the sign up process, but best believe it's in their contract. Unless you plan on using Adobe products for well over a year at least 20 some dollars a month I would discourage you. Hefty Fee if not
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there! Thanks for sharing this with us. We understand how upsetting unexpected charges or fees can be. All trial, billing, and cancellation terms are shown in the subscription details, but we know this can still feel unclear. If you share more details, at [adobe.ly/contactsupport] weâ€™ll do our best to assist you. ^RC

scraped_reviews.content: October 2025: still no hdr support for non-Pixel devices The recent update to Google Photos made it nearly unusable, so I decided to give this one a shot. Overall, the results are great. However, the sliders have such a small touch area that it takes multiple attempts to grab them. Also the area selection is really frustrating because it constantly gets confused between zoom/pan and selection. once you do get in selection mode, the finger brush is inaccurate and hard to brush around edges.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there! Thanks for this detailed feedback! Weâ€™re glad youâ€™re enjoying the results. HDR support for more devices is something the team continues to explore. Weâ€™ve also noted your points about slider sensitivity and selection controlsâ€”please share a short screen recording at LrAndroid-Feedback@adobe.com so we can review and assist you further.

scraped_reviews.content: Most useless app ever! I have a paid subscription and I can't save edits, can't export photos, the app crashes repeatedly. I've tried everything to make it work again. Bugs have always existed, but this is beyond ridiculous. Historically, the more updates, features and "bug fixes," the less Lightroom actually functions. What is the point when I can't perform any actions? I can't even see the photos in my library..they're just black boxes. You owe me a refund.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Shanna! Weâ€™re very sorry for the troubleâ€”you should be able to save and export without issues. Could you share a screen recording and crash logs at LrAndroid-Feedback@adobe.com ? Guide: https://adobe.ly/LrMobileLogs . We appreciate your patience and will do our best to resolve this quickly. ^RC

scraped_reviews.content: Useless app. As always, you have to pay just to make even the smallest change to your images. Thereâ€™s nothing you can actually do with this app without paying. There are plenty of free software. Photopea, for example, offers quality editing without costing a single penny. Adobe used to be an awesome company back in the day. Iâ€™ve not been buying Adobe in the last 10 years since they started charging a monthly service. There are thousands of users like me who don't support Adobe anymore.

App works well, just the AI remover needs quite a bit of work. The options given are not always what I need and I end up having to again do some major editing in Photoshop, which is fine, but some of the AI stuff over there isn't much better.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, sorry you're having trouble. We would like to hear more about what's going on. Please mail us at DL-LrAndroid-Feedback, LrAndroid-Feedback@adobe.com and we will do what we can to figure it out. Please include screenshots and the specific steps to recreate your issue. ^Rc

scraped_reviews.content: It's seemingly impossible to cancel the subscription/premium version. PLEASE cancel my subscription. Adobe isn't helping, Samsung isn't helping, and I can't get anyone to respond to my inquiries. The app itself is okay, I enjoy tinkering with all of the editing options, though the quality after editing could certainly be better. I just don't want to continue paying for premium when I rarely use it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Ashley! Sorry you're having trouble. We would like to hear more about what's going on. Please mail us at LrAndroid-Feedback@adobe.com and we will do what we can to figure it out. Please include screenshots and the specific steps to recreate your issue. ^RC

scraped_reviews.content: Trash app for phone. Do not waste your money The app cannot select the sky properly in photos, nor the background in photos, nor the people. It's sad considering how well it works on a computer. Trying to manually select these things is impossible even with a stylus as the app is glitchy and will jump ahead of the stylus. Trying to use your finger is impossible. Considering how fat a finger is compared to a stylus, trying to get sharp corners is impossible. Inability to feather or blend well.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Jennifer! Sorry to hear this! Weâ€™re actively improving our selection tools on mobile. Could you reach out via the in-app â€œHelp & Supportâ€ and share a screen recording of what youâ€™re seeing? Itâ€™ll really help us look into this further. Appreciate your time! ðŸ’™ ^RC

scraped_reviews.content: Warning: Removing objects from photos costs money. I downloaded this because the ad I saw showed that you can use it to easily remove objects from photos, so you can imagine how disappointed I was when I discovered that the removal feature costs money. All of the "free" features are things you can do on your device without the need for any special software. Needless to say, I uninstalled it immediately since it's useless.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Andy! Sorry for the disappointment. The object removal tool is part of our premium features, which support advanced AI editing. Weâ€™ll share your feedback with the team, as we understand expectations matter. Many free tools for editing and enhancing photos are still available. ^RC

scraped_reviews.content: As far as photo editing goes, Lightroom Android is reasonably powerful even if less so than the desktop version. There are key areas where this app is sub-par for people who edit many photos on-the-go: 1. The UI is clunky, making it difficult to review and rank many photos at once. I often accidentally switch from info mode to editing. 2. It is missing basic features such syncing photos in the background. I am continually frustrated by this.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Jennifer! Thanks for the detailed insightsâ€”we truly appreciate you taking the time to share them. We understand how important a smooth UI and background syncing are, especially for high-volume workflows. Weâ€™ve passed your feedback to the team to help us improve the mobile experience! ^RC

scraped_reviews.content: Horrible. Unfortunately I have to keep using this app because its the only mobile photo editing software with good features, but it's impossible to do anything w/o the app crashing like 3 times just for trying to edit a couple photos. Sometimes the app just plain out freezes and crashes before you even get a chance to do anything, (I have a new phone with everything updated to the newest version.) You'd expect a huge company to have a decent app ðŸ˜ Its been like this for over a year!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there! Sorry youâ€™ve had such a tough timeâ€”this isnâ€™t the experience we want for you. Since you're on a new device and still facing crashes, could you please share logs via https://adobe.ly/LrMobileLogs. Itâ€™ll really help us investigate further. Thanks,^RC

scraped_reviews.content: As a gig photographer this app has been a godsend, it's allowed me to create some reeeally cool photos. However, it crashes more and more, and more. Adding to a mask? Crash. Subtracting from a mask? Crash. Using Lens Blur? Big time crash. And it never saves progress if it crashes. I have to redo so many photos. I'm at a point where I jump in and out of a photo every minute so progress is saved. Also, jpegs don't look like the edits, and bulk watermarks adding to differing corners doesn't work
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there! We apologize for the trouble you are having with the app crash. Can you please follow these steps to generate diagnostic logs and share with us: https://adobe.ly/LrMobileLogs ^RC

scraped_reviews.content: The "Free" edition felt bland and unimpressive. These tools are already available for free through other apps on my phone, including many of their "premium" features. I can achieve the same results with just Google photos & Instagram. The app "PhotoRoom" offers so much more with their free edition.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there! Thanks for the feedback. Weâ€™re sorry the free version didnâ€™t stand out for you. Weâ€™ll pass your thoughts to the teamâ€”as weâ€™re always working to improve value and bring more powerful tools to all users. Appreciate you giving us a try! ^RC

scraped_reviews.content: This app works very well for editing RAW photos on my tablet, but the automatic cloud backup needs to be able to be fully turned off and not just "paused." I expected to be able to edit my files entirely locally and having them secretly uploaded (and presumably used for AI training) left a bad taste in my mouth.

Update. Still having this issue which a huge barrier in how I would use this application. editing photos is easy enough. I really dislike the forced use of the cloud as it's clumsy and for me, isnt exactly useful. but the main issue is I can't even open the app when I have no internet connection. I'm using a tablet so I don't have cellular, but I wanted to able to edit photos on the go. if the app can't even open, then it's rendered completely useless. I'm going to pursue a refund.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Sorry you're having trouble. We would like to hear more about what's going on. Please tell us at forums.adobe.com and we will do what we can to figure it out. Please include screenshots and the specific steps to recreate your issue. ^Rc

scraped_reviews.content: Honestly, this one of the best photo editing apps I've ever come across. Really taught me a lot on the technical stuff, and although there are some features that are only available via monthly payments (which is only about $5 per month and I'd gladly pay), it's still a really amazing app without them. A must for if you want to edit each specific parts of a photo better and wow anyone. It can also act as a stepping stone towards the CC desktop version, which is more complicated.

Since the last update all this app does is crash crash crash if you want to do a few simple things. I rely on this software. I edit mostly on a pc but when I want to use the app it should work. Now it doesn't. I've force stopped the app. I've signed out and back in. That's not the problem. Fix it soon.... I've been hearing such good things from other photographers about competing software lately.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Oh dear! I'm so sorry for the frustrating experience. We're here to help. When did the problem begin? Does the app crash on a particular action? Give us a detailed description on forums.adobe.com. Thanks ^Rc

scraped_reviews.content: I haven't been able to use this App at all today. It continues to crash within five seconds of opening. I've unistalled, force stopped, and clear cache many times. Nothing is working. I pay monthly to use this App to edit my photography pictures. I depend on this in order to get my clients their pictures in a timely manner. I'm extremely disappointed right now, but I hope to change my review if this problem gets fixed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for reporting the issue. We need additional information to investigate this issue further. If possible, please reach out to us on LrAndroid-Feedback@adobe.com for more instructions.

scraped_reviews.content: My last review was deleted, how convenient. Takes up to 20 minutes per photo to load development & now, it takes just as long if not longer, to get them saved to device & even then, they don't show up in my gallery unless I save each photo to my device multiple times, just to get it saved one time - since last update. Force closes constantly, takes HOURS to edit photos because of all of this. Up to 12-hours just to quick edit up to 10 photos, this is INSANE.

Mobile lightroom is too clunky. It exports photos into the gallery, which is a disorganized mess. Then you have to import everything into lightroom before editing and there isn't an easy way to get the raw files with the edit xml files off the tablet when needed. lightroom mobile on Android has been a big disappointment. if you're a lightroom user, stick to the PC version where you can have control of your files. I thought this would be a good way to edit on the road, but it isn't.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback on Lightroom Mobile. We understand your concerns about file organization, RAW handling, and editing on the go. We're continuously working to improve these features. Your input is valuable, and weâ€™re here to help optimize your workflow. Let us know how we can assist further!

scraped_reviews.content: App is good, but not worth it. Overall I'm very disappointed with Adobe. I would have liked to just purchase the program, but like everyone they want to hook you with reoccurring fee/charges. They make it hard to find the place to cancel your subscription, not in lightroom at all. Then they charge you for canceling your subscription. This is ridiculous. I would find another program that treats its clients properly and I unfortunately will avoid purchasing any products from them in the future.

Dislike the new update. I'm a hobby photographer, I take a ton of photos, I like to import them from my gallery, where I have already sorted and picked out the ones I want to edit. I do not want ALL my photos on lightroom! This makes it way way less convenient to use, and I find I haven't even used the app since the update, when I used to use it almost daily.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! I'm sorry to see you didn't like our latest update. I'll help you get started with the new interface. In the new view, your previous edits, albums, deleted, people, and shared albums are part of the Lightroom tab. Click the 'My Edits' dropdown to get to the 'All Photos' or desired albums. Hope that helps! ^Rc

scraped_reviews.content: Last update broke RAW. I have a oneplus 13, it's a great phone and has one of the best cameras on a phone I have ever used. But for some reason after the last app update, when I import raw files in the lightroom app it wants to change the aspect ratio. It stretches the image horizontally and smashes everything in the picture. I have tried changing import settings and changing the aspect ratio and cropping, but nothing works. The pictures look awful. Can't even use lr to edit now.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, sorry you're having trouble. We would like to hear more about what's going on. Please mail us at LrAndroid-Feedback@adobe.com and we will do what we can to figure it out. Please include screenshots and the specific steps to recreate your issue. ^RC

scraped_reviews.content: Outstanding app with most of pc Lightroom functionally. I upload, edit, share, and file almost all the photos that I take using only the app. Only when necessary do I go to the desktop. As a result I can get much of my post processing done while traveling. Additionally, continual updates and new features are provided. So you stay up to date with technology. I'm not as big a fan of the recent layout/menu change and would have liked the option to keep the old format, but I'll adapt.

I like that I can copy my edits for certain photos within a group, so they all look relatively uniform, depending on your lighting taking them. Cropping is not a smooth experience and auto editing works some of the time, really depends on what it picks up, and you can adjust that by hand. Really liked the free edition, so purchased for more options, yet I don't really have the time to fiddle with them, so will probably return to the free edition. All in all, one of the better photo edit apps

This new update is terrible! Everything is hidden, like the undo & redo button, and it's confusing trying to figure out where to find all your different versions. But, the worst part is not being able to sort/easily see my lightroom photos by albums! I have all my photos organized in Albums, and when clicking the lightroom section, it only shows all photos. I have to go through many more steps to see my albums now. I wish I could go back to the older version before all of these changes.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Lunar Dream, We apologise for any frustration caused by the update. The Undo and Redo options are at the top of the screen. With the new interface, your previous edits, albums, deleted, people, and shared albums are part of the Lightroom tab in the new view. Click the 'My Edits' dropdown to access the 'All Photos' or desired albums. Thanks,^Rc

scraped_reviews.content: I was a die-hard Adobe Photoshop user since 2003. I like Lightroom for quick photo editing, but there are aspects of this app that can be really annoying. For example, every time I want to edit a photo, it makes my choose whether to just "upload" or edit. This needs to change to just editing the photo. Once the photo is open in LR, THEN give the user the option to save for later. That would be a more seamless experience. Also, cropping is definitely not a smooth experience either.

Do not buy the pro version!!! I, as you were, was impressed with this app. So i decided to buy the pro version... Unfortunately, all of the filters, all of the use cases, etc are included in the free version... you will NOT achieve anything useful by buying the full version... Help yourself, and keep using the free version. Believe me, you are not missing much!!!

Easy to use, and was recomended by other photographers so I bought it. First few photos went great in editing, then it started getting glitchy. Now 3 times on the same photo in the middle of brushing in a mask, 2 hours into it, it decides to freak out and lose my work. Yes you can save, but only after an edit. I've got 6 hours lost time on one photo.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for the frustration you've experienced; we recommend trying the following steps: 1. Make sure to close all the running apps from the background. 2. Clear the app's cache and data from your device settings. 3. Restart your device and try again. If the issue persists, please let us know on forums.adobe.com. ^Rc

scraped_reviews.content: This app used to be phenomenal, now - eh. Everytime I try to continue my work flow from my computer I get an error message saying - Failed to load development version. I can't get my updates I complete on my computer on my phone and vice versa. It's absolutely frustrating to have to start over every time I try to work on the go. I've wiped cache, cleared data, uninstalled and reinstalled app. Same problem. No matter what I do.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. Sorry you're having trouble. Try signing out and back into your account or try force quitting all apps and restarting your device. If that doesn't work, let us know at: adobe.ly/lrmcommunity - Please include screenshots and the specific steps to recreate your issue. Thank you. /rc

scraped_reviews.content: I love using Lightroom mobile and for PC. It is easy to use and has everything you need to edit (lighting, effects, defringing, crop). Although for a month or so now, when deleting photos, the photo won't fully delete. The thumbnail will black out, but when the app is restarted, the photo is still there. The only way to fix it is to close the app and reopen. Also, my cloud storage has slowed significantly and is constantly spinning.

The editing for photo's and videos is very easy. Great tool to use for it. Unfortunately, there isn't much for support options and I seem to have a glitch in my account where only partial downloads take place, duplicates don't exist, and I have a hard time getting certain photos either in or out of the Lightroom app. This has been a constant issue and I've had zero luck finding a resolution to my problems.

This app [was] awesome. I had used it for months, and it works wonders on photos with my Note 8. However, the moment I tried to share a photo directly through the app (I had previously saved to my device, and then shared from my device), my phone went haywire. It deleted messages in my phone, I lost functionality, my phone shut down multiple times... Nothing like this ever happened before, so I highly doubt it's just a coincidence. This app might make your phone an expensive paperweight.

It's a pretty good app! I don't have any of the issues stated in the other reviews (not once). My only complaint is that, after a short while, all my previously uploaded and edited photos delete (or seem to) and say "failed to load development version". Also viewing original photo takes a while to load. Other than that, smooth sailing!

An enormous chunk of my photos in the app are back to their originals again. I lost all of my edits that I did not physically save, which yes, I know is partially my fault. Some photos I made like 6-7 versions and only saved one, but now none of them are available. I'm crying over the loss of a few photos I spent a lot of time working on. I thought the app would be reliable. It's my favorite to edit on, but now I'm so upset about losing all the hard work. LR can you help?

I like it a lot.. I use it to edit my raw images on the go, it's not the desktop version but it does alright enough for me to use it... ...It can be a little annoying when it comes to adding "new photos" I'm sure there's a way to select multiple images, though I haven't figured it out... ...I wish there were more desirable presets, they do have a bunch but most aren't worth it... ..The auto feature pretty much only brightens pictures that were ment to be dark or make images more saturated.

I like Lightroom a lot. Literally every photo that I edit goes through Lightroom. The controls are smooth, masking is great and the end results are polished. Continuity in look is superb. A couple things are preventing me from giving it 5 stars: 1. Not being able to export in PNG format. 2. The default import setting compresses images, and I lost a good deal of product before I figured out the problem. 3. Being able to add text to pictures would be another step saver. Make 1 and 3 happen=5

I'm not sure what you've done with it recently, but editing raw files is like working with a jpeg. I can't edit more than 5 photos before it crashes. We need to be moving forward, not backwards. I'm using a flagship phone as well, so it's not device capability. There's also something wrong with the color wheels where, when adjusting the color, the dot isn't in the middle, rather Â¾ the way to the top.

BEFORE the most recent update, LR was a great photo editing app, and I have learned a lot since I've started using it. As of recently, it has become very buggy, frequently crashes and freezes during editing and I will have to exit the app, close the app, and wait until I am able to go back in in order to start all over again with my editing. Time consuming process! I would definitely expect this type of performance from an app that was free not for one I pay a monthly fee!

Worked amazingly until last week. It was my go to for all photo editing on my phone. Now it crashes every time I open it and is stalled out importing a mere 1 photo. Please fix SOON. I have submitted a dozen or so reports from crashing with no resolution and have tweaked my phone settings in an effort to resolve it. I have plenty of space on my phone, too. No reason for it to behave this way. Please. Fix. Soon.

I love Lightroom's new-ish masking. I don't have much need for blurring, but I found that there were times I needed more separation for my subject. The feature is still developing, though it's a good start. The new-ish denoise feature is very helpful and lets me get away with higher ISO than I would normally use. Museums & churches don't seem to like flash photography. It saves me time and extra disk space because I don't need Photoshop so much. I don't like the new gallery setup on mobile.

I don't like the new update. The previous version was so much better. Nothing was hidden. I could easily find what I wanted right away. And I miss the learn tab. I appreciated learning from professionals who actually taught us how to use the app. I think interaction is key. This discovery tab is a joke. I don't like watching a video of a photo being edited at an accelerated speed with a bunch of numbers being flashed before me. It's pretty annoying.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for any frustration caused by the recent update. We appreciate your feedback and understand your frustration with the changes. We are constantly working on improving the app based on user feedback. Regarding where the Learn tab went, please see this help doc: https://helpx.adobe.com/lightroom-cc/using/in-app-learning-ios.html

scraped_reviews.content: This is my go to app for editing! I love the convenience of how simple the app is to navigate and the range of possibilities with editing that you can do. However, the new update has made the generative remove tool not work properly. I mainly photograph children, so there is always something to remove in the background of the pictures from me having to chase them around. Please try to get this fixed as soon as possible. Thank you!

So disappointed with the mobile update. Its like adobe didnt think changing the ENTIRE interface of the program was a big deal? The app keeps crashing. The new set up is NOT user friendly. On top of moving where the folders and albums are located, I can no longer view ALL photos in a folder or even see how many are in the folder, only the albums within. I feel far less productive with the mobile app than I used to be. Not convenient for working on the go :'(
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for the frustration you've experienced; we recommend trying the following steps: 1. Make sure to close all the running apps from the background. 2. Clear the app's cache and data from your device settings. 3. Restart your device and try again. If the issue persists, please let us know on forums.adobe.com. ^Rc

scraped_reviews.content: I really wish there was more bulk actions after selecting multiple photos in all photos View. It would make organization a heck of a lot easier if you could flag multiple photos at once, assign keywords after selecting multiple photos. I'm surprised that the only bulk action is to add photos to an album. And then there really needs to be some type of filter or indicator that let you know you've already added that photo to an album. When you view a photo it doesn't tell you what album it's in!

I love Lightroom. It is hands down the best photo editing software available. Although the mobile version lacks in some aspects when compared to the desktop version, it still gets the job done. It is great for quick edits on the run. The mobile version is easy to learn and navigate. Just poking around for a while will teach you about so many aspects of editing if you do not have much prior experience.

scraped_reviews.userName: Can They Beat Goku Goku Solos
scraped_reviews.content: The subscription-only pricing model is a major downside. Unlike one-time purchase options, youâ€™re locked into recurring payments, which can add up over time. This makes it less appealing for casual users or those on a budget. While the app itself is good, the subscription model feels restrictive and might not be worth it for most.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We apologies for any frustration caused by the app. While we understand some features require a premium subscription, we also provide free editing tools and features. We aim to strike a balance between free and premium offerings to meet user needs. If you have any specific concerns or suggestions, please contact us. ^Rc

scraped_reviews.content: I have used Lightroom for years, both on my phone and on the computer. I've tried other software, and apps, but none of the other apps come close to the editing power of Lightroom. The interface is simple, making the app very user friendly. The various, and numerous, tools provide unlimited editing techniques, styles, and possibilities. The cost is not bad either. I highly recommend.

It is constantly crashing. Sometimes while taking photos and always when importing photos. It crashed and won't import any new photos if it stays open long enough for me to take any. *UPDATE* They seem to have fixed the issue with crashing. The app seems to be working better now. It is STILL VERY laggy when taking photos but they do turn out better than with the stock camera. If I have a very still subject or landscape photo I can use this app. If I'm trying to get my toddler jumping on his trampoline and playing with the dog... Stock photo app.

The update completely messed my life up. I'm always on the go. I edit directly from my phone 99% of the time. The update crashes. Said I had to free up storage when I didn't need to. Takes too long to get "smart previews", won't export. Please fix your app. I need lightroom working. I dont pay $10 a month to bot be able to use my lightroom.

title: Zomato: Food Delivery & Dining

Whatever you feel like eating, Zomato is the only app you need for the quickest doorstep delivery or to find the best restaurants. With over 1.5 million listed restaurants, explore the best food around you with Indiaâ€™s most loved & trusted food app- making hungry customers happy since 2008! With the Zomato app, you can: 1) Order food from your favourite restaurants & eat in the comfort of your home 2) Find the perfect restaurant for dining out 3) Explore the best live experiences in select cities 1) Order restaurant food: ðŸ´Order food anywhere, anytime With online food delivery across 1000+ cities, get delivery of your favourite local & international dishes within minutes, even late at night. ðŸ“ Live order tracking & 24*7 customer support Track your food order real-time: right from payment confirmation to estimated delivery time. For help, chat with our customer support executives 24*7. ðŸ’° Many safe payment options & lots of discounts Pay safely & securely with UPI, cash on delivery or cards/wallets/netbanking/buy now pay later/Sodexo/Simpl. Get exciting deals & offers with up to 60% OFF or free dishes from restaurants. ðŸ’ªWhateverâ€™s the occasion, we are here to serve Hosting a birthday party? Have unexpected guests? Forgot to carry tiffin? Not feeling well or too tired to cook? Feel like treating yourself, trying a new cuisine or just missing an old dish you love? Donâ€™t worry, Zomato is there to help. ðŸ‘€Search for & discover top restaurants, cuisines & dishes Whether it's your breakfast, lunch or dinner, find the best around you with Dominoâ€™s, Pizza Hut, McDonaldâ€™s, Starbucks, Subway, Burger King, Taco Bell, KFC, Chaayos, Pasta, Burgers, Noodles, Paranthas, Lassi, Biryani, Idlis, Dal Makhani, Butter Chicken, Paneer Makhani, Dosas, Salads, Cakes, Ice Creams, Mithai, Samosas, Momos, Sushiâ€¦& a lot more. ðŸŒ¿Vegetarian & healthy options Prefer vegetarian food? Order from veg-only restaurants or see vegetarian dishes in any restaurant. Health conscious? Indulge guilt-free with the â€˜Healthyâ€™ option on the app. Get meal recommendations curated by nutritionists for your dietary needs. âœˆï¸Intercity Legends (available in select cities) Intercity Legends brings iconic dishes from various cities of India to your doorstep. Biryani from Hyderabad, Baked Rosogollas from Kolkata or Kebabs from Lucknow; get these & many more authentic Indian delicacies delivered. âš¡Instant (available in select cities) Zomato Instant brings selected dishes from restaurants to your doorstep, in a few minutes. 2) Find the perfect restaurant for dining out: âœ…Discover restaurants near you Dining out? Look up restaurant menus, ratings, reviews, photos, contact details, map directions. Use search filters to find restaurants that fit your budget or are close by, or just refer to our curated lists called â€˜Collectionsâ€™. ðŸ‘«Book a table Avoid waiting at restaurants by booking a table in advance. ðŸ’°Special deals on dining out Pay your bill on Zomato to get the biggest discounts & up to 100% cashback. ðŸ‘ŒShare your experiences Rate & review restaurants to share with crores of foodies. 3) Discover the cityâ€™s hottest events :mirror_ball: Explore the pulse of the city with Zomato Live. Find the best live experiences around you and enjoy a seamless experience right from booking your tickets to attending the event itself. Available in select cities. Zomato is available across India & UAE. Some features mentioned above are live in limited locations. Every meal ordered through Zomato is 100% plastic neutral. Claim for #1 food delivery app in India is based on Play Store ratings & SimilarWeb data.

Whatever you feel like eating, Zomato is the only app you need for the quickest doorstep delivery or to find the best restaurants. With over 1.5 million listed restaurants, explore the best food around you with Indiaâ€™s most loved & trusted food app- making hungry customers happy since 2008!

With the Zomato app, you can:
1) Order food from your favourite restaurants & eat in the comfort of your home

3) Explore the best live experiences in select cities


1) Order restaurant food:

ðŸ´Order food anywhere, anytime
With online food delivery across 1000+ cities, get delivery of your favourite local & international dishes within minutes, even late at night.

ðŸ’ªWhateverâ€™s the occasion, we are here to serve
Hosting a birthday party? Have unexpected guests? Forgot to carry tiffin? Not feeling well or too tired to cook? Feel like treating yourself, trying a new cuisine or just missing an old dish you love? Donâ€™t worry, Zomato is there to help.

ðŸ‘€Search for & discover top restaurants, cuisines & dishes
Whether it's your breakfast, lunch or dinner, find the best around you with Dominoâ€™s, Pizza Hut, McDonaldâ€™s, Starbucks, Subway, Burger King, Taco Bell, KFC, Chaayos, Pasta, Burgers, Noodles, Paranthas, Lassi, Biryani, Idlis, Dal Makhani, Butter Chicken, Paneer Makhani, Dosas, Salads, Cakes, Ice Creams, Mithai, Samosas, Momos, Sushiâ€¦& a lot more.

Available in select cities.

summary: Order food online, check reviews and avail great offers on delivery and dining!

scraped_reviews.content: Apps page stuck at certain screen after i ordered, Green Tick mark screen is still there even after 2 to 3 mins and there is no going back. I think i need to close the application and relaunch it just like typical IT support guys restarts the Computer for all the problems. Find out that, we need to use back button to go back to the page, it should be a temporary page right its a like a image in a gallery opened, need to press go back, that to there's no sign or options mentioned there to go back

my experience with this app has never really been good but recently, it's just plain disappointing. the orders arrive late. when I complain about something genuinely wrong with the order, the app doesn't allow customer service chat. you have to email. and in the email they first ask you all details, take your time but do nothing. I paid for something, and it's missing but that's not their responsibility. quite frankly, the services are so bad. They don't even take their customers concern srsly

Fraud app with petite tactics to save money. The zomato gold has free delivery for under 7 km. There is an outlet which is 6.2 km from my location, but they show it as 8.9 km and I have to pay â‚¹100 for delivery (which I am sure does not go to the delivery partner). I reported this issue on the app and had no response from them, nor the issue is fixed. I am sure it's not a glitch as the distance is fine in other delivery apps. You need to do better, else you will lose customers for cheap tactics.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We understand that our app may not have met your expectations, and we apologize for any inconvenience caused. To address this issue, could you provide specific instances or details about what you experienced at psreviewsupport@zomato.com and we'll get this checked at the earliest.

scraped_reviews.content: The delivering excecutive is going somewhere else after collecting the order. It is more than twenty minutes and he is roaming/going against our location back and forth here and there. Now it started raining here. Just have a look at my last/recent/current order. The guy is roaming around after collecting my food towards the opposite direction of the restaurant for more than half an hour. They kept extending the time always with excuses. Have a look at the proof images I've attached herewith.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, sorry to hear about that. Please write to us at psreviewsupport@zomato.com & we'll immediately bring this to the notice of the restaurant and help address your concern at the earliest.

scraped_reviews.content: Zomato is one of the best apps for food delivery! ðŸ• The interface is super easy to use, restaurants are well listed, and delivery is usually on time. I love the real-time tracking and the offers they give. Sometimes delivery charges can be a bit high during peak hours, but overall itâ€™s a great experience for foodies!

I have ordered while on train from a restaurant for some items well in advance. But the restaurant cancelled the order saying items are not available. If I was informed earlier, I would have searched for an alternative. When I was speaking with customer support about this problem, they disconnected the call abruptly. This is not the kind of service I expected from a premium food delivery app. Kindly take care of these issues well in advance so people can look for alternatives.

WPRST EXPERIENCE -Placed an order which was confirmed, food prepared, and even a delivery partner called me. The app kept delaying, showing the rider was picking up, then suddenly cancelled. By then, all other restaurants were closed, leaving me with no food at all. A refund or coupon doesn't fix this - it's a clear failure of service. If orders can't be delivered, cancellations must be immediate, not after wasting the customer's time and options. Very disappointing and unacceptable. emailed ðŸ‘
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there, apologies for the less-than-perfect experience. Could you please send us your registered contact details at psreviewsupport@zomato.com? This will help us investigate and resolve the issue for you.

scraped_reviews.content: Service is worstt!!!! App did not notify us before charging us for cancelling. Service people told us we have to cancel order within 1 minute of ordering. How is that even possible? Also, free products were charged. Even the customer support closed the chat as we were trying to explore other options. I would never recommend this app to anyone ever.

Iâ€™m facing a repeated issue while ordering. Whenever I select an item, the displayed price is reasonable, but during checkout, the final bill becomes much higher because of added charges like tax, delivery fee, and other costs. This creates a big difference between the shown item price and the total payable amount.This issue is disappointing and reduces my appetite, as I donâ€™t feel satisfied paying much more than the original item price. I kindly request you to look into this matter.

I had ordered for me and my friends, but we quickly changed our minds within a few mins, 2-3 mins after. I didn't know they would charge a full cancellation fee for the entire order and yeah, I reached out to their helpline to ask if there were any workarounds but yeah, USELESS. Overall, really disappointed that they treat their customers like this. Safe to say, my friends and I have stopped using this app. Please Do Better.

Prices are way higher than actual restaurant prices. Some restaurants nearby do not even charge packing fees but when ordered from zomato packing fees are suddenly added. There are too many hidden charges even for discounted items promoted by zomato. The total bill for discounted prices comes even more than what it would be if we buy food on full price. Overall bad app and bad company practices.

If you don't have delivery partners kindly don't accept the order. Happened 2-3 times, The restaurant had prepared orders on time but you didn't have any delivery partner to deliver the order and have to eat bloody cold food that was left in the restaurant reception to be picked up in plastic containers till it went cold and lost its taste while I can't even cancel my order because You won't let me. This management of yours sucks and you don't even have any customer care service to talk to.

I once placed an order for an expensive items from a very well known bakery but instead got a completely different items which was almost half the price of it and when I contacted CS they told me there is nothing they can do about it so basically when a restaurant does a mistake it is the customers that have to pay the price???? Great customer Service. Utterly careless and disappointed

The UI can be better, as it looks clustered. The reason behind is that every restaurant has a different picture of their food and stuff, so it is enough to make the UI look unorganised as there are no similarities. So, I would prefer it to look simple. rather than trying to get everything in one place. As it can be categorised in a more simple way.

This is a grievance review. I have used zomato multiple times and their platform fee, delivery charges and rest other price hikes are acceptable. But when I have placed an order and immediately within a few minutes, I ask to cancel my order, the support just doesn't do that. They just delay the process and do not comply with my request to cancel the order at all. The customer support system is pathetic and does not help the customer at all. I'm very disappointed.

cant cancel order even if there is a delay. my order was delayed by 25 minutes. and there is no way to cancel the order and it is like a trap.you pay money to get service and then it is their convenience whether to refund or not. on top of that you have to negotiate with the customer care to cancel the order and they will not allow you. pathetic customer service. it is nothing less than fraud

Prices should be fair. Food prices listed on app are way higher than actual listed price of items on restaurants own menu and portion size is also less. Coupon is useless thus. Makes one hesitant to buy from app and instead go get order from restaurants directly plus an outing also. Pls look into it and price items accordingly. Everything else is totally fine. Thanking you.

Now a days orders are getting delayed by 1 hr approx. This is my 3rd order in past week and all 3 orders are delayed by 40-60mins. Also you don't have option to cancel. No refund.. It's time to say goodbye to zomato looks like. 2) Another issue. I received a stale item literally petrol smell and the customer support say we don't repeat again. what a waste

Earlier Zomato was doing a great job. Nowadays I am facing the same issue again and again. While my order is on the way, the delivery partner makes stops to pick up food for other customers too due to which my food is getting delivered delayed and also food is not getting delivered hot which leads to change in taste of the food too. If I try to contact support there is always a bot answers like your order is prioritised, taste and temperature of the food concern is Restaurant Responsibility etc

One of the worst customer care. I ordered dinner on trian and they cancelled the order at last minute and said order out of stock (somehow its out of stock even though i placed the order 3hrs well im advance). When I tried to enquire whether it is possible for them to arrange a replacement order or from other hotels, they rudely snapped and cut the call. There's no option to contact the customer care either. Had to sleep with out food as the last option to order any food was over by that time.

I am editing my review, since zomato service is going bad to worse, no way to contact an agent, way long to get an order delivered, high prices and in addition they are charging platform fee along with delivery fees with overpriced menu, Delivery guys have more than 2 orders and they delivers as their own will, like they goes to farthest first and you are kept waiting since you are the nearest delivery very bad experience
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, glad to hear that! Thank you for your feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: Although I do not order frequently. but delivery is seemless. if am honestly speaking, prices are most of the time if not always jacked up like crazy compared to restaurant menus. and then with all the additional fees, it becomes quite expensive at times. I understand it's convenient and good and easy, but sometimes the prices are just so much more than resturant menu.

Terrible disappointing experience. I had made a prepaid order, which was delivered to someone else. I contacted a customer care executive regarding it and he only offered a partial refund, and i couldn't initiate further help. Abysmal customer service. I was also supposed to get a promise coupon if the delivery was any later than estimated time, forget that, i did not even get a full refund for an order that wasn't even delivered!

orders are delivered after 2-4hr delay. why would i order if you do this everytime. on top of that you are charging a platform fee, gold membership. for what? The cost of an order on gold and non gold account are same. A simple play with discounts, delivery charges and prices.

This application has consistently failed to meet expectations. There is a significant lack of adequate customer service support for issues including, but not limited to, incorrect or missing items. Additionally, the absence of a cash-on-delivery payment option forces customers to incur costs for erroneous orders. For instance, items valued at 100 during checkout are presented with a total of 200 due to undisclosed additional charges. Consequently, I will be discontinuing my use of Zomato.

Extremely disappointed with Zomatoâ€™s service. My order was incorrectâ€”I received a Swiggy order instead. The delivery partner forcefully marked it as delivered even after I refused the wrong item. Customer support was unhelpful and rude. I was placed on hold for 12 minutes and faced unprofessional behavior when requesting account deletion. A frustrating experience overall. Would not recommend.

I ordered worth of rupees 137 on 3rd November 2025 I paid the amount and the payment was showing successful, my money was deducted but my money is not refunded yet it's showing the payment was failed, it's been more than a week, they claimed if money was deducted then it will be refunded within 5-7 working days, it's still not refunded, for the inconvenience made me rate one star in the app, I hope the issue will be resolved soon, thanking you

I didn't really like the customer service from the zomato and I've been waiting for more than 1 hour and the delivery boy has cheated us saying that he has delivered the order ..but it's just a false thing he has done and realized his mistake we calling him several times and accepted his mistake and hez ready to payback the order amount and I didn't really like the zomato service and I'm gonna complain about this and this happens every alternate time and I recommend not to suggest this app anymo

I don't understand the "highly reordered" metric, so this may come as a surprise to your esteemed design team - whenever I'm ordering food nowadays, I always check the actual rating for the food on Swiggy, ALWAYS - and I'm not alone, all my friends do the same. Deepinder, you played an extremely cheap tactic, probably so that customers can go on buying low rated food, but simply because you stopped showing rating - it doesn't mean that customers are stupid - they have SWIGGY.

ordered a pizza at 2am.. and i'm not a fan of placing random orders in the dead of the night, this was an exception since i was especially hungry and couldn't sleep, although 35mins later when is supposed to be delivered, i get a call from the customer service and they informed me that the pizza isnt available for whatsoever reasons.. apparently the restaurant was closed, couldn't they have updated it sooner? its hard to tolerate such nonsense when you dont have many viable options available

Now the app is awful especially the ai based customer srvc. if mgmt thinks replacing human customer srvc with ai helps then it only helps them in cost but not the consumer. if there are multiple qty of a single itm that the shop forgot to send, when you select that its missing in the supprt, the moment you click the item, the ai will automatically take only 1 qty as refund. if you had more than 1, too bad so sad. you cannot retry and no way to reach a person to say that. AI - AWFUL INTELLIGENCE

No proper customer care support. Some items were missing in my order, and instead of solving issue immediate in chat, they asked me mail the issue and they will solve it in 72 hours. My first question, What should i do until then, should i wait for my order?? And after few hours, they mailed,by the information available with them, they can't proceed further, what the heck that means, I have paid for the food and few items were missing, INSTEAD od apolizing and making a refund, they closed ticket

"Zomato has completely transformed how I order food! The app is super smooth and intuitive â€“ finding restaurants, browsing menus with high-res photos, and tracking deliveries in real-time is a breeze. Last night's biryani from my fave local spot arrived piping hot in just 25 minutes, and the discounts made it even better. Customer support is quick too if you ever need it. If you're into hassle-free food adventures, download this now â€“ 10/10 recommend! ðŸ”¥ðŸ”

They disabled the option to view customer reviews and expect their customers to blindly trust their so-called 'Ratings for You' while ordering food from their platform. The worst part is that this rating has nothing got to do with how I have rated a restaurant in past but it is based on some algorithm!!! Unsurprisingly, this algorithm is not transparent and always shows high ratings vs the overall ratings. Disgenious!!!

I select food after vesting too much time and then when I order then there is no option cash on delivery. I submitted many times feedback and I contacted customer support many times but there is no solution. Sometimes I order on cash on delivery and sometimes there is no option for cash on delivery. I am wasting too much time searching for food and later I am unable to order due to no option cash on delivery. Zomato support is very bad.

Worst app which I recently got to know. I was a very loyal customer, however, yesterday I ordered a chicken item and received a veg order. I understand these things happen but when I contacted customer services, they asked to write an email which I did and shockingly I received a response that they will not be able to do anything. What an irony. It means you can send anything and then say we cannot do anything. I would not have known this fact if I haven't received the wrong order.

Very disappointed with Zomatoâ€™s service. I placed an order which was marked as delivered, but I never received the food. The delivery partner stopped answering calls, and Zomato support only shows bot replies â€” no real help from any executive even after waiting for more than 2 hours. I also emailed support but got no response. This is not just about delivery â€” itâ€™s about basic customer care and timely service.

very bitter experience yesterday. ordered food at 9.30, place I regularly order, showed it will deliver by 10.13 with on-time gurantee. but food was not picked up till 10.45 and no response from customer support, just mentioned due to traffic and then assigned to senior executive to look on. finally I need to cancel. very worst experience and customer support after very long time.

very worst thing to share about the food delivery apps it's about the prices are just hiked like a nothing I just going to uninstall all the food delivery apps like Swiggy and zomato the prices are more than when compared with restaurants and also gst price for every thing and also packaging charges etc etc everything just hiked like a too much it's very bad bad and it's better to eat directly in restaurants more than ordering food. because we can eat 2 times in a restaurant with that money!!

Absolute scam of an app. Don't believe the 30 min guarantee, they provide. The app falsely said the order had arrived at the 30th minute but when I called the driver to check the status, he said 5 more minutes and was farther than 100 metres away. The order arrived 8 mins later Why simply make guarantees that you can't keep and try to cheat people? Absolute joke. When I tried to reach support about this, they again lied and didn't respond. Uninstall and don't recommend.

Worst experience ever with Zomato. I ordered two items but only one got added by mistake, so I cancelled the order within just two minutes. I expected a quick refund since it was cancelled instantly, but even after three days nothing has been refunded. I kept checking the app regularly hoping for some update, but there was none. I reached out to Zomato support multiple times yet got no proper response. They only keep saying theyâ€™ll check and get back but never actually do anything.

I had a very bad experience with zomato delivery service. Even after my endless instructions and even getting instructions from nearby people about my location. He was not reaching my place or may be he was doing it purposely. My order was cancelled . Neither did i get my food nor did i get my money back. No contact details to lodge a complain. A big no to this app. If urgent go for cash on delivery.

I just want to bring it to the apps attention that in certain places the services are not available before even 7pm. as students living in hostel it's really inconvenient that the apps which pay for the exclusive/gold version and there are literally no exceptions for us except we are paying extra like idiots .the problem is definitely not taking additional money but atleast provide good services or maybe just reasonable services instead of shutting down the whole app for a particular area.

The app is quickly becoming the very reason people were once skeptical about ordering food online. Not long ago, my order was delivered to the wrong address. Now, my recent order arrived completely spilled, with no response from support, no resolution, and no refund. This shows a serious decline in accountability and reliability. Before placing another order, Iâ€™ll have to think multiple times about whether the platform is even capable of ensuring a proper delivery experience.

very worst experience. when we order the food, charges are over and above than the actual price which the restaurant is charging. and not all the items ordered are delivered. when checking with the restaurant, they say that the item is not mentioned in the list. but zomato has charged the amount but not showing in the restaurant list. looks like zomato has started new business of skipping the item and saving the amount of that particular item. also they have disabled the chat option.

one of the worst apps. they give discounts and then cancel order saying some other rider took your order and we cant deliver. you can never talk to customer care about any issue as it does not exist. how can some other driver take away my order. this has happened many times. extra charges are pretty high.

Easily one of the worst delivery services Iâ€™ve ever dealt with. My order was nowhere near on time, and the moment you get close to the estimated delivery window, they basically cheat the system by freezing the timer. It keeps showing the same fake delivery time until the driver finally decides to show up. This is misleading, unprofessional, and an absolute joke of a service. Swiggy is far better and your customer service is a complete joke ðŸ¤£

Keep going like this. The extra fee like gst charges platform fee are affordable and acceptable. Don't add too much rate platform fee, convenience fee, delivery fee, restaurant fee, (rain fee) as like as some other apps. Now you are doing well. don't copy others. As a customer I like this manners very much. A genuine food delivery app

Zomato is the worst food delivery app Iâ€™ve ever used. This is the third time Iâ€™ve faced harassment and unprofessional behavior from their team. After placing a dinner order, they wait for almost an hour before informing that the restaurant canâ€™t fulfill it. By that time, most restaurants are already closed, leaving no other option. When I try to contact customer support, they donâ€™t listen, avoid questions, and even disconnect the chat or call. Completely unacceptable and disappointing service.

Very poor custmor service, delivery also too much of delay. Not to bother about the customers issue. He supports and providing offers to restaurants only not for custmors. My end even 1star also not worthble. I am going to uninstall it. Day by day online food delivery apps are commercial and looting the amount with unnecessary reasons.

title: Royal Match
description:
Welcome to Royal Match, the king of puzzle games! Swipe colors, solve match-3 puzzles and help King Robert decorate his castle. An exciting adventure is calling you!

We have thousands of challenging match-3 levels for you to play in the Royal Arena! On this fun journey, you will solve exciting puzzles, receive coins for unlocking new areas, decorate King Robertâ€™s castle and get extra boosters to continue your saga. Also you can compete with millions of players in events such as King's Cup, Sky Race, Team Battle, Lightning Rush and claim exciting rewards for your achievements. Fun and challenge never ends and you will never have a dull moment in Royal Match.
 
And BOOM! It is 100% ad free and no wifi needed - internet free.
 
Jump into the adventure and play now! We have lots of sweet puzzles to enjoy. Each new episode comes with free coins, helpful boosters, surprising awards, challenging tasks and wonderful areas.
 
- A unique match 3 gameplay and fun levels for both masters and new match 3 players!
- Unlock and blast powerful boosters!
- Collect loads of coins and special treasures in bonus levels!
- Watch out for obstacles on the road such as birds, boxes, potions, cupboards, diamonds, magic hats, coin safes, mysterious mailboxes and piggy!
- Open amazing chests for a chance to win coins, boosters, unlimited life and power-ups!
- Explore the new rooms, royal chambers, splendid gardens, and many more exciting areas in King Robertâ€™s castle!
- Decorate the areas, including the Kingâ€™s room, kitchen, garden, garage, and many other amazing rooms!
- Challenge your friends on Facebook and reach the top of the leaderboards!
 
Download now and start swapping for endless fun.
 
Need some help? Visit our support page in the Royal Match app or send us a message at contact@dreamgames.com.
