summary: Decorate King Robert's Castle by solving puzzles along the way!

scraped_reviews.content: Fun! No wifi needed. The main match 3 game is fun, and having a few side game options keeps things interesting. Many match 3 games are too challenging, and you end up frustrated because you have to spend all your resources just simply trying to get through the levels. This game isn't like that. (So far. I'm level 386). My only criticism is that I wish the room decorating part was more interactive. Like giving choices of different decor to use.

Stops being fun when you have to pay to play. After about 130 levels, you need to use special items to beat the levels, and if you run out, you need to buy them with real money. Or you can try the level 75 times until the computer actually gives you what you need (each try is random, so there's no way to learn and fix your mistakes) but you only get 5 lives and then you have to wait 30m per try. The only reason I made it so long with this game is because it doesn't have freaking ads. All done.

Not worth playing. Not as advertised. Only save the king when he's having a nightmare about every 50 levels. Once you spend your first dollar the game changes to where you can't pass anymore levels even the "easy" ones without spending money. Cust support knows this but just gives a generic default script about improving game play on future(lie). Don't fix their glitches and are only after your money. Play match frenzy instead. At least that really doesn't cost you anything and worth your time.

The type of games you see in the ads is about every 10 levels it seems. The other games you play are match 3 but it requires you to get a certain number of items within a certain number of moves. I downloaded for the games in the ads, not whatever the rest is. I hate these that only give me a certain number of moves. As usual, the game is not what they portray in ads. Sad. Uninstalled.

Fun game. It is a Match-3 game with little challenges every now and then where you do actually have to save the King from some situation he is in. You don't really need to be connected to Wifi unless you want to log in to your social media account to save your progress. And there are no pesky ads to watch during game play. There are in-app purchases, but whether or not you choose to spend that money is all on you. I do recommend this game... It is a great time waster casual game.

Was a fun game until you reach a certain level and it purposely makes the level unnecessarily hard even if it isn't labeled as a hard level. Unless you have the super light ball it's hard to pass levels. It's also to the point where each level you lose at and have to reattempt the level over and over again. Edit: Keep getting tired of losing my boosters each level I play. And its purposely not letting me get a match for that one final task you have to make and you have to redo the whole level.

the game is not fun anymore. I'm at the end continually I'm the top players in the arena. complete the new levels as released, all good! the problem is I'm not buying anything anymore. after purchasing the levels get easier for about 100 levels. everything is doable, favorable drops and lightballs everywhere. after those levels pass it's nearly impossible. I'm done purchasing, now I cannot compete, each level takes 20 to 30 tries.

The save the king you see in the ads is rarely shown in the game. I was under the impression that the entire game would be played that way but it isn't. I still played it anyway because it has no ads and you can play offline. However, after the updates, the rewards are now lower in all events and challenges so you're basically doing the same amount of work for less rewards. This game used to be fun to play but I'm quickly loosing interest in playing since they just want you to spend real $$

I downloaded this to earn points on a gift card app since I'm usually good at match 3 games but...there's too much going on. When I play a match 3 game, I just want the game levels, not a ton of different pop ups for whatever events the dev team came up with. 1 or 2 is fine, but sometimes I get what feels like 10. It's too much, and it interrupts the game flow. I'm only continuing to play to get my points at this rate.

THE BIGGEST MONEY GRAB! Used to be 5 stars, have played for years. then watched as the greed slowly took over. The rewards reduced and the need for "1 more turn" drastically increased. What used to be fun and I spent money on occasion because I wanted to - turned in to pay to play if you want to keep your win streak. I refuse to pay into that model. So you'll get no more money from me.

It seems like a good game for a while but eventually you reach a point where clearing levels is impossible without using boosters and coins. Only you can't save up any boosters or coins without clearing levels so you're left with no option but to buy them with real money or spend WEEKS trying to clear one level without them. Literally weeks to clear just one level. I'm not going to waste money on a game that's just a bait and switch. Garbage, don't waste your time.

Addictive but frustrating if you do not spend money on the game. The first time you start a level, you are about 5 moves to complete the level. It will cost you 900 coins to continue the game and probably will take more than the 5 coins you just paid for. Then it cost 1800 coins for 5 more plays. If you keep starting new games it cost time.

I've enjoyed playing this game for several years, however, recent changes have made it extremely difficult to finish challenges without purchasing additional coins. If you do purchase a coin pack, the following week the same pack will be 2, 3 or more times the amount. A challenge that once had 10 days to complete, was dropped to 5. Rewards have become less appealing. The game play is fun in the early stages but experienced players are penalized. The game itself is enjoyable and doesn't have ads

I like the game especially without ads interrupting every level but in the end it's still just a money grab. You win very few coins in gameplay & spend 900 for an extra 5 moves then 1900, 2900...ect. And again 1900 for boosts. Somewhere around level 1500 if you don't spend real cash, it's almost impossible to advance. I'm tired of playing the same board 20+ times to advance. Maybe it's time for something else.

Game is very fun, especially in the early goings. As you progress, it gets more and more difficult. I have started losing interest though because once you get to the higher levels (I'm over 1k) it's definitely designed to be pay to win. Every level I play now requires extra pieces, moves, etc. and as much as I like the game, I'm not spending money on it.

This game is fun at the start, but after reaching higher levels, they become increasingly difficult to pass. It will take many days to pass a single level, so you are unable to compete in any of the completions with others and are not able to complete challenges to get the needed rewards to help pass levels. If you fail at level, items are taken away, thus making it even more difficult to pass. You are also limited on attempts to pass, so game play becomes very frustrating. Not recomended.

The game is fun when lightning ball is active. But, it'll cost real money to keep it active. When it's not active, be prepared to do each round 10-30 times. They'll put hard and super hard designations on rounds, but in reality, the regular rounds are just as hard, and you play them as many times as a hard round to complete them. This is meant to frustrate you to pay to play. The developers are greedy and add new frustrations to get you to pay. After years of playing, I'm done with the greed.

game started out really fun. Now when I move an arrow or a bomb in one direction they go in the opposite direction. when I merge a ball with something else, half the time they don't merge. boards become impossible to beat then after a day or two I beat them with ten moves available. If two bombs go off near each other it use to count as two hits. now if just counts as one. This game really tries to get you to spend money. its a money grab that's it.

If I were to rate this game on enjoyability, 5 would not be enough stars to rate it! As it turns out, I can not give it 5 stars because this game is nothing but pure robbery! I get that you want to have in app purchases to make some money, but you have made your levels impossible to win without power ups, and it costs a fortune to keep up! Consider giving free power ups and coins more often! I signed up for this game on testers, because I NEED money, and ended up spending more than I could win,

This game has one of the highest and worse algorithms to make you lose, no matter how good you are. After level 2000 the game no longer works based on skill, it changes to beating levels design to make you fail, use your coins or powerups. I've played this game from level 1 to 10,000 only to see over and over again, the same story from other players and myself. Go back to candy crush where at least you knew you had to spend.

great game w/o ads, but ridiculously difficult. you'll play each one a dozen times before moving on. they need to add at least 10 moves to each game. you have to use 900 coins for just 5 moves when u need 10 or more and only get 16 to 24 in return, so it's impossible to build your bank without spending money. Just has major flaws IMO. very frustrating unless you like spending money.

"I just wish it explained better how to play.."..that was an old review, I initially left a rating of 4 but I'm changing it to 3, cuz now that I'm learning the game, I see it's cheating. I have installed on 2 phones, 1 to learn 1 to master. I do spend .99Â¢ a wk to play, 4\no ads, it's like feedn a game. but now I'm seeing it not give combos when it wants you to lose or more to win. I've done several different combos, with diff results. it forces you to buy & when you buy it forces u to use it.

editing my review 10/25/25: I've been playing & enjoying this game for a long time, but ITS NOT FUN ANYMORE. What happened to the Lightning Rush where you got 60 min of free lives once a day? The new challenges are not fun because the rewards are not as good. I've spent money at times for extra coins to beat certain levels, but y'all have taken all the fun away. I'll be uninstalling this game pretty soon. A lot of unhappy players, not just me. Developers? Are u listening? Do u even care?

An ok game but gets repetitive and boring after a while. My main gripe is that the game doesn't match the advertising, which only shows levels where you have to clear a path of some sort to save the king. In the game, that's only in rare "King's Nightmare" levels. Same deal with Royal Kingdom. I don't understand why they don't furnish the game they advertise, or have advertising that represents the actual game. All they accomplish by deliberate misrepresentation is to frustrate and annoy people.

I've been playing this game for years & reached the Royal League quite some time ago. I loved the challenging levels. BUT Suddenly the game took a ridiculous turn to "impossible unless you spend money". Once you finally give in and spend a couple $ it gives you a fighting chance until becoming impossible without spending again. QUITTING. UNINSTALLING.

I'm currently on level 669, and I thought I'm going to look at the reviews on this game to see if others are getting as frustrated as me.. well I wasn't wrong. as soon as you get superhighway ball. it just screws you and if your not willing to pay money on a free game you can't win or not very easily at that. probably stop playing it again, it was a pass time now I just get mad with it

Do not play this game. The company only exists to extort money from players. They constantly change the rules to make the game harder to play, trying to force players into buying things like extra lives and "coins" that are normally rewarded throughout the course of the game. They then drop those coin values over time, making it more and more difficult to progress through levels. Do not start to play, the game will frustrate and upset you down the road after you get addicted.

The game is fun, standard puzzle game. However, although there are no ads, the app has to make money so they set the gaming experience up where you have to purchase boosters or coins in order to advance to the next level. Yes, you can beat the levels w/o boosters or coins but it will take a lot of time. So the game is free to play with no ads but the catch is at some point you will purchase boosters and coins, and that is how the app get you. Stop having people with money advertise the game.

After you clear the initial levels the game becomes increasingly difficult, which is fine. However, even with strategy higer levels essentially require bonus items. Sure, maybe you can beat a hard level after a number of days, but it's a cash grab to buy those items. Personally I would stay away unless you're looking to spend money to be a top player. To be clear, the first 150 or so boards weren't bad, but once you cross 200 it gets ridiculous.

Good for a few days, then not. The first 200 or so levels were very fun, then progressively difficult to the point of frustration. You'll have to pay for boosts every couple of levels to progress, or else just keep losing the same level over and over, waiting for timed free lives. I've paid one-time fees to remove ads on apps I like, but I'm not robbing my piggy bank every day to play a casual game. Sadly, uninstalling this one.

FINALLY A GAME WITH NO ADS!!!!!!! Only bad thing. When you fail to complete a level, it gives you the option to continue playing with a certain amount of moves, but the price is stupid. For 5 more moves, it's literally 900 coins. That may not be a problem for veteran players who have been playing the game long enough to be loaded, but for newer players, it drains your bank. It's very frustrating when you can literally win in a move. Please fix it. Also, a match 3 game, not a save the king game.

They used to have a multi-player competition to win up to 10,000 coins, but in the last 2 weeks, they've changed it to an individual competition for 200 coins, whoppie! They have also reduced the coins you win per level and made it more difficult to pass levels. So basically, a "free" game now wants you to spend money to pass levels. Can you still pass them? Yes. But, if you want to win/ complete competitions, money up! It used to be a great game too!

This game is fun at first but, having played it for a few months I've noticed a pattern. The game marks some levels as Super Hard but many of the levels that are not marked are actually much harder. It prevents you from completing them, offering extra turns if you spend coins. Eventually, when the algorithm gives up trying to get you to spend money, it lets you win the level. Rinse and repeat for each level. This seems to have gotten worse over the last week. I think it's rigged.

This game is insidious in how they can manipulate you into spending money! It has obviously been painstakingly designed to lure you into spending "just a little bit more". I enjoyed it at first, until I realized the game is never "random". All of the pieces are designed to fall in a way that gets you very close to winning, and then run out of moves "just" before winning. It isn't every game, just enough to keep you interested. VERY MANIPULATIVE GAME - AVOID!! *Uninstalled*

pay to win, two days to beat a level. After playing this game for a month and getting high in the levels you can see the game pattern. If you get a power up, the game will make you loose so that you spend money to stay alive and keep it. Then it makes levels impossible to win unless you spend money. The most annoying part is that you know that once it gets to 25 free moves offered, then it will let you win in 10-15 more attempts later. It seems to be designed to not give you the blocks to win.

It takes way to long to complete a level. Also, when I get the special Sparkle Ball of many colors I never see it because the game does not present 5 in a row. I also came within 1 card of gettting them all. Never was able to get it. I'm just about to uninstall. Level 1485 is stupid and impossible. I spent money for 35 more moves and still didn't come close. I think I will just play Golf Clash. When it's too hard after spending money you lose players and money.

Ads Lie About Game Play. I don't understand why games lie about what the game is. You get advertised something and think "that looks like fun". Download the game only to find it's a completely different game. What's the point? I want to play the game you showed me. It's like they know the game is no good so try and trick you and hope you don't notice? Uninstall

Definitely a "pay to win" game. If you have money and time, don't worry, you're always going to be able to purchase your way to win the competitive parts of the game. I gave it three stars though because it is free to play, with offline play, and you can eventually be at the levels without purchasing anything. Just plan on spending weeks at a time trying to beat one level. they also give daily boosts, another reason for the 3 stars. the 5 lives is annoying with a half an hour wait to get another

It was going well but then you get to a certain level and the bombs don't wipe out as much as they used to and the levels become impossible without money. I have no problem buying lives but when you change the rules & the game is utterly impossible I don't see the point. So for you who want to play you will have fun up until like level 190 and then the boards become nearly impossible. So just know you will get so frustrated you will have no choice but to uninstall eventually

Fun until you reach the point where every level is nearly impossible to pass because it's trying to force you to spend money. When you're no longer winning consistently, you don't build up boosters or coins anymore, and you have to constantly wait for lives to refill - unless you pay for all that in real-world money. Just a cash grab at the end of the day. Eventually becomes too infuriating to play. I'd rather it have ads and actually be playable without spending money to be honest.

Really unoriginal match 3 game, with uneventful mini games every 8 levels. Yet again, due to there being no restrictions on how app developers advertise their games, it is nothing like the ads. The cool mini games in the ads are what made me want to download the game, but I was quickly disappointed.

i luv the game and playing it for 2 years now. with the last update, you reduced all prizes, whether it's in the card collections or in the hard and super hard levels. Besides for the least few updates, the steps for each event became non logically difficult. if you want us to stop playing just ask ðŸ¤·ðŸ»â€â™€ï¸

Meh. It was fun. Puzzle 1-800 and easy and fun enough. After puzzle 800 they all get a bit more challenging. After puzzl3 1000, good luck. I had a 793 puzzle winning streak from puzzle 1-800. Now I'm lucky to be able to win 1 maybe 2 puzzle a day. Some days I'm stuck on a puzzle for days. I don't spent money on games. Not much fun when you can't beat a puzzle for days. Was looking for a game to pass my down time, not stress me out.

I decided to uninstall this game, even though I appreciate that it has no ads. The gameplay feels manipulative, as there is no way to win without purchasing coins. After buying, you win briefly but start losing again, prompting more purchases. This pattern feels exploitative, and the high coin prices add to the frustration. I hoped the developers would fix this, but it seems profit is prioritized over fair gameplay..

The game is fun, and the first 200 levels are relatively easy, and there are no ads (which is a blessing!!)... you get rewarded for clearing a level on the first try... the issue starts after level 200 when it becomes a "pay to win" game, where the only way to clear a level is to use booster of a kind (and they run out fast).. i understand the developers need to make money, but making a game unplayable after a certain level is just bad UX practice.

The game sucks at first but when you climb the levels it's actually fun. I'm giving it 3 stars because it takes forever to build coins, it takes forever to build the stars to decorate each room, you only get so many turns then it tells you to either pay 900 coins to get more turns or you gotta wait a certain amount of minutes, it gets annoying. But.. I know the algorithm to this game so having said that it's more funner to play. I just don't play the stupid challenges! Kings Nightmare is fun.

The game is fun, but there is no daily login bonus, so unless I manage to win a level or pay, I can't get boosters. Also, 900 coins for 5 moves is too much, not to mention 1900 coins for 5 more. Insane. I have to play a hard level 20 times before the game lets me pass, unless I have coins which end quickly with the price for 5 moves only. The game then only annoys me. So I will delete it yet again and will remember to not download it anymore.

This game is fun and you can play offline. There are in-app purchases however they're not that bad. You don't feel too forced to buy anything. You can buy more moves with the coins you receive after each level. I wish there were more style options for the castle but all and all pretty chill puzzle game.

I love the game but I only gave it 3 stars because it is such a money scam. If you don't want to sink Alot of money into a GAME then do NOT play this game!!! The only way this game is fun is if you are willing to spend some of your paycheck on it. Yes you win gold coins when you beat a level but you only win 15-60 coins on average. If you do not finish you can buy 5 more moves for 900 coins then 1900 and up. This game is addictive and Expensive so be warned!

False advertising like all these games. Played for several hours to give it a shot. Made it all the way to the pool area which is fairly far in I think and I can count on maybe two hands the amount of games that they advertise in the video. Almost all of them were the same exact scenario as well.

title: TradingView: Track All Markets
description:
Simple for beginners and effective for technical analysis experts, TradingView has all of the instruments for publication and the viewing of trading ideas. Real-time quotes and charts are available for wherever you are at whatever time.

At TradingView, all data is obtained by professional providers who have direct and extensive access to stock quotes, futures, popular indices, Forex, Bitcoin and CFDs.

You can effectively track stock market and major global indices such as the NASDAQ Composite, S&P 500 (SPX), NYSE, Dow Jones (DJI), DAX, FTSE 100, NIKKEI 225, etc. You can also learn more about exchange rates, oil prices, mutual funds, bonds, ETFs and other commodities.

TradingView is the most active social network for traders and investors. Connect with millions of traders from around the world, learn from the experiences of other investors and discuss trading ideas.

Advanced Charts
TradingView has excellent charts that surpass even desktop trading platforms in quality.
No compromises. All of the features, settings and tools of our charts will also be available in our app version. Over 10 types of charts for market analysis from different angles. Starting with an elementary chart line and ending with Renko and Kagi charts, which focus heavily on price fluctuations and barely take time into account as a factor. They can be very useful for determining long-term trends and can help you earn money.

Choose from a large selection of price analysis tools, including, but not limited to, indicators, strategies, drawing objects (i.e. Gann, Elliot Wave, moving averages) and more.

Individual watchlists and alerts
You can track major global indices, stocks, currency pairs, bonds, futures, mutual funds, commodities and cryptocurrencies all in real-time.

Alerts will help you not to miss the smallest of changes in the market and will allow you to react in time to invest or sell profitably, increasing your overall profit.

Flexible settings help you to track the indices you need and also group them in a way that is convenient for you.

Syncing your accounts
All saved changes, notifications, charts, and technical analysis, which you began on the TradingView platform will be automatically accessible from your mobile device through the app.

Real-time data from global exchanges
Gain access to data in real-time on more than 3,500,000 instruments from over 100 exchanges from the United States, the East, and countries in Asia and Europe, such as: NYSE, LSE, TSE, SSE, HKEx, Euronext, TSX, SZSE, FWB, SIX, ASX, KRX, NASDAQ, JSE, Bolsa de Madrid, TWSE, BM&F/B3 and many others!

Commodity prices
In real-time, you can track prices for gold, silver, oil, natural gas, cotton, sugar, wheat, corn, and many other products.

Global indices
Track major indices of the world stock market in real-time:
â–  North and South America: Dow Jones, S&P 500, NYSE, NASDAQ Composite, SmallCap 2000, NASDAQ 100, Merval, Bovespa, RUSSELL 2000, IPC, IPSA;
â–  Europe: CAC 40, FTSE MIB, IBEX 35, ATX, BEL 20, DAX, BSE Sofia, PX, Ð Ð¢Ð¡;
â–  Asian-Pacific Ocean Regions: NIKKEI 225, SENSEX, NIFTY, SHANGHAI COMPOSITE, S&P/ASX 200, HANG SENG, KOSPI, KLCI, NZSE 50;
â–  Africa: Kenya NSE 20, Semdex, Moroccan All Shares, South Africa 40; and
â–  Middle East: EGX 30, Amman SE General, Kuwait Main, TA 25.

Cryptocurrency
Get the opportunity to compare prices from leading cryptocurrency exchanges.

scraped_reviews.content: I didn't think it was possible but you managed to make customer support even worse. I pay a lot of money for a premium membership and should be able to send a support ticket directly rather than playing around with a useless AI assistant. It's kind of crazy you hide behind that and call it customer service. The charts are great, the customer service is absolutely terrible.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Our chat assistant is designed to help you with different questions and issues. In case the issue you've encountered to is more complex, the assistant will redirect you to our support team, which will contact you in the shortest time possible. Thank you for your feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: kindly remove the latest update, it's made mobile a bit too complicated now, id hate to cancel my subscription and have to find somewhere else. but this is a bit much. your new adjustments just made it worse, you had it set perfectly before this. now the entry and exit buttons are gone and I can no longer throw my alerts up without going on a goose chase. bring back the simplicity
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Please contact our support team regarding the issue; you can submit an inquiry by tapping on the Menu > Help Center buttons and choosing the "Support requests" category. We kindly ask you to start your inquiry as "The problem is redirected from Play Store". Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: almost perfect. I wish there was a super base subscription option that was $0.99/mo for all the features of free but no ads. I'd buy that. $15/mo is still outlandish for casual traders, but I can't imagine ads are generating $15/mo in revenue. I can do so much in the free tier so it's fine, but let me pay just to rid the ads.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We always work on advancing the app and its features, and also adding new ones to it. We've made a note of your suggestion. Thank you very much for the feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: It is a great tool, but it's not without its challenges - just like any other trading software. Tech support is via email only, so any technical issues will require at least a day for a response unlike Schwab, which has 24 hour phone support. It appears that their support is offshore. Paper trading is almost useless during peak trading hours due to extreme lag with order entry. It's far better than Think or Swim or TradeStation, but problems with order placement continue to be a problem.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Our support manages all inquiries via the Support requests menu. Their team processes all requests carefully and alternately. Sometimes the response time from them may be increased if there are too many requests; however, they're doing their best to provide support to each user. Thank you for the understanding and for the feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: the new update just came out. now my buy sell buttons are gone, and I can't get them back. there is no setting to show them, I checked for 20 min before giving up. now, instead of seeing a trade and pressing a button so I can get in where I want to, I have to pull up the trade menu, losing time and money.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! You can open the buy/sell order menu by pressing the trading button in the chart toolbar, then tapping on the three dots in the upper-right corner of the screen and choosing the "Quick Order Panel" option. Thank you for your feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: The mobile app is awful. Just gave up some money trading on the app because they put a button with an 'X' on the chart to indicate where the order was placed. The button covers the chart candles, it's not clear whether pressing 'X' will remove the awkwardly placed button, or if it will close the position. Sadly, in my case, I hit 'X' unintentionally while I was moving around, and just like that, I lost moeny. Please remove this button or promot users for a confirmation to close out orders!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We'd like to know more about the issue you're experiencing and investigate it further. Please contact our support by pressing the Menu > Help Center buttons and choosing the "Support requests" category. Please also start your inquiry with the "The problem is redirected from Play Store" title â€” it'll help to sort out the situation faster. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: unfortunately, this app is getting worse and worse, sometimes doesn't load completely, and even if you hit the reload button multiple times, it's still the same. You have to close it and open it to make it work. If you get a message or just change to another app even for a few seconds, when you return to it, it logs you off from paper trading every time! and it's annoying. I'm paying premium price and I'm not very happy.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We'd like to know more about the issue you're experiencing and investigate it further. Please contact our support team by pressing the Menu > Help Center buttons and choosing the 'Mobile apps' category. Please also start your inquiry with the 'The problem is redirected from Play Store' title â€” it'll help to sort out the situation faster. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Beautiful charting and analysis platform. However, my user experience pain point is having to reapply strategy alerts to every security on an individual basis after changing an input variable or updating the strategy script. I'd give 5 stars if I didn't have to delete and recreate alerts just because I changed an input value. Overall, it's still a great app. Edit: I forgot to add, provide an option to add alerts to a watchlist.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Watchlist alerts are already available to our users with "Premium" or higher plans on our web version. We've forwarded your feedback to our developers, thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Great app. Unfortunately, the cost of the subscription tiers are outrageous and should be divided by 10 (based on normal Android app subscription prices). Absolutely outrageous: a total price-gouge. Reply to discount offer: Even the discount isn't great. If you offered a decent price, I'd subscribe all year, every year instead of just Q2-Q4, every 4 years. As is, considering overwhelming product adoption, I'd say you're already getting paid an extraordinary salary.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We've forwarded your feedback to our development team. Thank you very much!

scraped_reviews.content: Great app! Honestly if I'd done a review earlier I'd have given a solid 5 star, But the Trend line tool isn't working as it should whenever I use the angled line option it suddenly draws the line towards the opposite side, I have been using the tool for a while now and it has become a big part of my strategy, i also noticed it only started today... I hope this can be fixed soon Re-edit: It's been fixed a wonderful app
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your review! Could you please tell us what should we improve to get a 5-star rating?

scraped_reviews.content: By far the best app of the kind and yet, for years, every single update has either created more in-app spam messages or slowed down the charts re-draw function. No real benefit to opt for the paid version. If you have the patience to constantly close-down the ad windows, the free version is OK. Just like the pc version, the number of derivatives for each financial product can be substantial, so finding which product corresponds to a specific commodity, etc. can be tricky.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We'd like to know more about the issue you're experiencing and investigate it further. Please contact our support by pressing the Menu > Help Center buttons and choosing the "Support requests" category. Please also start your inquiry with the "The problem is redirected from Play Store" title â€” it'll help to sort out the situation faster. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Updated to the new version just now, turns out it's totally broken, charts don't load at all, also not from the widgets, widgets price updates take like 10 times as long, logos for symbols aren't loading, etc etc, it also seems to think it's not on the latest version and keeps nagging that it needs to update, when google play clearly says it is on the latest version
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! To resolve the situation, please reinstall the TradingView app: delete the app from your device, reboot your device by turning it off and on, then install TradingView back from Play Store. After that, open the app and check if everything works correctly. Let us know about the results!

scraped_reviews.content: Excellent charts. Well worth the subscription. Edit. trying to reach technical support is impossible. you get stuck in an endless loop with the ai chat assistant. brutal edit after response: that is exactly what I tried to do. it won't let me generate a support request. I am trying to get the 3 month/ daily candlestick returned to the overview window. thank you for your attention to this matter. edit after 2nd resp. imagine if actually using the support request function worked like this does.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the info! Recently, the date range display on the symbol screen was changed. Nevertheless, we are constantly working on the app and its features improvements and are always open to any feedback. We've forwarded your suggestion to our development team, thank you very much!

scraped_reviews.content: Free version is far too limited. Only profitable pro traders can afford the "real" plan. There are more indicators than one can imagine, but only 3 allowed on your chart, volume counts as an indicator. The paid bare-bones plan only adds a couple more. Not that you want screen clutter with tons of indicators, but you don't want to delete the ones you have on there with their settings, when you want to explore others. I've switched to ProRealTime.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! At the moment, the Basic plan allows you to use up to 2 indicators per chart; more indicators can be unlocked with one of our upgraded plans. Nevertheless, we always work on advancing the app and its features, and also adding new ones to it. We've made a note of your suggestion. Thank you very much for the feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: Mixed experience. There is so much that is good about this app and, yet, I find at times it just won't update data or says it can't show a chart. This always requires me to close the app altogether and reopen and I would say this occurs several times a day. I'm a paying customer. If there was a good alternative, I would move to that. I just tried to raise a support ticket and there is no option in the app to do this by the method you say. I can see old tickets, but can't raise one.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the info! To create an inquiry to our support team, please tap on the "Support requests" > "Ask chat assistant first" buttons, choose the necessary category from the list or type your request in to the special field, and follow our assistant instructions. Thank you for the feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: it's not bad but the foot print setting is fake. the foot print shows the same number and it doesn't follow the market contracts being bought or sold. I need to use a different tool for that. if you take a look at the foot print order flow. you'll see what I mean. it's fake numbers but the footprint is real except for the numbers.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We'd like to know more about the issue you're experiencing and investigate it further. Please contact our support: press the Menu > Help Center > Support requests buttons, then choose the necessary request category in the chat with our assistant. Please also start your inquiry with the "The problem is redirected from Play Store" title. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: here are more details: I would like random day bar in replay mode to get you to the starting trading hours let's say on Dax which could be 07:00 or 08:00 (UK time). Or an option to set it up. Not the end of previous day which is irrelevant with when choosing a date. Then after I study the opening (~3hours) to have a forward button to skip to the next day at 08:00. That would be much more helpful. but other than that everything is great.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: At the moment, you can select a random bar for the replay by pressing the gear icon on the Bar Replay tab, then choosing the corresponding option. To skip the current bar to the next day, you can tap on the â–·| button. Nevertheless, we've forwarded your feedback to our development team, thank you very much!

scraped_reviews.content: I won't pay for your app in it's current state, so I'm not allowed to request in app support. fix your app. at this point im starting to try other apps as they at least work fix your widget, tired of having the "oops, something went wrong" error when I try to refresh ads are intrusive and huge. it takes up about half the screen and is annoying when I'm trying to track charts. annoying enough to make me look for another app but not annoying enough to convince me to spend over $600 on a sub...

Please BRING BACK the 3 month date range with daily candles, and I'll change my review to 5*, which your app deserves.

scraped_reviews.content: This app has gone downhill.. can only add 2 indicators on free version and when i change the indicators it does not save changes... so when I open the app again it reverts back to my previous indicators.. and i have to change the indicators all over again..
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Please check whether the autosave option is enabled on your device: under the chart, go to Analysis hub, then press the button with your layout name. scraped_reviews.content: It doesn let me reset my strategy test! If I wanna change the date range, it asks me to upgrade from my essential to premium! This a basic option! shame on you! -------------------- Edit: Your platform is becoming super greedy! More basic things are getting locked behind upper subscriptions. Literally, I am looking for alternative now.

Please contact our support team regarding the issue; you can submit an inquiry by tapping on the Menu > Help Center buttons and choosing the "Support requests" category. scraped_reviews.content: It's actually a very good app for analyzing the market but the chart is not showing on my phone(Samsung s7 edge) can u please fix itðŸ™ðŸ™ Edit: issue as been resolved thanks to the team really appreciate it Edit: now it's having a bug I think....it doesn't show the chart sometimes, don't know why. I can't access the the chart currently hope this get fixed
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
1. Please check if there's any update for Android System WebView available for your device and install it from Play Store
2. Update the default and Google Chrome browsers on your device
3. Close the TradingView app completely and open it again
If the issue persists after completing all the steps from the instructions, please contact us. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: trading view is one of the best platform where I am working I suggest all of you to invest your funds safely here. they deposit and pay out methods are so instant and easy to use. I am very happy by working there and receiving profit on daily basis. I think it's a great opportunity for all of us. I'm just amaze by this kind of platforms.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the review!

scraped_reviews.content: Android app on pixel 8 pro. Widget keeps loading all the time. tried uninstalling and reinstalling the app didn't help. Issue been happening for a couple of months now. Plus, why there's no bug reporting section in the all?

scraped_reviews.content: Generally very good. This morning I'm getting a message that this version of the app is no longer supported. No update available though ?? The link to update doesn't have an update. Also, the data from Blackbull markets stops at 10 p.m and is flaky at times
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! To resolve the situation, please reinstall the TradingView app: delete the app from your device, reboot your device by turning it off and on, then install TradingView back from Play Store. After that, open the app and check if everything works correctly. Let us know about the results!

scraped_reviews.content: Iâ€™ve been using TradingView for quite a long time, but the charts for Gold, BTC, and several other assets are not loading/displaying properly. Please look into this and fix the issue.

scraped_reviews.content: I find TradingView quite annoying after the recent change to the Analysis Hub. Earlier, the share option and indicator option were right in the main hub, but now theyâ€™re hidden under the three-dot menu. Instead, the brokers tab takes up that space, which feels unnecessary and frustrating. I donâ€™t want the brokers tab on the hubâ€”what I really need is quick access to sharing and indicators. scraped_reviews.content: Well designed app I used for desktop charting. Easy to use for basic charting but limited in the free version. (I do my trades elsewhere due to TV fees, so I don't subscribe.) Sadly, free mobile version brings multiple annoying popup "subscribe" ads EVERY session making the mobile version barely usable, driving me bananas. I'm now assessing other apps for my mobile & desktop charting needs.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Advertisements allow us to provide you with many app's features that are available for free. Nevertheless, if you'd like to use the app with the 'ad-free' benefit or other advanced features, you can always try one of our upgraded plans. You can see the plans by tapping on the Menu > Subscription buttons in the bottom-right corner of the app screen

scraped_reviews.content: Please provide an update for both the free and premium versions to allow setting different sounds for price alerts and technical alerts on the phone. Having distinct sounds, different from the phoneâ€™s default, helps traders react faster and avoid confusion with other notifications. As you know, many traders use their phones for trading. Thank you
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We always work on advancing the app and its features, and also adding new ones to it. We've made a note of your suggestion. Thank you very much for the feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: Sometimes it shows error while in loading. extremely bad in high end Android device also If I want to logging using email instead of Google directly it shows error. Also app is not running in little bit of slow internet where else all apps are running fast. I think Android app for trading view has many bugs which should be fixed right now

scraped_reviews.content: Satisfied with tradingview, I can't imagine what trading would have been like without TV. Even for the free version, the options offered are great. They are better than what anyone else offers. Still squeezing the number of alerts won't make anyone buy the paid versions (just lower the costs for newbies)

scraped_reviews.content: Premium customer. The app won't load half the time. I get the error, "Sorry an error occurred, Oops, something went wrong, please reload". Bring back the old and simple "Replay Trading" mode alongside the buy/sell buttons and a running virtual P&L on the bottom bar and you will have my 5 stars. I miss that old Replay Trading layout so much. The new one absolutely, absolutely sucks. Please fix it in good God's name. title: AliExpress - Black Friday
description:
Black Friday is here â€” enjoy deals up to 80% off on the AliExpress app. During this Black Friday event you can discover millions of items across fashion, electronics, home and more, and save with appâ€‘exclusive coupons, flash sales and daily offers on AliExpress.
With the AliExpress app you can easily search and explore sellers worldwide. Find trending clothing, reliable camera gear, gadgets and unique finds â€” then add them to your wishlist, compare sellers and read real buyer reviews before you shop. The intuitive interface makes browsing, filtering and selecting items simple so your shopping feels effortless.
Security and convenience matter: AliExpress supports secure payment options so you can confidently pay for orders. Buyer protection, clear return policies and straightforward dispute support give you peace of mind when you buy on AliExpress. Track your orders in real time, get delivery updates and choose faster shipping when you need it.
Donâ€™t miss Black Friday moments across the app â€” there are many chances to use free coupons and participate in limitedâ€‘time promotions to save money while you shop. Whether you discover a great new outfit, a compact camera, or essentials for your home, AliExpress brings variety and value to your fingertips.
Backed by the alibaba ecosystem, AliExpress connects you to a global marketplace with millions of listings and trusted sellers. Manage your purchases, follow recommendations tailored to you, and enjoy a personalized experience that helps you explore new categories and discover fresh arrivals.
Shopping on AliExpress is built for mobile: fast checkout, multiple payment methods, order tracking and inâ€‘app chat with sellers make buying simple. Use smart search and filters to pinpoint what you want, save items to your lists and get alerts for price drops so you never miss a chance to save.
Start your Black Friday shopping on AliExpress now and see why millions choose AliExpress for international online shopping. Download the app, search, discover and shop â€” enjoy secure payments, buyer protection and shipping updates every step of the way. Happy Black Friday and happy shopping on AliExpress!
