scraped_reviews.content: Scammers... found a costume, never used app before so it said there was a "new user discount" so in total for the item and the $10 shipping i would pay $30... OK I can deal with that, go to cart to checkout add info, continue to add payment method, didnt even take me a full minute to add payment and when I clicked review, a pop up came up and said "discount expired" now the price of your order is $42... NOPE, that is false advertisement! customer service did NOTHING! took screenshots of it all!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Misty Summers, sorry for your experience with discounts and support. For any questions or help, please visit the AliExpress Help Center: https://helpcenter.aliexpress.com/s/BuyerHelp. Thank you for sharing your feedback with us.

scraped_reviews.content: Prices are cheap, and it's pretty easy to find/get free shipping for most stuff. I also really like how you can play games to earn coupons or game points to exchange for coupons. My only complaint is that since they switched the coupon redemption to be a limited number per day and set it to reset at the same time every day, i haven't been able to redeem a coupon because they're already all gone by the time I wake up. The reset happens at like 3am my time, so I have no chance to get one :/
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dear Christina Bennetts, we apologize for any inconvenience caused by the coupon redemption timing. Thank you for sharing your thoughts. If you have further questions, please visit the AliExpress Help Center: https://helpcenter.aliexpress.com/s/BuyerHelp.

scraped_reviews.content: This app is Full of SCAMMERS, they put a product that is not what they show in pictures, I've been trying to purchase items that are not dollars but thousands of dollars and when I ask specific questions it comes out to be something ridiculous. and at the end they're trying to sell you an item that locally in the United States is way cheaper than buying it from them. plus all of them come up with excuses I don't know if it is because I'm buying from USA, but many of them don't even reply.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry for your experience, R Q. For any questions or to resolve issues, please visit the AliExpress Help Center: https://helpcenter.aliexpress.com/s/BuyerHelp. Our customer service team is ready to help. Thank you for sharing your feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: they tripled the prices for the same quality. Amazon is much more convenient. on Aliexpress I was charged for a tax that was never set in place only because the US was thinking to add it, but never did. and they asked me as proof an invoice they never sent. I asked where can I find the invoice and their answer was "we're closing the ticket because we didn't hear from you". I used to love AliExpress, their customer support was the best and the prices were great for the quality offered.

Easy experience the last few years. Have done some shopping for tech parts you wouldn't really find in the US. I went up to buying figurines and have not had an error in my orders, all parts were always included. The deals are what brings me back, some very costly items can be up to half off if you play your cards right, just make use of the games to get coins!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you, David Campos, for your fantastic feedback! We're thrilled to hear about your positive experience and that you enjoy the deals. Your satisfaction is our priority, and we hope you continue to have a great time shopping with us!

scraped_reviews.content: When you do have a problem with an item and need it addressed, it seems aliexpress' only solution is having the buyer return each item for a refund. Even an item that may cost $2... they still expect you to go to the effort of returning it even when you show through photos it's damaged. Completely ridiculous. No way to dispute it either. Not customer focused. I used to spend tens of thousands of dollars on here yearly, but I'm going to stop until they make it easier to resolve quality issues.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback, Julia Miao. We're sorry to hear about your experience with item returns and dispute resolution. Please visit our Help Center for further assistance: https://helpcenter.aliexpress.com/s/BuyerHelp.

scraped_reviews.content: I haven't had a negative experience with the app. I love the selection of products, and have had most purchases meet or exceed expectation. Like all similar marketplace apps, you should study the products and seller, and go with your gut when purchasing. For this, the app gives some seller info underneath each product. Out of my dozens of orders, only one has disappointed. I didn't trying for a refund, though (it wasn't too expensive), so I don't know what that process is like.

I purchased about 50 cheap items in order. All came early! My order of 33 was missing an item. I only received 32. I was denied a refund for my missing item, so I submitted photos of the shipping label and of the items I received, and weeks later it was approved. My refund arrived nearly 2 months after my purchase. My items were shipped quickly and are good products. Came in great condition too. Still a bit miffed about the delayed refund but would recommend the app. Turned off notifications.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. We're constantly trying to improve our app so you can have the best experience. We'll take your concerns into consideration, and if you need further assistance or have any other questions, please contact us at https://helpcenter.aliexpress.com/s/BuyerHelp.

scraped_reviews.content: The first order of 3 items for .99Â¢ is real. However I upgraded a bit for $6.00 to get "better" items. I received them fairly quickly and was excited! Then I was quickly disappointed. All 3 items I ordered I cannot use!! The "air pods" don't work, one earbud will work then the other won't. The Selfie stick/tripod with light seemed cool with a remote, but the light won't turn on! Then the wall light that looks beautiful came with open wires to be connected to electric. Just insane! Never again!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback, Kari Eilrich. We're sorry to hear about your experience with the items you received. Please visit our Help Center for further assistance: https://helpcenter.aliexpress.com/s/BuyerHelp.

scraped_reviews.content: Half of the seller's do not ship the items, and claim theyre not in stock, so I have to contact support day after day for a refund. They allow sellers to have things listed that aren't even available. That's against policy on most sites. It's especially bad around the Christmas season, because some mark it as shipped, but send a message saying it's not in stock, and support dont consider the messages. A refund is near impossible when an item marked as shipped. I wish they'd fix that.

Most products have been acceptable. There is often a problem with measuring, especially towels, wash rags, etc. My products have come smaller than anticipated but still a usable size. I like the coins you can earn for additional discounts. I just wish they would let us decide how much 'coin' to use each order. The first few months I had the app were fine. But recently I will get ads for aliexpress that will just sweep me into the app so I loose my game progress. Frustrating!!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. We regret any inconvenience you may have experienced with our service. We strive to provide the best experience and would appreciate more details on what went wrong. If you have any specific concerns or need further assistance, please contact our support team https://helpcenter.aliexpress.com/s/BuyerHelp

scraped_reviews.content: AliExpress: Choose three items for .33 each Me: "seems too good to be true but okay" Goes through checkout process, order comes out to 1.08, free shipping. Sweet, checks out, everything goes smoothly Then they charge me $7 after everything goes through. No! I legitimately did not have the $7 to spend. I immediately had to contact customer service to cancel. I knew it was to good to be true but why did they literally lie until after the order was complete. Y'all have a lawsuit waiting to happen

Unique items & decent prices, but I'm a return customer instead of a "new customer" yet EVERY single item in search results only displays the cheaper "new customer" price, but when I add an item to my cart the cost increases because I'm not a "new customer". I never know what the actual price is for me until I put the items in the cart & go to check out, and that is annoying & obnoxious because most item prices increase SIGNIFICANTLY. Please don't tease me with new customer prices I can't have!

Mostly a pretty good app. The coins page doesn't work at the moment though. Ordered products arrived surprisingly quick considering they come from China (2 weeks or so). The only hang up has been the final mile delivery service (who TF is "SpeedX"?) who has ZERO customer service and can't seem to find an address that every other service can find. Products did arrive, however, and are mostly as described. Do NOT buy memory (SD cards, hard drives, etc.) from these sites.

Great store but the app is a little buggy. Sometimes I tap an item or are trying to organize my wishlist & the next thing I know, I'm on the front page. This happens a lot, more often the longer I use the ap. It also goes from regular speed to crawling the longer I use it. I really like AliExpress but I'm afraid the app needs work. I'm still using it though these bugs are aggravating. I hope they get these issues fixed.

The app used to be good. The prices are still okay the quality is hit or miss. Plus size clothing selection is still quite weak and has been for years. But the actually functionality of the app is constantly declining. Screens won't load or will spin forever. Wishlist will "randomly" encounter an error unprovoked. Coins screen doesn't load which causes me to looks weeks worth of streaks...Don't know what's happened to the app, but the technical quality isn't there anymore.

Advertising free items to start and you can not pick anything! You can try all that you want but nothing goes into the cart to check out. Total bait and switch. False advertising and do not install this app! It is not what it says it is. They just want to say they have millions of users and I am guessing lot of the ratings are fake too. DO NOT INSTALL THIS APP!

I am genuinely confused on how this app operates, and I haven't even been able to make a purchase yet due to the constant price changes in my cart. The new user discounts aren't applying correctly and neither are the ongoing sales that are being promoted. I usually shop around on Temu or Shein for cheap options, and have been wanting to try this app out.. but I don't feel confident making a purchase if the prices of the items change every time I refresh my cart. This app is trash.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. We apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced while shopping on AliExpress. Please note that if the destination country is different, the price may be different. To resolve this issue as quickly as possible, please contact us at https://so.aliexpress.com/s/ByrCmn?.

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using this app for years but they have started to try to trick you with the prices changing. You add something to your cart for one price and when you select the item in your cart the price changes sometimes a few cents, sometimes by $10. Make sure you're reviewing individual items and not checking out with the "select all" button. This has been going on for months now. It really has changed the dynamic of the app to "try not to get scammed"
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Karisma Hody, we are sorry for your experience with price changes in the app. For any concerns, please visit the AliExpress Help Center: https://helpcenter.aliexpress.com/s/BuyerHelp to contact customer support directly. Thank you for your feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: it's easy to order but it's hard to return items. you need to take photos and videos unlike Amazon very easy (but Amazon is more expensive). Aliexpress have scammers, fake sellers, and deliver wrong items. some they do refund, but others they don't. so be careful in using this app. I still used this for the sake of prices. but such hard to return wrong items or defective items. I hope they come up with a better idea. they giving costumer hard times.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Rhuel Martinez, we're sorry for the difficulties you faced with returns and refunds. For any questions or further help, please visit the AliExpress Help Center: https://helpcenter.aliexpress.com/s/BuyerHelp. Thank you for your feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: Difficult to navigate and compare items. Every new page or section you visit is like laying a new page atop the old one. App really needs "tabbed browsing". Also, the internal search engine is garbage. Search results are almost never accurate or useful. I feel like I must stumble around & keep browsing related items until I find what I was after.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi PC Cajun, weâ€™re sorry for your experience. For any issues or feedback, please visit the AliExpress Help Center: https://helpcenter.aliexpress.com/s/BuyerHelp. Our customer service team is ready to assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: Prices are pretty good, I would recommend this app to someone. I'm a bargain shopper and for some of the things on here it's pretty fair. For example I bought these jewelry cleaning cloths for $1.99(us) and from a store they would be like $20+ and they work just as good a Little bit smaller then the ones at the store but I can't complain. I personally really like the cheap prices just I wouldn't recommend getting the veneers though lol

lies, lies, lies!! It's only ok for your first couple of purchases when you actually get free shipping and percentage off, after that the prices will say one thing till it's added to cart and then it's doubled-tripled, says 1.99 free shipping after 10 but the item will actually be way higher in price, HATE false advertising!! Be truthful on your prices from the start, not that difficult. I even have 138.17 saved in coins and you can't use more than cents at a time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Mama Bear, we're sorry for the frustration you've experienced with pricing and discounts. For help with your account or purchases, please visit the AliExpress Help Center: https://helpcenter.aliexpress.com/s/BuyerHelp. Thank you for your feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: two separate items came in broken in ways that would have to be deliberate. plus a lot of the pages show different items from the ones you're actually trying to buy which feels intentional to confuse someone into thinking they're buying something that looks expensive while you actually bought a cheap knockoff. I don't recommend it, the first broken item was a misfortune, the second one is just bad practice, and I refuse to allow my money to be wasted on a third item.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Tru North, we're sorry for your experience with your orders. If you have any questions or need support, please visit the AliExpress Help Center: https://helpcenter.aliexpress.com/s/BuyerHelp. Thank you for sharing your feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: placed three items priced at $0.33 each on my cart, go to check out, free shipping but some discounts expired so my total was higher. changed some stuff out, same thing. This happened every time. Aliexpress seems to be more scam than anything. uninstalling. I also will add even though I didn't order, they charged me $1. What for? Don't know. But it won't be happening again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Renae Truman, we're sorry for your experience. For any questions or support, please visit the AliExpress Help Center: https://helpcenter.aliexpress.com/s/BuyerHelp. Thank you for sharing your feedback with us.

scraped_reviews.content: Has many of the samethings Amazon has, but far lower priced. But not as easy to use. Navigation the app is very difficult, for example the very same listing has several different items with different prices and options. It takes many days and using to realize how to navigate the items to buy. They need to make this app more like the Amazon app. It's also confusing how they have different sections to buy the same items and they cost different prices. Also, the built in games complicates the usage

This app offered items for 0.33 up to 3 items for a new user. Searched for items, added to cart, showed that it would be price said. At checkout it went to full price. Fortunately I was able to cancel my order for a full refund. I really don't think I will be using this app with its fraudulent practices. Actual rating is 0 stars but it wasn't an option. I now see i can't get a refund to my card, only to the app, forcing me to buy something. Bought something and they delivered to wrong address!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Lo sentimos por la experiencia que has tenido, Joey Reyes. Te recomendamos visitar el AliExpress Help Center: https://helpcenter.aliexpress.com/s/BuyerHelp para obtener ayuda. Apreciamos tus comentarios y esperamos poder mejorar tu experiencia en el futuro.

scraped_reviews.content: My experience with Aliexpress has not been good. So I will not be using them anymore. I ordered 3 times and 2 of the orders were late. Also, i played their Prizeland. Got the $7 free shopping credit. Tried to use the credit and it wouldn't let me use it and on the 3rd try i lost the credit. I stopped playing. Another thing is that everytime i tried to use the search bar, it didn't show me anything that i wanted to see. They need to improve their site. They lost me as a customer.

A great app for a great website. I only gave 4 stars due to the confusing way adverts are displayed, which is identical in the app and website. It's often not clear what version of a product you're looking at, as products ship with differently bundled accessories, or different specifications, and I see others leaving reviews where they've been caught out. I personally go elsewhere if not clear. At least on here, a search brings up relevant goods, Amazon could learn a thing or two about that.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Liam Farrell, sincere thanks for your feedback. We appreciate your insights on the advert display and will carefully consider your suggestions. We are committed to providing high-quality services and hope to deliver a five-star experience soon. For further assistance, contact our support team at https://helpcenter.aliexpress.com/s/BuyerHelp.

scraped_reviews.content: About a week ago I finally downloaded this app after seeing the ads saying Order 3 items for 99 cents....... And yes, I used that deal to purchase a Sterling Silver Butterfly Charm necklace, a beautiful ring and a set of Gel Pens for 99Â¢ with tax total was $1.08. They have a lot of different products at reduced prices plus there are daily deals and sales where the prices are even more less. I can't wait to order more items (hard to choose what to get when there are so many great choices).

loyal customer for a long time. they started charging me for items I never received. I did contact them via in app customer service and they repeatedly told me they take no responsibility for what the individual sellers do. they are just the platform the seller uses. they abandoned a loyal customer to save $30.00. with black Friday fast approaching you need to decide if it's worth risking losing not just your money but your items and be left with nothing ðŸ¤”
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry for your experience, Stephen Robinson. If you have any questions or need help, please visit the AliExpress Help Center: https://helpcenter.aliexpress.com/s/BuyerHelp. Thank you for your feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: I've used AliExpress for probably 10 years now and it's always been a great place to buy things. I especially like that you can combine multiple items to get free shipping. Shipping times have also gotten much faster compared to years ago, which could be several months. now you get your items in 2 weeks or less. Usually good sales too and there are always coupons to save you a couple dollars here and there. The app can be a little buggy sometimes with the add to cart button not working.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback, Kendal Mitchell. We're glad to hear you've had a positive experience over the years. We apologize for the inconvenience with the add to cart button. Please reach out to the AliExpress Help Center for assistance: https://helpcenter.aliexpress.com/s/BuyerHelp.

scraped_reviews.content: I placed an order yesterday just fine but today I got a notification saying I had to submit a security appeal. It was such a hassle trying to upload a picture of the card I was paying with. I kept getting error messages and had to switch over to my tablet to finally load it. Meanwhile there was a hold on my bank account for the purchase. Then I got an email saying my appeal was denied and the $16 order cancelled. The hold was removed but this was such a headache I'll just use Amazon instead.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi D Bunny, we're sorry for the trouble you experienced with your order and security appeal. Please visit the AliExpress Help Center for assistance: https://helpcenter.aliexpress.com/s/BuyerHelp. Thank you for your feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: I keep getting an "unusual amount of traffic" message and that I "need to unlock/regain access to my account." Pretty sure this is due to the very limited access I gave the app. no notifications. no access to files. no access to my contacts. pretty much tells me all I need to know. uninstalled
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Jeffrey Jensen, weâ€™re sorry for the trouble you experienced. For any questions or help, please visit the AliExpress Help Center: https://helpcenter.aliexpress.com/s/BuyerHelp. Our customer service team can assist you further there.

scraped_reviews.content: It is the best and easiest online app by far. You only need to take your time to understand the app and how it works. Update: 10/25/2025 5:34 pm. I have ordered way too much! I am still struggling to find other items to compare to each other, and just to have something different in the normal feed would be appreciated. I like it does keep my preferences in mind, but I do have other categories I would like to search for while searching, lol. I love this app. I ran outta space to type.

the app is fine although a bit bloated. the products are also sometimes okay, kind of a mixed bag. you could get amazing quality or you could get terrible quality. the one star is for their customer service. a seller didn't ship two of my items, and instead of stopping in they just told me to wait longer and if not I should chase down the tracking company. I'm sorry, but if I order from you you are the one responsible for making sure my package arrives. otherwise I buy directly from the sellers.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Nir Flatau, We are sorry for the inconvenience you faced with your order. Please visit the AliExpress Help Center for assistance: https://helpcenter.aliexpress.com/s/BuyerHelp. Thank you for your feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: Will never shop with aliexpress again. My order was returned to the sellers due to an electric mister not being allowed into the US, and I was never notified. It took at least a month to resolve it, and I had to do all the work to get it. I'll be deleting the app and go back to Temu. Whole experience was frustrating. The run around was fun too. I've never experienced the same replies used in so many different ways. What a joke!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Lizzy Gates, we sincerely apologize for the frustration and inconvenience you faced with your order and communication. For further support or to address any concerns, please visit our Help Center at https://helpcenter.aliexpress.com/s/BuyerHelp. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: Very deceiving...watch out for the wrong pricing. for some reason it shows me the "welcome deal" pricing on every item and then when I go to checkout I get charged the full price. I have no idea why. It seems like pricing would be a basic concept for a shopping app, then to be charged almost double in some instances is almost a scam.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Mr noname, we're sorry for the pricing issues you faced. Please visit the AliExpress Help Center for help: https://helpcenter.aliexpress.com/s/BuyerHelp. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.

scraped_reviews.content: A friend recommended this app to me for Halloween shopping. I was paying for my 3 items for 99 cents, and it charged me $8.72 for my items. DO NOT INSTALL THIS APP. EDIT: they refunded my order, and i placed a new one on a different item. they have now (3 days later) refunded that one as well, and all promotions now do not work on my account. I am very displeased with them.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sylas Tufford, sorry for your experience with your order. For questions or concerns, please visit the AliExpress Help Center: https://helpcenter.aliexpress.com/s/BuyerHelp. Our customer service team can assist you further. Thank you for your feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: I feel absolutely deceived by AliExpress. I have ordered 4 items on this app. The first order was incomplete. On my second and third order, I received the wrong items that cost less than the items I paid for. I have never received my fourth order; I have waited a month and a half for it, and it's now a week overdue. I have left complaints and tried to refund my orders, but I have never gotten any response.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry for your experience, Elizabeth Valdez. We understand the frustration with incomplete and incorrect orders and lack of response. Please reach out to the AliExpress Help Center for further assistance: https://helpcenter.aliexpress.com/s/BuyerHelp. Thank you for your feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: Found an item I was looking for on this app so I decided to download it. I was sent the 4 digit number to confirm my email, entered it then was asked to create a password. As soon as I clicked on the create a password link, a box came up saying my account was disabled due to terms of service violations. How could I violate anything if I hadn't even completed creating an account? I am deleting the app ASAP!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Crystal Navarrette, we're sorry for the trouble you experienced with your account setup. For any questions or help, please visit the AliExpress Help Center: https://helpcenter.aliexpress.com/s/BuyerHelp. Thank you for sharing your feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: Good but confusing. there are so many different roads and neighborhoods and avenues and ways to buy things that it's easy to get lost, it's also easy to lose track of stores, and can be difficult to figure out which of 50 identical items is the one you should buy because they aren't identical. I understand that third party marketplace platforms are always going to have this issue but I feel like AliExpress could focus on features that help the consumer in this.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Aaron Peterson, thank you for your feedback. We appreciate your insights on the challenges with navigating the platform. Your suggestion for consumer-focused features is valuable to us. We hope to enhance your experience further in the future!

scraped_reviews.content: Return process is clunky and maliciously programmed. You are expected to take and send pictures and/or video of the item you wish to return, but the app cannot properly interface with phone storage to let you upload photos, even if you move pictures to the folder it can see manually, it will not update. it also tends to fail when uploading videos. it also requests info on agreements with the seller for returns, and does not make it obvious where or how to do that.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Wanderbolt, lamentamos los inconvenientes con el proceso de devoluciÃ³n. Si necesita asistencia, por favor visite el Centro de Ayuda de AliExpress: https://helpcenter.aliexpress.com/s/BuyerHelp. Agradecemos su comentario para mejorar.

scraped_reviews.content: the print font is almost impossible to read for anyone with less than perfect vision. there's not much in the way of item description. the pictured items are somewhat misleading. for instance I ordered a set of hex nut sockets. Because they came with what looked like a hex nut socket screwdriver. according to the picture. the item description is very limited and the print is extremely small. you don't find outyou're only getting the hex nuts after you place the order.

I recently ordered a bed set that was slightly cheaper than Amazon. however three days ago I just found out that they charge you full price and do not state that it ships in pieces. So I cancelled the order literally the day I found out about it. They refuse to contact the supplier to cancel the remaining order and I have already ordered through Amazon and I am receiving the whole set and at an earlier delivery date. Do not waste your time or money with them just go through someone more reliable
scraped_reviews.replyContent: J, we're sorry for the inconvenience with your order cancellation. For further assistance, please visit the AliExpress Help Center at https://helpcenter.aliexpress.com/s/BuyerHelp. Your feedback is valuable, and we're committed to enhancing our services.

scraped_reviews.content: This app has some really good deals. I like the wide variety of items. Shipping takes at least a few weeks so if you are patient you can get great stuff for cheaper prices than similar shopping apps. There are a few problems with sellers not packing fragile items properly so I've received several damaged items. Some of the sellers are nice and will refund or replace damaged items but others you will have to contact customer service about. Customer Service chat needs improvement. But it's nice

They do a whole thing about getting your first item for only a dollar but when I ordered mine they sent me the wrong item, I'm sure I could get my dollar refunded but I won't get that deal back. basically nothing I ordered worked, whole app is kinda a scam full of ads for cheaply made products that don't do what they're advertised to. 0/10 I'm pretty pissed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Brian Blocker, we're sorry for your experience and understand your frustration. If you have questions or need help, please visit the AliExpress Help Center: https://helpcenter.aliexpress.com/s/BuyerHelp for support.

scraped_reviews.content: Terrible service now. Packages were delivered to the correct block and apparently that is good enough for AliExpress, despite proof from the shipper the items were handled incorrectly. AliExpress wants a written piece of paper as proof of this. The courier does not provide those. so I'm out a lot of money and time with no recourse. Used to be a great place to shop not anymore.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: James Marcum, we sincerely apologize for your experience with the delivery process. If you need further help or have questions, please visit the AliExpress Help Center: https://helpcenter.aliexpress.com/s/BuyerHelp. Thank you for your feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: if I could give zero stars I would don't believe the adds they say 3 gifts for 99 cents then the app glitches while you try and make a selection. this happens until the 1 hour they give you runs out. they ought to make it right. but I ain't holding my breath. don't waste your time. It's hard to lose something you were never going to get.SMDH!!!!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Richard, I'm sorry to hear about your experience with the app. Please visit the AliExpress Help Center: https://helpcenter.aliexpress.com/s/BuyerHelp for assistance. We appreciate your feedback and hope to resolve this issue for you.

scraped_reviews.content: my experience, on one hand the app had the costumes I was looking for and the price were affordable. Now the same items also were price hiked during my chance to purchase, not to mention the horrible CCV issue that lead to me ordering on another site just so i have it delivered in a timely manner. The next issue is the fact the app holds information on orders that your app is waiting on a payment when I clearly wanted to cancel the items, taking a week before they expire to disappear
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry for your experience, Michael Banks. Please visit the AliExpress Help Center for assistance: https://helpcenter.aliexpress.com/s/BuyerHelp.

title: PokÃ©mon GO
description:
Join Trainers across the globe who are discovering PokÃ©mon as they explore the world around them. PokÃ©mon GO is the global gaming sensation that has been downloaded over 1 billion times and named â€œBest Mobile Gameâ€ by the Game Developers Choice Awards and â€œBest App of the Yearâ€ by TechCrunch.
_______________

Uncover the world of PokÃ©mon: Explore and discover PokÃ©mon wherever you are!
 
Catch more PokÃ©mon to complete your PokÃ©dex!
 
Journey alongside your Buddy PokÃ©mon to help make your PokÃ©mon stronger and earn rewards!

Compete in epic Gym battles and...Team up with other Trainers to catch powerful PokÃ©mon during Raid Battles!
 
Itâ€™s time to get movingâ€”your real-life adventures await! Letâ€™s GO!
_______________

Notes: 
- This app is free-to-play and offers in-game purchases. It is optimized for smartphones, not tablets.
- Compatible with Android devices that have 2GB RAM or more and have Android Version 6.0â€“10.0+ installed.
- Compatibility is not guaranteed for devices without GPS capabilities or devices that are connected only to Wi-Fi networks.
- Application may not run on certain devices even if they have compatible OS versions installed.
- It is recommended to play while connected to a network in order to obtain accurate location information.
- Compatibility information may be changed at any time.
- Please visit PokemonGO.com for additional compatibility information. 
- Information current as of October 20, 2020.

summary: Discover PokÃ©mon worldwide

scraped_reviews.content: Have played this game since the day it came out with many highs and lows over the years. But this has become one of the most frustrating periods! I have not been able to play in over a month! The game litterally freezes within 2 seconds of loading. You CAN'T play! There was ONE day in the last 30 that it played no problem and then that night it froze again and has ever since. I've seen so many complaints about it and hope they fix it soon otherwise they will lose countless players forever.

As a long time pokemon fan, the game really is fun and a great way to encourage exercise and exploration. However, it's got a lot of limitations that I wish I could see improvement on-- specifically, scheduling. Many events last only an hour, and all events are exclusively during the day. This may not be an issue for most people, but sadly I work the graveyard shift and sleep during the day, so if I want to participate in raids, community days, or highlight hours, I have to forgo sleep.

Id say the game is still fun and playable. but that's as far as the good things go. The microtransactions are worse than ever, just reviving your PokÃ©mon can be a struggle. its hard just to get together and play it anymore because there's constant issues with someone or everyone not having a raid pass, or having to buy a remote raid pass. its quite annoying and I loved this game when it first came out. I cant give it anything above 3 stars.

As immersive as you allow it to be. The framework of the game is very outdated, but it gets the job done. Still a lot to be desired (better achievement system would be a great start), but I'm afraid a new game would have to be created to get a much better experience. Addictive, gets you out, gets you walking/running, and there are people playing it almost everywhere if you want to socialize. Amazing game.

Lower remote raid pass prices! It's stupid high now. Go back to 250 coins for 3. It was much better when it was like that. Now it takes a week and a half to save up for three, and buying three doesn't save you coins unless there's a fake discount meant to make you think you're getting a deal even though you aren't because you are still massively over paying. It's ridiculous. The average casual player, which is the vast majority of the player base, agrees because this makes it harder to play.

Microtransactions have become more and more expensive. I have no issue buying items: the developers etc need a paycheck just like the rest of us. But prices are higher now than before, just look at the bundles on the store, and ticket prices. Plus, it's borderline pay to win anymore, and lately, there's a paywall if you want a greater chance at adding the latest Pokemon to your Pokedex, not to mention the the bugs & shoddy customer support. There much more to say, but I'm out of room.

All of the reviews citing leveling update woes are 100% accurate and correct. Rollouts are done terribly! I've never seen an app take up so much space and have so many updates but nothing actually improves. The goals want you to catch 20, 30, 40 pokÃ©mon in a day or a week or a month, but you don't get half the items to do that with, so it's geared heavily toward pay to play now. I have to go through periods of inactivity because of a limited storage space for Pokemon. Shame. It could be good.

Since the update it glitches all the time now. I can't spin poke stops or catch Pokemon the screen is frozen. Also when playing with your buddy it has to be restarted to get the tracks to show up for you to click on to have it show on the screen. This is pretty much every time I play the game. It's not my device it started with the recent update. Now it's freezing several times a day and I have to restart the game. THIS IS RIDICULOUS STILL NOT WORKING!!!!!!

While I like playing Pokemon Go, there is a little downside. Some evolutionary items are hard to get like the Sun Stone and the Dragon Scale, and when you do get those items it's mostly involved with a task of evolving a certain pokemon. The problem is that there are so many pokemon that you have to use one of those in order to evolve, but you can't because the drop rate for the Sun Stone and the Dragon Scale is horrible. Personally, I wish evolutionary items could be available to be purchased.

Back a long while ago when i played it a lot, it was really fun, top tier for sure. but due to the recent update nothing works. location tracking is really bad, certain camera functions dont work, and worst of all, i cant even log in anymore. every time i enter my password it just crashes and makes me do it again. the only reason its 2 stars instead of 1 is because of how fun it USED TO BE.

If you play for a while the game errors out and most gyms will just display "gym under construction" forcing you to restart the game a lot and when it's time sensitive you miss out on things. Same thing with eggs, it just takes over your screen and if you were trying to complete another task which the egg hatching sequence takes priority and takes an eternity to complete some times making you miss time critical things. It would be better if the eggs just alerted you that they're ready to hatch.

I love this game! it's so engaging and fun. The only issue is have with it is that I get stuck on the loading screen for far too many times. I'll be staring at the screen for more than 15 minutes because the game just won't load! I've uninstalled and redowlaned the app multiple times to fix this issue but it just won't work. I wish I could play more often if it would load. â˜¹ï¸

I am quite addicted to this game, unfortunately. I get a lot of enjoyment out of it. My problem is the company in general. I bought remote raid passes with real money. I completed a raid but the app froze before I could get to the catch encounter. I filed a complaint, and a bot responded that there was no problem and they would not reimburse me. I have since found out this happens regularly. It would cost them nothing to fix this, but they choose to do the wrong thing instead.

Its fun, but I must be extremely unluck or something. I can never find legendary or shiny PokÃ©mon even when my friends are catching them constantly, and the few times I do find one, it wont stop moving so I can catch it, so I end up wasting a bunch of balls before giving up since it wont stop moving. Even the candies meant to help calm the PokÃ©mon doesn't work over half the time.

Very fun game when it works, but it hardly ever works. It's become unplayable at times. For a game as big as this, that gets tons of money and updates all the time, they seem to never actually fix the problems. There's ALWAYS a problem. Random white and black screens that freeze the game, random crashes, delayed ball throwing animations, constantly signing me out, etc. All of these happen multiple times on the daily.

The number of bugs in this game is absurd. It's almost every other day (sometimes several times a day) where the game suddenly "fails to sign in" over and over for several hours. The game used to be a lot more stable, but it's honestly been the last year or so that the quality has plummeted. Sometimes, after healing my pokemon following a battle, then going into a gym battle again, it will forcefully switch the pokemon to the last one used in the previous battle with the health it had before.

I just find there could so easily be more done to streamline the accessibility & make this a worthwhile experience. It feels empty to a degree; pay to win; & the sheer grind can wear on you heavily. Small, user-friendly additional content would go a long way. This game yearns for a Tamagotchi-like component, as well as a way to show off your PokÃ©mon to others. Unfortunately, as it stands, this is as barebones as it gets, & with so many paying so much, it likely will not change. Give a little.

The devs like to change the game for the worst each update! Like the new berry UI? Too bad we are going to revert it back AND change the order the berries appear! Like having access to the navigation buttons at the bottom of the game? Not in the game anymore! Wanna see your character awkwardly pop up and smile at you each time you gain exp so that the gameplay loop takes even longer? No? Well tough it's here to stay! This game gets worse with every "update"!

Great game, when it works. Numerous issues with the Pokemon Go Plus peripheral, unable to authenticate issues (I have an account that have not been able to log into during Dec 2019),failure to log in, lost connections, Google Fit not transferring data, etc. Couple that with barely responsive customer support, would be best to skip this one. Almost 6 years later, some of these issues have been resolved and some additional things have been added (remote raid, better friends' interactions, routes).

not sure what you just trying fixing in the most recent update. But the navigation bar at the bottom of the screen is now gone. along with various location based issues riddle the game. can no longer accurately track routes, nor complete them seeing as how they just cut out and no longer track that youre walking on a path. the navigation bar at the bottom is the biggest deal. having to scroll up on my phone, amd waste countless pokeballs to just switch apps, or go to the home screen is a scam.

I've done everything to troubleshoot, and as many others are saying- after the recent update, you can't get the game past the first screen, or you get stuck on "enter date of birth" and can't enter a date. I've uninstalled, reinstalled, cleared cache, restarted phone. I tried every suggestion. I'm upset because I play everyday, now I'm sitting with nothing to do and frustrated, and Niantic hasn't addressed the issue/ say nothing about fixing it. Will change it to 5 stars, if a fix is ever made.

Buggy as hell, when an update comes in you can't play until you install it. After the last update I can no longer log in. The game was awesome at first but has become more and more frustrating to the point where it's not worth it anymore. update: it got worse. They've turned the game into a micro-transaction nightmare, a total pay-to-play. There's 3 level 50 trainers who will not allow anyone to takeover a gym. I can't feed berries to my Pokemon when a gym is being raided, but they can and do

Great game, gives good incentives to go outside and enjoy nature. Nothing can ever take away the rush when you find a shiny or a really rare pokemon in the wild. One of the only problems with the game is that it is entirely location based. You either have a good place to play and can succeed, or you have a bad place and can't do much in game without traveling a few miles away. Another problem is that the game is moving more and more to micro transactions, with multiple passes and paid content.

Boned by the update, sure I am a higher level and I received literally 1000's of items and a few upgrades. However, I cannot get new presents, I cannot claim rewards for the battle league, I cannot do a lot of things until I use over 1000 items or delete them... All that and I am still unable to get regional Pokemon from friend gifts?! Sure,I can maybe get a scatterbug, but seriously, while I love the update the item dump was ridiculous without also upgrading storage by a lot more than they did.

Good luck getting help when this game bugs out! The number of times I've lost things I paid real money for because the game is buggy is absurd. The costs have gotten so high that it is impossible to get much enjoyment out of the game without paying for it. I'm tired of how little my dollar stretches in this game, it's not enough for how much money I dump into it. Storage alone has cost me hundreds. Remote Raid passes are stupid expensive. And paying never ends.

I love PokÃ©mon and have played it all my life. I wanted to try getting back into this game, but after a couple of days of playing, the app refused to open. It crashed every time I tried to. I got a pop up on my phone claiming there is a bug in the app and that I need the developer to fix it. From what I could find online, this has been a reoccurring issue for years. As big as this game is, it feels telling that a game breaking issue like this exists.

The game is in a spot where playing free to play is a severe disadvantage. The casual experience requires too many resources that are not easily accessible, and the only way to get said resources is through paid/premium means. Even if you pay to get these, they cap many resources (like PokÃ© Coins) making it harder to earn, and they also cap your inventory so you can't truly save resources to use for later. It requires too much time and energy to play casually and it is not worth it

everything was fine until Monday! I got to level 31 and worked my butt off for the last 8 months to get this far and now I click on menus And it freezes, I can't power up or upgrade pokemon because the menu freezes. I am beyond angry to have worked and walked as far as I did for the game to freeze now. do not play this game, especially if you invest time or resources because at some point it will no longer work.

I have been playing this game since 2016, I love it, I had my own system for catching, and then it got "borked" by the latest UI change. PLEASE REVERT THE UI!!! I normally will be catching pokes with one hand and have something else occupy my other hand (like a drink). My hands are too small to quickly reach the run button in an encounter and my muscle memory wants me to try to swipe up on my back button but then I just end up chucking and wasting balls instead. Good luck shiny hunting quickly

I love this game. You would be getting 5 stars if the game was still working the way it did when I first downloaded it. NO PROBLEMS THEN! But, It hasn't been working for weeks. I have uninstalled, cleared cache and storage and reinstalled. It's stuck on the birthdate thing and it won't move. Also, It was going to an account recovery thing and that didn't work either. You're going to lose a lot of loyal players. I didn't spend money on the game, But I'm sure a lot of people have. Goodbye.

The game constantly freezes and has to be closed and reopened. When doing raids, the game will freeze or kick you out when going into the encounter to catch the raid boss. This has been constantly happening for months. I have tried multiple suggested resolutions from Niantic with no change in functionality across multiple devices. UPDATE: Now freezing even more frequently and the latest update doesn't show icons right. DO YOU EVEN TEST ANYTHING? Every time there is a change something breaks.

It's alright but definitely gone downhill in many ways. I've been playing since the beginning. Microtransactions have gotten so bad. Events are a mess - even the small collection events are horrible. Spawn rates mean half the time the pokemon needed for collection events don't even spawn around you. There's still no remote trading and Pokemon can still only be traded once. So many pokemon are still region locked or locked behind payment walls. Game freezing or crashing is also a big issue.

Has been a motivator in going for walks. Edit: I had to dock stars after playing it longer. While I still use it as a fun diversion while walking, the limitations on the inventories for Pokemon, items, & postcards are incredibly frustrating. Coupled with your ability to earn the cash shop currency being capped at 50/day, it takes far too long to fix. Long distance friends can't trade & have to buy special raid passes for $$ in order to battle together. Too many microtransactions/pay-to-win.

the PvP or "Battle," if you will, is extremely rigged. I have a number of friends, both near and far, who have come across the same issues. the system is completely rigged for you to lose. Only when you have 12+ losses in a row, then they make it "easy" again to trap you with a solid 3-4 wins. Just to continue the cycle. it's not worth it. Play Palworld online if you wanna have a fair "battle." These little games are just for the fun of trading and catching.

The safety feature that does not let you catch will be active even if your not moving. it's random and can engage even if you haven't been in a fast moving car. they won't fix this. you don't know if the catches you miss are because of this or not. Definitely don't do any paid raids. I have a picture of this happening. there are continual bugs in this game that they will not acknowledge, connection issues that interfere with catching anything, even excellent throws will not work.

Can you fix your game please, adventure sync needs work. every time I hit an excellent throw, they break free, but the next throw is garbage, and it gets caught.... I thought excellent throws increased catch rate.... lastly, they made the in-game full screen, which removed the navigation bar on androids, causing slower game play, and one handed usage is restricted since with my thumb I can't leave the catch screen or animations since it's in the top left corner to flee or leave. Galaxy Ultra25+

I don't understand how or why it was decided that players can waste time, effort, and resources into doing raids just for a CHANCE to catch a desired PokÃ©mon. But in a real PokÃ©mon game, it's a guaranteed catch without having to spend money. I literally have no desire to play something that punishes you for trying. Such a disgustingly lousy model for a game EDIT: Wasted coins for a remote pass, app froze after boss was defeated. Never even got a chance to try and catch it.

I am dealing with some pretty egregious bugs. I don't know if it's unique to my phone's OS (moto razr 2024) or if other Android users have experienced anything similar, but often times when I go to catch a Pokemon or use AR mode to play with my buddy, I am met with a black screen that won't go away no matter how many times I restart the app. I've had to uninstall and reinstall the game several times to get it working again. I love this game and want to keep playing, so I hope it gets addressed.

1pm to 3pm, New York City May 27 2024. Every time i login to the game, it was lacking right there, i can't control anythings. My app is up-to-date and i have trying to restart my phone, the problem still there .Please fix this bug. Reasons for giving two stars is because always have bugs, a lot of bugs, especially bad weather. It's not a new games, it should not be always have this kind of bugs.

Every time I open the game it freezes, I've looked for fixes and I've done everything it's said, like restarting my game and my phone, clearing the cache on play store and the game, my phone and the app is up to date and I have a S24+ so it's not a gen problem. The only time it works is if I uninstall and reinstall the game, but I loads with no sound and if I close the game or leave it on in the background for to long it happens again. I'm not sure how to fix it. Hopefully they release a update.

I hardly ever get lucky anymore. This game always leaves me wishing I had got better catches and items though. The game isn't very engaging anymore. part of the problem is you removed a bunch of pokestops and gyms in my area and that's made it impossible to fill up my bag with pokeballs. there is no profit or payout for trying and almost 10/10 times it's not a shiny, not s perfect, not a 3 star and it's size is unremarkable.

up until recently, I had no real issues with the game other than accessibility for people who don't have expendable money. however, in the last week, I haven't been able to play because the game freezes the second I get logged in. if it isn't fixed soon, I'm going to have to delete the game. that's nearly 10 years of gameplay and hundreds of PokÃ©mon down the drain. not to mention the money I've put into it.

The PVP system is genuinely infuriating. The charge attack button will swell in response to your presses six times before it goes off You're going to constantly lose games that you should have won because the character gets stuck in an animation or because you have a little lag. This will not stop. Your record is going to be trashed and the whole time you're going to be screaming "I'm pressing the button!! It should just work when I press it!!"

Lately a lot of features have been added to the game, some of which were removed, but the pokeball/apple feature from April fools 2025 have a lot of potential. I believe that you could use the pokeball feature to make routes better and make them more enticing. By adding the pokeballs to routes as a random spawn like the zygard cells you can make routes more rewarding, with drops like zygard cells in a range of 1-5, berries, stardust, XP and more. This game has so much potential, don't waste it.

I love this app. I've been playing daily for a while. But, I tried to open it today and it won't open. notification says it has a bug and to wait for the developer to come out with an updated that fixes the bug. I try to report the bug on multiple platforms. every one says I have to report the bug from within the app. I CANT OPEN YHE APP!! I'm not happy that I'm going to lose allot my streaks. someone out there please fix this bug!!

I agree with everyone regarding the new update with the full screen. The update needs to be reversed or have an in-game option to turn it off. (unless that was the point, to get people to waste pokeballs trying to get out of the catch screen) Regarding the massive cash grabs and Niantics greed... Niantic does not care about the 95% regular players as long as the "whales" keep buying. I've been playing this game from it's beginning and it's pretty sad what PokÃ©mon Go has turned into.

Enjoyed while I could, but apparently my phone is not compatible with the update even though it's only a few years old. Disappointing. I'm not the type to replace a phone every year or two. I have issues with no other apps, only this one. Update: it resumed working for a while but again requires an update I can't get.

I have been playing this game since it originally launched and I really enjoy some of the changes that have been made over the years. One biggest complaint now is that the play with your pokemon feature has always been difficult to work with, and that's hasn't improved. It tells you to look for an open flat surface but then never gives me to foot steps to place a pokemon making leveling friendship and gathering gifts very difficult.

They removed the option to sign in via Google from the login menu. My account is only accessible via Google. Ergo they broke my ability to login to my account. And recovery didn't help any either. Update: They keep breaking the login feature. Now, when you try to click the "returning player" button, it redirects you to an account recovery feature that only works for the browser data, not the app. also the DOB entry in the app is in operable.

Amazing game! but like most games it isnt perfect. With all the raids, battles and events, there's too much going on. I mean.. I love the events, but the different types of raids+battles are too confusing. Also.. PLS BRING SHINX BACK, Shinx is meant to be a fairly common pokemon, so I dont see a reason why it has been made so rare.. it is impossible to get now!! I know it might be a bit of a personalised request to ask for a specific pokÃ©mon to be bought back..

title: The Wall Street Journal. News
description:
**By downloading the app you agree to Dow Jones Terms of Use, Privacy Notice, and Cookie Notice**

Stay ahead of the competition with the app thatâ€™s as ambitious as you are. Get the trusted insights and in-depth analysis you need from The Wall Street Journal, Americaâ€™s most trusted newspaperâ€”providing key decision-makers around the world with peerless reporting since 1889. 

Download the WSJ app today and receive instant access to The Wall Street Journalâ€™s award-winning journalism, including world-renowned coverage of the latest news moving stock markets and impacting business.  

Simple and easy to use, the WSJ app provides you with instant access to the trusted insights you need, wherever, and whenever you need themâ€” from real-time quotes and breaking news, to the latest headlines impacting business, finance and global markets. Receive alerts and notifications with breaking news developments and updates from around the worldâ€”from the United States and Canada, to Europe, Asia and more.  

Plus, explore a wide range of dedicated sections with insightful articles, including: Politics, Opinion, World News, Lifestyle, U.S. News, Technology, Economy and more. 

Key benefits include: 

(+) Full access to the WSJ app, WSJ.com and WSJ. Magazineâ€”our award-winning lifestyle publication.

(+) Multiple ways to read the newspaper including access to global digital editions of The Wall Street Journalâ€”U.S., Europe and Asia. 

(+) Trusted insights from a world-renowned newspaper, with over 125 years of peerless reporting and award-winning journalism. 

(+) Unlimited access to a wide range of dedicated site sections, including: Business, Markets, Politics, Opinion, World News, U.S. News, Economy, Technology, Lifestyle, Finance and more. 

(+) World-renowned business and finance news with coverage on the economy, including real-time stock quotes, global markets data, and the latest on mergers and acquisitions. 

(+) Global headlines, breaking news coverage and real-time market quotes, along with The Wall Street Journalâ€™s expert insights, in-depth analysis and informed commentary. 

(+) New feature: Whatâ€™s News feed: A real-time news feed, curated by The Wall Street Journalâ€™s award-winning journalistsâ€”featuring the must-know global news across business, finance, politics and the economy throughout the day. 

(+) New feature: Ability to print out articles directly from your mobile device. 

(+) New feature: Save and Share articles to read later. 

(+) Off-line reading, enabling you to remain ambitious, wherever you are. 

(+) Alerts and notifications for breaking news, latest headlines, developing stories and live updatesâ€”including the ability to follow your favorite journalists. 

(+) Seamlessly integrated markets data available within articles, along with real-time stock quotes, company-specific metrics, historical share performance, charts and more. 

(+) Get the latest headlines and breaking news from around the world, instantly available with the ability to save and read later. Stay informed, wherever you are.

You can now have the world-renowned and respected journalism from The Wall Street Journal, Americaâ€™s most trusted newspaper. Available for subscription for $32.99 per month and receive unlimited digital accessâ€”including instant access to WSJ.com, the WSJ app and the WSJ. Magazine digital edition. 

Subscriber Agreement and Terms of Use: 
https://www.dowjones.com/terms-of-use/

Privacy Notice: 
https://www.dowjones.com/privacy-notice/?mod=appstore

Cookie Notice:
https://www.dowjones.com/cookie-notice/?mod=appstore

Masthead:
https://www.wsj.com/masthead?mod=appstore

https://www.facebook.com/wsj

https://twitter.com/WSJ
